faqs.question: How can I get into Osmania University PG College, Narsapur for UG/PG courses? Am I eligible for admission?
faqs.answer:
Osmania University PG College, Narsapur has below criteria for taking admissions to it's various courses:
Courses Eligibility
MBA/PGDM Candidate must have passed Bachelor Degree (BA / B.Com/ B.Sc/ BBA / BBM / BCA / BE / B.Tech / B. Pharmacy / Any 3 or 4 year Degree except Oriental Languages). Examinations of minimum three years duration with at least 50% marks (45% marks in case of reserved categories) in the qualifying examinations. Final year appearing students may also apply on provisional basis. The minimum age of the candidates should be 19 years as on the date of notification (Candidates whose date of Birth up to 30th MARCH, 2003). No maximum age limit.
M.Sc. Candidates must have completed B.Sc. Degree with Chemistry subject as an optional with above mentioned marks from any recognised University/Institute . Candidate must have studied Chemistry at least four papers of 100 marks each. OR Candidates who have completed B.Sc. Degree with Chemistry subject as an optional and must have studied a minimum of 30 credits in Chemistry. A pass in the Qualifying Examination is sufficient for SC/ST candidates. The candidates passing the examination compartmentally and securing required percentage of marks or equivalent CGPA are also eligible.

faqs.question: Which major specializations are available at Osmania University PG College, Narsapur?
faqs.answer: Osmania University PG College, Narsapur offers Degree courses including 3 PG courses. These programs are offerred in Full Time mode. Osmania University PG College, Narsapur has specializations such as M.Sc. specializations in Chemistry, Mathematics.

faqs.question: How many seats are available at Osmania University PG College, Narsapur for all courses combined?
faqs.answer: Overall seats across various courses at Osmania University PG College, Narsapur goes up to 60. Osmania University PG College, Narsapur offers Degree courses including 3 PG courses. These programs are offerred in Full Time mode.

faqs.question: What is the scope of MBA?
faqs.answer:
The scope of MBA course is increasing day by day. MBA is one of the big job oriented professional programme and the most one which has been sought by the students. Once you have completed your degree, you have a great job opportunity in the industrial world. You may the manager or executive in term of designation.
The management term is most suited to the managers and that's why it is the way, where you can reach on the top of the height as soon as possible by using your leadership and working proficiency. An MBA professional always plays a vital role in his/her company and this is why he used to keep in touch with the board of directors. No need to specify the companies who recruit the MBA professionals. All sectors including government and public have various industries, companies, institutions or related organizations, come in the job prospective fields for an MBA professional.
Some job profiles are listed here:
Brand Manager
Account Manager
International Business Manager
Marketing Executive
Business Technical Consultant
All the best.

placements.overview: Established in 1999, Srinivas Institute of Management Studies is located in Mangalore, Karnataka. The institute offers courses like MBA/PGDM and MCA. These courses are offered in Full Time mode. A total of 2 courses offered by the Institute are available across streams such as Business & Management Studies and IT & Software. reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2019
reviews_list.review_title: Faculty members of our college are the worst.

review_content.Placements: Only one student from our class got placed during placements. The highest salary offered was about Rs. 20,000 per month. The lowest salary offered was Rs. 12,000 per month. All the companies visited our college was the worst. Placement officer was very bad. The highest salary package offered by the company was 2.5 LPA. The lowest salary package offered was 1.5 LPA. Every student did an internship according to their core subjects, i.e., finance, human resources, marketing and aviation.
review_content.Infrastructure: The campus was horrible. Facilities provided here are very poor. There is no ground or extra class. The college has a library. Classrooms are the worst. I stayed at PG, and I don't know much about the hostel food and mess. It is one of the worst campuses.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2019
reviews_list.review_title: Best college in Bangalore.

review_content.Placements: I am now studying, so I don't have that much knowledge about placements. But as per my knowledge many companies are visiting here for campus interview. Many of my seniors are placed in good companies like Wipro, infocyis. Many are placed in foreign companies.
review_content.Infrastructure: In our college there is 2 libraries which are opening at 9am and closes at 5.30pm. And are having good collection of books. Classrooms:Not very good. But every classrooms having facility of projector. Canteen:Here food is not so good and you can't get Verity of food. Labs: College is having 2 computer labs which are very good.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2018
reviews_list.review_title: Satisfied with the faculty and infrastructure. In 2017, the placements were good.

review_content.Placements: There are good placement cell facilities, and almost all calibre students can get their placement with the good salary. Almost all the good companies visited the campus, and they offered good roles to the students. Almost, 70% of the students got an internship from the college.
review_content.Infrastructure: The Wi-Fi facility, labs, A/C classrooms, library, medical facilities, sports and games, etc., are available on the campus. The quality of labs and classrooms is good. They also provide the quality of food from the canteen. The hostel rooms are good, and I didn't face any type of infrastructure related issues.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2016
reviews_list.review_title: Srinivas Institute of Management Studies is a place, which set the making of me.

review_content.Placements: The placements are good in and around the city through the pool campus. Srinivas always invited to take part in those. I got selected in 5 MNCs that are TCS, Accenture, Tech Mahindra, Unisys, JK Tyre. The Work company personally visit our campus every year, which offers both study and job programme.
review_content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure on the campus is average, but the main building that is in Valachil is good. All the major days and the functions are celebrated there. In Pandeshwar campus, you'll find the railway connectivity nearby for the Kerala students. The campus has a south Indian canteen, but it does have a good north Indian restaurant around it.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2015
reviews_list.review_title: The review of Srinivas College. (MBA).

review_content.Placements: In case of placements, average companies will come here, and they offer basic pay like Rs. 14,000 to 16,000 per month. Only two to three big/reputed companies might come to the college. As per my knowledge in an average of 50 students, only 20 students will get hired. Comparatively, it's an average college in the placements.
review_content.Infrastructure: The Wi-Fi facility, labs, classrooms and library everything is good except sports facilities. There is no much scope for sports, especially in case of management students, they will never allow you to play. The hostel rooms are good, but the quality of the food is average. It is only suitable for vegetarians.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2018
reviews_list.review_title: Dissatisfied because of faculty members, good placement, infrastructure, and facilities.

review_content.Placements: The placements are very few. Only companies with a low salary were coming for the placements. The placement test and the interview are very hard, and until now, as I know, there are only very few who are appointed and from those who are appointed are also resigned because of hard job and less salary.
review_content.Infrastructure: The Wi-Fi has a limit of 20 MB. The classrooms and other facilities are adjustable. In the canteen, only vegetarian food is available. The available food is good. The hostel is the worst with an old building, and very bad kind of food is there. This college has no campus and campus life.

review_summary.college_name: Srinivas Institute of Management Studies Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2019
individual_reviews.title: Faculty members of our college are the worst.

content.Placements: Only one student from our class got placed during placements. The highest salary offered was about Rs. 20,000 per month. The lowest salary offered was Rs. 12,000 per month. All the companies visited our college was the worst. Placement officer was very bad. The highest salary package offered by the company was 2.5 LPA. The lowest salary package offered was 1.5 LPA. Every student did an internship according to their core subjects, i.e., finance, human resources, marketing and aviation.
content.Infrastructure: The campus was horrible. Facilities provided here are very poor. There is no ground or extra class. The college has a library. Classrooms are the worst. I stayed at PG, and I don't know much about the hostel food and mess. It is one of the worst campuses.

individual_reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2019
individual_reviews.title: Best college in Bangalore.

content.Placements: I am now studying, so I don't have that much knowledge about placements. But as per my knowledge many companies are visiting here for campus interview. Many of my seniors are placed in good companies like Wipro, infocyis. Many are placed in foreign companies.
content.Infrastructure: In our college there is 2 libraries which are opening at 9am and closes at 5.30pm. And are having good collection of books. Classrooms:Not very good. But every classrooms having facility of projector. Canteen:Here food is not so good and you can't get Verity of food. Labs: College is having 2 computer labs which are very good.

individual_reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2018
individual_reviews.title: Satisfied with the faculty and infrastructure. In 2017, the placements were good.

content.Placements: There are good placement cell facilities, and almost all calibre students can get their placement with the good salary. Almost all the good companies visited the campus, and they offered good roles to the students. Almost, 70% of the students got an internship from the college.
content.Infrastructure: The Wi-Fi facility, labs, A/C classrooms, library, medical facilities, sports and games, etc., are available on the campus. The quality of labs and classrooms is good. They also provide the quality of food from the canteen. The hostel rooms are good, and I didn't face any type of infrastructure related issues.

faqs.answer: A:    Bodoland University conducts a Common Entrance Test for admission to B.Ed programme. The entrance test is of a total of 100 marks consisting of multiple choice questions in General English, General Knowledge, Test of Reasoning, Numerical Ability and Teaching Aptitude. Candidates who qualify the test is shortlisted for B.Ed admission.
faqs.question: Is entrance exam required for B.Ed at Bodoland University?

faqs.answer: A:    Yes, Bodoland University reserves some seats for reserved category candidates. Out of the total seats, 80% are reserved for merit students of affiliated colleges of Bodoland University. The remaining 20% is open for all merit students from UGC-recognised universities including BU. Below is category-wise reservation at Bodoland University:CategoryReservation %SC7%ST (Plains)10%ST (Hills)5%OBC & MOBC (Non-Creamy Layer)27%PwD3%EWS10%
faqs.question: Is there seat reservation at Bodoland University?

For MSc Biotechnology, aspirants need to complete graduation in any of the Biological Sciences with at least 50% aggregate or equivalent grade.

faqs.answer: Yes, Bodoland University offers a two-year M.Ed course divided into four semesters. Candidates who have passed B.Ed with a minimum of 50% aggregate are eligible to apply for M.Ed programme. There is a 5% relaxation in the aggregate for SC/ ST candidates. The selection for M.Ed is based on entrance exam.

faqs.question: Q: What documents do I need to apply for B.Ed CET at Bodoland University?

faqs.answer: Bodoland University life offers a varied assortment of experiences. The facilities present a different image: although the classrooms are kept in excellent condition, there is no Wi-Fi, and the hostels are not very clean and serve food that may be unsettling. While the canteen offers a basic amenity, the absence of sports programmes, medical facilities, and security makes one wonder about the general well-being of students.The best thing about the faculty is how well-trained they are, though some students might find it difficult to learn in regional languages rather than English. Exams are generally thought to be easy, but there is a drawback: inconsistent grading procedures irritate students. Exams during the semester are especially difficult and contribute to academic stress. Bodoland University life is essentially a mix of positives like well-kept classrooms and committed faculty members and negatives like poor facilities and difficulties with exams.
faqs.question: Q: How is life at Bodoland University?

overview_faqs.question: How much does B Sc. at Bodoland University cost?
overview_faqs.answer: The total annual tuition for a three-year B.Sc. programme at Bodoland University ranges from INR 44,500 to INR 49,500 for students in the General and OBC categories. The three-year B.Sc. programme costs SC/ST students between INR 22,250 and INR 24,750 less than the regular tuition.The tuition costs within the specified ranges may differ somewhat for various B.Sc. programmes. For instance, the cost of some specialised programmes, such as biotechnology or computer science, may be marginally more than that of core Science courses, like physics or chemistry. You may also be required to pay examination, library, computer lab, and other costs in addition to the tuition.These differ based on the programme and usually total between INR 1,000 and INR 2,000 annually.

overview_faqs.question: Is M.Ed available at Bodoland University?
overview_faqs.answer: Yes, Bodoland University offers a two-year M.Ed course divided into four semesters. Candidates who have passed B.Ed with a minimum of 50% aggregate are eligible to apply for M.Ed programme. There is a 5% relaxation in the aggregate for SC/ ST candidates. The selection for M.Ed is based on entrance exam.

overview_faqs.question: When is B.Ed CET conducted at Bodoland University?
overview_faqs.answer: Bodoland University usually conducts Common Entrance Test for B.Ed in the last week of July. The university announce the results by the first week of August. Candidates have to qualify B.Ed CET to get admission in the B.Ed course of Bodoland University.

overview_faqs.question: How is life at Bodoland University?
overview_faqs.answer: Bodoland University life offers a varied assortment of experiences. The facilities present a different image: although the classrooms are kept in excellent condition, there is no Wi-Fi, and the hostels are not very clean and serve food that may be unsettling. While the canteen offers a basic amenity, the absence of sports programmes, medical facilities, and security makes one wonder about the general well-being of students.The best thing about the faculty is how well-trained they are, though some students might find it difficult to learn in regional languages rather than English. Exams are generally thought to be easy, but there is a drawback: inconsistent grading procedures irritate students. Exams during the semester are especially difficult and contribute to academic stress. Bodoland University life is essentially a mix of positives like well-kept classrooms and committed faculty members and negatives like poor facilities and difficulties with exams.

content.Placements: 80% of our MBA class is hired. The average package offered is 5.8LPA, the lowest package offered is 3.8LPA, and the highest package offered is 13.5LPA. Well known companies like Nestle, TCS, Axis Bank, and EY arrived. Almost 70% can secure internships at local startups, PwC, and Aditya Birla. Sales Manager, Financial Analyst, HR Executive, and Operations Manager are among the positions available.
content.Infrastructure: In our college, there is a Wi-Fi table, smart classrooms, and a respectable library with business magazines. The laundry service is slow, but the hostel rooms are good. Canteen snacks are popular, but the mess food lacks variety. Sports are restricted to indoor table tennis and badminton.

admission_process.title: Bodoland University Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: Bodoland University admissionsare primarily entrance-based. The university conducts an entrance test for PhD, B.Ed, M.Ed and other programmes.Bodoland Universityoffers PG, diploma, certificate and doctoral-level courses in multiple streams such as Arts, Science, Management, Computer Science, etc. at campus and via affiliated colleges. Interested candidates can fill out the application form online for the preferred course.

The university offers more than 20 courses in full-time mode. Aspirants have to apply for a course of their choice to participate in the selection rounds. Below are the key highlights forBodoland University admissions:
Particulars
Bodoland University Admission Highlights 2025
Mode of study
Programmes Offered
PG courses:INR 7,900 - INR 25,500
How to apply?
https://www.buniv.edu.in/
Level of programmes offered
Popular programmes

The university offers admission to most of the courses based on entrance-exam. Besides, candidates must also fulfil the course-specific eligibility requirements. Below are the topBodoland University coursesalong with their eligibility and selection criteria:

Bodoland University fee is a sum of multiple components such as caution deposit, hostel fee, exam fee, etc. Aspirants who get a seat in the university have to pay the course fee to confirm their seat in the university. Below isBodoland University feeand intake for top courses:
Note:This information is sourced from official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change.

Out of the total intake, 80% of seats are reserved for merit students of affiliated colleges of Bodoland University. The remaining 20% is open for all merit students from UGC-recognised universities including BU. 20% seats are reserved for deputation in M.Ed and 50% for deputation in B.Ed. Below is category-wise reservation at Bodoland University:
Note:20% of the total seats are reserved for CUET-qualified candidates. However, the BU entrance qualified candidates adjust the vacant reserved seats forCUET.
Bodoland University admission process begins with registration. Aspirants are selected based on their merit or entrance exam scores. Below are the steps to get a seat in Bodoland University:
Step 1: Bodoland University Application Process 2025

Aspirants can apply for different departments separately. Candidates can fill out the application form on the official website of the university by paying an application fee. Aspirants also need to upload relevant documents along with the application form.
Step 2: Selection

The university conducts an entrance exam for admission to all B.Ed, M.Ed PhD and PG courses. For admission to all diploma, certificate and integrated courses, the merit of the aspirants is considered in the last qualifying exam.
Step 3: Counselling and Seat Allotment

Selected candidates need to participate in counselling and document verification. Aspirants are offered seat based on their merit in qualifying or entrance exam. Candidates need to pay a course fee to confirm their seat in the university.

courses_data.name: Bodoland University B.Ed Admission 2025
courses_data.description: Bodoland University offers a two-year B.Ed programme through affiliated colleges. The course is recognised by the National Council for Teacher Education (NCTE) and is offered by the NCTE recognised Secondary Teacher Education Institutions affiliated to/ recognised by BU. The university conducts an entrance exam for admission to B.Ed programme.

faqs.question: What documents do I need to apply for B.Ed CET at Bodoland University?
faqs.answer: Candidates applying for the Common Entrance Test for B.Ed need to fill out the application form on the university website. Below are the documents required for Bodoland University CET:One coloured passport-size photograph of the candidateSignature of the candidateFinal year grade sheetHSLC admit cardCaste/ NCL/ EWS certificate

faqs.question: Is entrance exam required for B.Ed at Bodoland University?
faqs.answer: Bodoland University conducts a Common Entrance Test for admission to B.Ed programme. The entrance test is of a total of 100 marks consisting of multiple choice questions in General English, General Knowledge, Test of Reasoning, Numerical Ability and Teaching Aptitude. Candidates who qualify the test is shortlisted for B.Ed admission.

faqs.question: When is B.Ed CET conducted at Bodoland University?
faqs.answer: Bodoland University usually conducts Common Entrance Test for B.Ed in the last week of July. The university announce the results by the first week of August. Candidates have to qualify B.Ed CET to get admission in the B.Ed course of Bodoland University.

courses_data.name: Bodoland University M.Ed Admission 2025
courses_data.description: Bodoland University offers a two-year M.Ed course spread across four semesters. Candidates who have qualified B.Ed with at least 50% aggregate are eligible to apply for M.Ed programme. There is a 5% relaxation in the aggregate for SC/ ST candidates. The university conducts a Common Entrance Test or CET for admission to M.Ed.

faqs.question: What is the fee for M.Ed at Bodoland University?
faqs.answer: The total tuition fee for Bodoland University M.Ed isINR 7.900.This information is sourced from official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change. The total fee for M.Ed is a cumulative of multiple components such as caution deposit, hostel fee, etc. Candidates have to pay the course fee to confirm their seat in the university.

faqs.question: Is M.Ed available at Bodoland University?
faqs.answer: Yes, Bodoland University offers a two-year M.Ed course divided into four semesters. Candidates who have passed B.Ed with a minimum of 50% aggregate are eligible to apply for M.Ed programme. There is a 5% relaxation in the aggregate for SC/ ST candidates. The selection for M.Ed is based on entrance exam.

faqs.question: How can I get a seat in M.Ed at Bodoland University?
faqs.answer: Bodoland University offers seats to candidates in M.Ed programme based on the entrance-exam conducted by the university. It is a two-hour multiple-choice test. The test consists of questions in the below areas:General EnglishGeneral KnowledgeTest of ReasoningNumerical AbilityTeaching Aptitude

courses_data.name: Bodoland University MBA Admission 2025
courses_data.description: Bodoland University offers a two-year full-time MBA programme divided into four semesters. The course is approved by UGC and affiliated to AICTE. The university offers MBA Dual Specialisations in Finance, Marketing, Human Resources and Operations. Candidates need to pass a minimum of three-year UG course with at least 50% aggregate to apply for MBA.

faqs.question: Who all are eligible for MBA at Bodoland University?
faqs.answer: Candidates need to pass a minimum of three-year bachelor's degree with at least 50% aggregate to apply for Bodoland University MBA programme. There is a 5% relaxation in the aggregate for SC/ ST category candidates. The relaxation in not applicable to candidates seeking admission in any other reserved quota.

faqs.question: What is the selection procedure for the MBA programme at Bodoland University?
faqs.answer: Bodoland University selects candidates for MBA programme based on their entrance-exam score. The university conducts an entrance test for MBA admission. Aspirants need to pass a bachelor's degree with at least 50% aggregate to apply for MBA. For MBA, there is a written test of 80 marks, 10 marks each for group discussion and personal interview. Once selected, aspirants have to come for document verification. Candidates are further required to pay a course fee to confirm their seat in the univers

faqs.question: Does Bodoland University accept CAT score?
faqs.answer: No, Bodoland University does not accepts CAT score. Admission to MBA programme is based on merit of the aspirants in the entrance-exam conducted by the university. The university may accept CUET-PG score also for admission to MBA. Besides, candidates must also complete their graduation with at least 50% aggregate to apply for MBA.

faqs.question: Can students get selected at Bodoland University with graduation range of 60-70 percentage?
faqs.answer: Candidates applying for Bodoland University PG courses need to qualify a minimum of graduation. The minimum aggregate for graduation ranges between 50%-55%. Hence, aspirants with 60%-70% have a good chance of getting admission in Bodoland University. There is a relaxation of 5% in the aggregate for SC/ ST candidates. Hence, aspirants belonging to these categories have even more chance of getting admission in the preferred course.

reviews.review_heading: Our college is not just like any other college. Students are given fines for being absent.
reviews.review_text: Yes, the facilities are very good, and many useful books are available in the libraries. The labs are well-equipped as well. fees_and_eligibility.overview: GRT Institute of Engineering and Technology offers diverse programmes at UG and PG levels in Full Time mode. The offered programmes can be chosen from streams such as Engineering and Business & Management Studies. At the UG level, candidates have the provision to opt from courses such as B.E. / B.Tech. Whereas, at PG level, GRT Institute of Engineering and Technology offers courses such as MBA/PGDM. GRT Institute of Engineering and Technology fee structure for all the courses is around INR 35,000 to 2,00,000.

faqs.answer: A:    GRT Institute of Engineering and Technology provides programmes including B.E. / B.Tech, MBA/PGDM in streams such as Engineering, Business & Management Studies, and are excellent for students to build their careers. The institute has specializations in Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, Biomedical Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Operations.
faqs.question: Which courses does GRT Institute of Engineering and Technology offer?

faqs.answer: A:    The fees range for courses offerred by the GRT Institute of Engineering and Technology is around INR 35000 - INR 200000.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering - Batch of 2023
reviews_list.review_title: Our college provides good infrastructure and teachers.

review_content.Placements: Placements provided in our college are good. Placement officer tries to provide placements from good companies and gives some coaching to crack all the aptitude exams. They improve the knowledge of students in both the hardware and software sectors.
review_content.Infrastructure: There are many systems with internet access. The quality of the food served in the hostel and canteen is very good. It has a big ground for students to play all the games.
review_content.Faculty: Teachers in our college are helpful to students in their studies and support them in extracurricular activities. They improve the knowledge of students.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.E. in Biomedical Engineering - Batch of 2022
reviews_list.review_title: The college is like a book in a jungle as it is a great campus which is in a rural area.

review_content.Placements: Mostly, IT companies and some internship-providing companies will arrive at our college. About 70% of students were placed in the college. The highest salary offered is Rs.100000 per month, the average salary offered is Rs.20000 per month, and the lowest salary offered is Rs.11000 per month. Top recruiting companies are Infosys, HCL, and CTS.
review_content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is very nice and all the lab facilities are provided. Mostly, the systematic lab contains an air-conditioner. Wi-Fi is provided for faculty members only and also the final year students can also use when their project work is undergoing. Food is of average taste in mess and canteen is also there now. They are going to open a bakery and also a juice park, etc. The classrooms are very wide with a good ventilation facility.

review_summary.college_name: GRT Institute of Engineering and Technology Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: Very good infrastructure, excellent facilities and placements.

content.Placements: The percentage of the placements is good, as 75% of students were placed in various companies like TCS, Zoho, and many other companies. The minimum average package of the placements is 4.4 LPA and the maximum is 1.4 CPA. For the students, from the 3rd year onwards, they provide internships.
content.Infrastructure: The great infrastructure makes students comfortable with nature and the study aspect. In each department, they have various facilities in labs, classrooms, and the library. The hostel was good enough compared to other colleges, as they provide rooms for 4 to 5 members.

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Biomedical Engineering - Batch of 2024
individual_reviews.title: Review of GRT Institute of Engineering and Technology.

content.Placements: More than 85% of students got placed in this course. The highest salary package offered was 12 LPA. The lowest salary package offered was 3 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Infosys, etc. Students who score 8 CGPA are eligible for recruitment.
content.Infrastructure: All facilities are available in this college. There is a decent library on our campus. Separate laboratories are available for different departments. Digital boards are available in our classrooms. The food quality is decent.

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering - Batch of 2023
individual_reviews.title: Our college provides good infrastructure and teachers.

content.Placements: Placements provided in our college are good. Placement officer tries to provide placements from good companies and gives some coaching to crack all the aptitude exams. They improve the knowledge of students in both the hardware and software sectors.
content.Infrastructure: There are many systems with internet access. The quality of the food served in the hostel and canteen is very good. It has a big ground for students to play all the games.
content.Faculty: Teachers in our college are helpful to students in their studies and support them in extracurricular activities. They improve the knowledge of students.

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Biomedical Engineering - Batch of 2022
individual_reviews.title: The college is like a book in a jungle as it is a great campus which is in a rural area.

content.Placements: Mostly, IT companies and some internship-providing companies will arrive at our college. About 70% of students were placed in the college. The highest salary offered is Rs.100000 per month, the average salary offered is Rs.20000 per month, and the lowest salary offered is Rs.11000 per month. Top recruiting companies are Infosys, HCL, and CTS.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is very nice and all the lab facilities are provided. Mostly, the systematic lab contains an air-conditioner. Wi-Fi is provided for faculty members only and also the final year students can also use when their project work is undergoing. Food is of average taste in mess and canteen is also there now. They are going to open a bakery and also a juice park, etc. The classrooms are very wide with a good ventilation facility.

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2019
individual_reviews.title: It has a good infrastructure and good faculty for teaching. It is a good place to acquire knowledge.

content.Placements: Our college is located in Tiruttani. I joined B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering course, and there are about 45 members. Our college offers five courses. Top companies like TCL, HCL, Infosys, Sutherland and Tech Mahindra visit our college to hire students. We got an internship from companies like Vee technologies and BSNL. Top roles like network marketing, web development, Java and Hadoop are offered to the students.
content.Infrastructure: Our college is located in the middle of a highway, and it has huge coverage of the area. It has A, B, C, D and E blocks with canteen. Our college provides both girls and boys hostel, B.Ed block, MBA block, nursing block, a huge playground with garden. The quality of the food served is good, and weekly once we get non-vegetarian food. We have a library with Wi-Fi access.

hostel_campus.college_name: GRT Institute of Engineering and Technology Infrastructure Details & Reviews

hostel.description: The hostel comes with 75 rooms for girls and 124 for boys, are spacious, clean and secure. Entitling each student to an individual bed, wardrobe, armchair and desk. Air-conditioned and non air-conditioned rooms are available on an individual/sharing basis. The hostel has separate recreation, study and visitor’s rooms, apart from a TV room and international standard gym. The hostel boasts of a 10 Mbps, WI-FI powered computer room.

library.description: The library also houses over 2500 reference and rare books on all branches of engineering, science, the humanities, English, dictionaries and encyclopedias. The audiovisual section of the college library consists of over 1000 CD/DVD-ROM diskettes; enabling students improve their communications skills and prepare for the competitive exams. Around 217 IEEE, ASME, ASCE and J-GATE e-Journals and 62 national journals are subscribed to at the library, including technical and non technical magazines..

Wi-Fi is provided for faculty members only and also the final year students can also use when their project work is undergoing. Food is of average taste in mess and canteen is also there now. They are going to open a bakery and also a juice park, etc.  The classrooms are very wide with a good ventilation facility.

reviews.review_heading: It has a good infrastructure and good faculty for teaching. It is a good place to acquire knowledge.
reviews.review_text: Our college is located in the middle of a highway, and it has huge coverage of the area. It has A, B, C, D and E blocks with canteen. Our college provides both girls and boys hostel, B.Ed block, MBA block, nursing block, a huge playground with garden. The quality of the food served is good, and weekly once we get non-vegetarian food. We have a library with Wi-Fi access.

reviews.review_heading: It is a good college, and I like it.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of our college is good. Our college provides labs, classroom and library. Canteen facilities are good, but medical facilities are average. Food quality is good. Hostel facilities are average. They also provide food, and facilities of food are clean. There are no games in our college.

reviews.review_heading: The college provides studies with good placements and infrastructure.
reviews.review_text: All students are provided with good labs, classrooms and a library. The mobile phone is strictly prohibited on our campus. PC is available in the library with an internet connection. Medical and sports facilities are very good, but the canteen provides the average quality of food.

reviews.review_heading: I am dissatisfied because of lack of support.
reviews.review_text: Our college has a good infrastructure and surroundings. There is a neat playground with some good and supportive ground staff members. Our management doesn't show any interest in playing games which is one of the poor things. The hostel also needs to improve a bit in providing good surroundings and food.

reviews.review_heading: I am dissatisfied because of the faculty and placements. Our college has a good infrastructure.
reviews.review_text: Mobile phones are not allowed on the college premises. There is a huge central library with a separate floor in the management block. The library has computers with high-speed internet for students studies purpose. Every department has a separate library for students.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied with the faculty members and their teaching.
reviews.review_text: Labs are equipped with all equipment, and we get good knowledge in it. Lab in charge has some good knowledge, so we got good practical knowledge.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied for the money paid. It provides good infrastructure and facilities.
reviews.review_text: Our college has a very good infrastructure with a massive playground. There are highly facilitated labs, but we have some restrictions to use for students. Almost books required for students are available in the library including newspapers and magazines. Separate gents and ladies' hostels are available inside the campus. Food served is above average.

reviews.review_heading: Don't waste your 4  years by joining this college.
reviews.review_text: Our campus has an excellent infrastructure and facilities. It has a good environment to learn things. We pay Rs. 10 for Wi-Fi for one-hour unlimited usage. Classrooms are well spaced. The library has a good collection of books and we also have a digital library. The good thing about our campus is the hostel. We have many facilities at a good price while comparing to other colleges. They provide hot water, study tables, drinking water, etc. The food served is average. We have a canteen but they d...

reviews.review_heading: This college has an average academic and good atmosphere.
reviews.review_text: Facilities available in our department include it has its own library. Even our college has a general library for engineering and post-graduation separately, and the classrooms are quite huge and spacious. Labs are nice to gain more practical knowledge.

reviews.review_heading: I am dissatisfied with placements. The college has good infrastructure, hostel and canteen facility.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of our college is very wonderful. Classrooms are good, but labs are not that good. The college does not provide Wi-Fi facility. Mobiles and laptops are not allowed in college as well as in the hostel. In the hostel, rooms and food served are good. Medical facilities are available. The college does not provide sports and games facilities for girls in the hostel.

reviews.review_heading: I am dissatisfied because of good placements and infrastructure.
reviews.review_text: Classrooms, plants and trees are awesome on the campus. The canteen and the food served are awesome. Medical facilities are given for free. Sports and games are conducted every year. The food served in the mess, and the hostels are of good quality and have good ventilation facility.

fees_and_eligibility.overview: At the UG and PG levels, Adhiyamaan College of Engineering offers a diverse range of progammes. Candidates can choose Full Time and Part Time courses, from streams like Engineering, Business & Management Studies and IT & Software. College offers B.E. / B.Tech and B.Arch courses at the UG level. While, at the PG level, the college offers available programmes like M.E./M.Tech, MBA/PGDM and MCA. The Adhiyamaan College of Engineering course fee ranges between INR 35,000 to 2,60,000.

reviews_list.review_title: Adhiyamaan College of Engineering is really good engineering college.

review_content.Placements: Adhiyamaan College of Engineering was the best placement college. 95% of students got placed in reputed companies in 2021. The highest salary package was 12 LPA. The lowest salary package was 3 LPA. Top recruiting companies like TCS, Infosys, Zoho, Accenture, Wipro, Tech Mahindra, and IBM these companies visited this college for recruitment.
review_content.Infrastructure: Adhiyamaan College of Engineering had one of the best infrastructures. More than 15 courses and multiple classrooms were available at this college. Hi-tech laboratories and well-stocked library were also there at this college. This college hostel facilities were very good. Hostel and canteen food tastes were very good. Multiple sports grounds and coaching staffs facilities were available at this college.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech. in Chemical Engineering - Batch of 2021
reviews_list.review_title: Best college in Krishnagiri. It is located near Bangalore so easily we can find many opportunities.

review_content.Placements: In my batch, the strength was 120 members and 50 members got placed. The average salary ranges from 3 LPA to 5 LPA. Recruiting companies were Luminous, Tata, Delta, and Ashok Leyland. Around 30 to 40 members got internships in bio company and in a global company. Top roles may vary from each other but I don't know exactly.
review_content.Infrastructure: All types of labs were available with fully modernized equipment. Wi-Fi facility was not there but available only for computer labs. Library was the biggest on campus and also very spacious to read. I was a day scholar so I didn't know more about the hostel. But some of my hostel friends said that the food was moderate in taste wise but the quality was very good. I did not explore more sports and games. Our college conducted many district-level and division-level events.

review_summary.college_name: Adhiyamaan College of Engineering Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Aeronautical Engineering - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: Neither satisfied nor dissatisfied.

content.Placements: This is one of the best colleges in providing placements. This is useful in students' careers as they are keenly focusing on each and every child to be placed. They are also conducting placement training, which is essential for students.
content.Infrastructure: The library in college and a lot of other buildings are generally very good with their infrastructure, neat and clean. Whereas the hostel is not that good, it should be changed. The rooms can be better, and for the price of hostel fees, food can be even more tasty.

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: Around 85–95% of students were successfully placed during the campus placement drive.

content.Placements: Around 85–95% of students are successfully placed during the campus placement drive. The highest package is 25 LPA, offered by international recruiters or top product companies. The lowest package is 3.5 LPA, and the average package ranges from 6.5 to 8 LPA. Around 80–90% of students secured internships in various companies.
content.Infrastructure: A High-speed Wi-Fi facility is available throughout the campus and inside the department buildings. Students can access online resources, attend webinars, and collaborate easily. Labs are well-equipped and updated, specific to the course e.g., Computer Labs, Electronics Labs, Simulation Labs, etc. Most labs have modern hardware and licensed software required for practical learning.

paragraphs: Adhiyamaan College of Engineering admissionis based on both merit or exam scores of the candidates. Besides, Adhiyamaan College of Engineering considers scores in GATE, CEETA, and NATA for admission to specific courses.Adhiyamaan College of Engineeringoffers courses at the UG and PG levels.
The college offers UG programmes for 3 years - 5 years. For programmes at PG level, the duration is 2 years - 3 years.
The total tuition fee for UG programmes isINR 1,50,000 - 2,50,000. Likewise, the PG programmes fee isINR 35,000 - 2,60,000. Students can pay the fee amount via online or offline mode.
Please note that this fee information is obtained from the official website/ sanctioning body but is subject to change.

hostel_campus.college_name: Adhiyamaan College of Engineering Infrastructure Details & Reviews

reviews.review_heading: Neither satisfied nor dissatisfied.
reviews.review_text: The library in college and a lot of other buildings are generally very good with their infrastructure, neat and clean. Whereas the hostel is not that good, it should be changed. The rooms can be better, and for the price of hostel fees, food can be even more tasty.

reviews.review_heading: Around 85–95% of students were successfully placed during the campus placement drive.
reviews.review_text: A High-speed Wi-Fi facility is available throughout the campus and inside the department buildings. Students can access online resources, attend webinars, and collaborate easily. Labs are well-equipped and updated, specific to the course e.g., Computer Labs, Electronics Labs, Simulation Labs, etc. Most labs have modern hardware and licensed software required for practical learning.

reviews.review_heading: Adhiyamaan College of Engineering is really good engineering college.
reviews.review_text: Adhiyamaan College of Engineering had one of the best infrastructures. More than 15 courses and multiple classrooms were available at this college. Hi-tech laboratories and well-stocked library were also there at this college. This college hostel facilities were very good. Hostel and canteen food tastes were very good. Multiple sports grounds and coaching staffs facilities were available at this college.

reviews.review_heading: Best college in Krishnagiri. It is located near Bangalore so easily we can find many opportunities.
reviews.review_text: All types of labs were available with fully modernized equipment. Wi-Fi facility was not there but available only for computer labs. Library was the biggest on campus and also very spacious to read. I was a day scholar so I didn't know more about the hostel. But some of my hostel friends said that the food was moderate in taste wise but the quality was very good. I did not explore more sports and games. Our college conducted many district-level and division-level events.

reviews.review_heading: The college has good infrastructure and facilities.
reviews.review_text: Adhiyamaan College had 3 hostels. For girls Bhavani hostel. In a hostel regular maintenance is important for a comfortable living experience. The hostel has a dedicated study space. The hostel is equipped with fire safety measures such as fire extinguishers, smoke detectors, etc.

reviews.review_heading: Very good area for self development.
reviews.review_text: Very good infrastructure just mess food can be better. Adhiyamaan College of Engineering (ACE), established in 1987, is an autonomous institution located in Hosur, Tamil Nadu. The college boasts a sprawling campus spread over 250 acres, providing a conducive environment for academic pursuits and holistic development.

reviews.review_heading: Life at Adhiyamaan College of Engineering.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of the college is good. Hostel facility is also available with only South Indian food, which is not set for North Indian students. I prefer students not to choose the hostel. The hostel fee is also too high. The library has a separate building, and they also provide GATE papers and other commutative exam papers.

reviews.review_heading: Good college for sports and good infrastructure.
reviews.review_text: Good infrastructure, you can access everything within the campus, good security, a good hostel with attached restrooms and space, you have a high-tech gym, there is usable food also not bad compared to other colleges, and fee is good for hostel facilities .

reviews.review_heading: Adhiyamaan College of Engineering review.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure at this college is good, but it can be difficult to navigate the campus due to the large number of students. The hostels are clean and well-maintained, and students are assigned rooms based on their fee structure.

reviews.review_heading: Absolutely okay with my college,because of the infrastructure and environment
reviews.review_text: Wifi was not good, we can't able to access it easily. Classrooms are little bit okay. Library is good. Hostel quality is not good. The food provided by the hostel is worst. Canteen infrastructure is nice. Games like cricket, hockey are there and we get good practice.

reviews.review_heading: Adhiyamaan College of Engineering review
reviews.review_text: The facilities and infrastructure in our college is very good, which includes library, classroom with projector, etc. Food is average but the room will be clean. Canteen is so good and affordable. The overall facilities provided here are good. Recently they opened the Digital library that is very useful for many students.

reviews.review_heading: Good infrastructure in my college.
reviews.review_text: In my college, there is no Wi-Fi facility, and it was the worst and worth the money for counseling students only, not for management students. Anyone going to the lab means it was a good and best new system, and there is no Wi-Fi in the lab system. No fans in the library have a digital system.

reviews.review_heading: Pleasant environment, good infrastructure, excellent coaching. Enjoyable college life.
reviews.review_text: A very good infrastructure along with many good facilities are provided by the college. Wi-Fi, smart boards, laboratory, projectors and classrooms facilities are also too good. The hostel management is also good and they provide good quality food. Our college is next to a multi specialty hospital and they provide 24/7 free medical facilities to our students.

reviews.review_heading: It has a very nice infrastructure and surroundings.
reviews.review_text: The college has a nice infrastructure available for our course having Wi-Fi facilities in our classrooms. They have very good standard in our hostel, they provide good quality food for the students.

reviews.review_heading: The college is good for the education of the students.
reviews.review_text: The college infrastructure is good and the climate is excellent. There are many courses available in Adhiyamaan college of engineering. The hostel facilities are good. They conduct many cultural events, the hostel fest is excellent.

review_summarisation.heading: What students say about Adhiyamaan College of Engineering

Our college has a good training department for placements and a good skill development department.

reviews.review_text: The entire campus is Wi-Fi enabled. We have air-conditioned classrooms, with smart technology system and a well-organised library. Quality of food served in the mess and canteen is good enough. Medical facilities are also available. Sports and games are scheduled on routine bases. Canteen area is very well cleaned.

reviews.review_heading: Our college has good infrastructure, placements and faculty members.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is good here, and the campus is constructed properly for students. There is a Wi-Fi facility on the campus and proper facilities for studying. The quality of the food served is also good, and the medical facilities are not very good and just fine. Games are conducted properly from time to time.

reviews.review_heading: You will have good faculty members and decent campus life.
reviews.review_text: Facilities and infrastructure available here are quite decent. There is a proper Wi-Fi facility for us. There are good classrooms with proper chairs and air-conditioners as well. Canteens are very small and don't contain many food items. There are no medical facilities.

reviews.review_heading: The college has good infrastructure and faculty.
reviews.review_text: Neither hostel facility is available, nor medical facilities. The campus is air-conditioned. The infrastructure of the college is good. Wi-Fi facility is available. There are lots of extracurricular activities like sports events, workshops and many more activities.

reviews.review_heading: I was absolutely satisfied with my choice of choosing this college of professional studies.
reviews.review_text: Jagran provides world-class infrastructure, along with all the labs, libraries, sports facilities and proper auditorium for presentations. They are designed as per future professional requirements. Jagran also encourages its students in various extracurricular activities for their overall development.

reviews.review_heading: Fully satisfactory campus.
reviews.review_text: Classroom is extremely good fully air-conditioned, it has fully Wi-Fi campus and have well-equipped computer lab for students and has a big play ground. Our college gives medical insurance for students, we have sports event. Canteen provided healthy and higenic food.

reviews.review_heading: The college has good environment and infrastructure.
reviews.review_text: The campus is Wi-Fi enabled. Medical facilities are available. Various sports and games facilities are available. The infrastructure of our college is very good. It has air-conditioned classrooms. The faculty are very supportive. It is a good place to study. The college environment is very good. The campus is green and clean. It has good safety measures. A canteen is also available in our college.

reviews.review_heading: Our college has a really good infrastructure and facilities, way of teaching, etc.
reviews.review_text: Facilities available on the campus are good. There are Wi-Fi facility, labs, air-conditioned classrooms, a library, a sports room, etc. The quality of the food available in the canteen is fresh and healthy. I didn't face any infrastructure-related issue during my tenure at the institute.

reviews.review_heading: My review of this college.
reviews.review_text: Computer lab is good for understanding those things by yourself. Hostel facility was good, also they were available at a reasonable price. Mess food quality was too good, and there are also separate as well as shared rooms available in the hostel.

placements.overview: Bhai Parmanand DSEU Shakarpur Campus - II is an institute. Bhai Parmanand DSEU Shakarpur Campus - II is approved by AICTE and offers a total of 7 courses at UG and PG levels. Furthermore, it offer courses such as B.E. / B.Tech, MBA/PGDM, B.Sc., MCA and BBA in Full Time mode. Bhai Parmanand DSEU Shakarpur Campus - II fee structure includes a total tuition fee ranging from INR 1,72,500 to 2,88,000. Bhai Parmanand DSEU Shakarpur Campus - II has an annual seat intake of 460 for all the programmes. It offers courses, in streams such as Engineering, Business & Management Studies, IT & Software and Banking, Finance & Insurance. The institute has a safe and well-equipped campus with all the advanced facilities.

faqs.answer: A:    Bhai Parmanand DSEU Shakarpur Campus - II has below criteria for taking admissions to it's various courses: CoursesEligibilityBBACandidates must have studied Mathematics as a subject and secured 60% marks in the subject as well.B.Sc.Candidates who have a minimum of 70% marks in Mathematics in 10+2 or equivalent are also eligible to apply.MCACandidates passed graduation from recognised university or institution are eligible to apply.UG DiplomaCandidate must have passed 10+2 examination from a recognised board.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence - Batch of 2028
reviews_list.review_title: This is the first batch for CSE students, and the infrastructure is good.

review_content.Placements: This is the first batch of AI/ML here. Around 120 students have been placed in this batch. Top recruiting companies include TCS, Amazon, and Microsoft. In my opinion, this batch is doing well, and the minimum placement from this batch should be around 8 to 9 lakhs, while the maximum could be anything.
review_content.Infrastructure: Everything is new and in good condition. Faculty members are strict about maintaining a clean and good infrastructure. Any college-related issues are resolved within 2 to 3 working days; you just need to write a letter to the head. After all, the college is good.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Sc. in Data Analytics - Batch of 2025
reviews_list.review_title: Take admission if we have no other choice.

review_content.Placements: There are 50 students in my B.Sc data analytics branch, only 10 students are placed for the internships. The effort of placement is very disappointing. We even cannot take the job of core subject because college only call sales jobs and the call center jobs.
review_content.Infrastructure: Our college campus is very small, even we do not have college life here. Campus is very small and does not have a canteen facility. If we are a sports person and want a field to play then do not take admission here. Infrastructure is very low, and college does not have any sports also.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence - Batch of 2028
reviews_list.review_title: Campus is small but the infrastructure is top notch.

review_content.Placements: In my college, the course of B.Tech. is taken in 2024, so no one batch is passed out yet. only my batch will be the first that passes out firstly in 2028. That's why I am not giving any stars. I'll update my review when I'll get information about the package and programming and other things that never happened.
review_content.Infrastructure: Infrastructure and facilities are good, and the building is new; that's why everything is good. On the other hand, the lab and library are fully air-conditioned, and all books are available. Sports ground isn't available, but the tournament is held in a stadium between other campuses of DSEU.

reviews_list.batch_info: BBA in Banking, Financial Service and Insurance - Batch of 2025
reviews_list.review_title: Strong Industry Focus and Vibrant Campus Life at Bhai Parmanand Institute of Business Studies.

review_content.Placements: For the students belonging to my batch of Bhai Parmanand Institute of Business Studies, 75% of the students got placed. The highest package offered was INR 7 LPA, while the lowest was INR 3 LPA, and the average was INR 4 LPA. Some of the leading recruiters were HDFC, ICICI, and TCS. All in all, approximately 80% of the student population was placed in internships, some of which are with Bajaj Capital and HDFC, with most of the positions taken being finance, marketing, and analysis.
review_content.Infrastructure: The facilities that I will be making use of for my course at Bhai Parmanand Institute of Business Studies include a modern classroom, a computer laboratory equipped with the latest technology, an internet connection, and a library. At the moment, hostel facilities are not available.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Sc. in Data Analytics - Batch of 2025
reviews_list.review_title: College review of Bhai Parmanand DSEU Shakarpur Campus - II.

review_content.Placements: Our college does not provide us with internships; we have to find them ourselves. DSEU has collaborated with many companies, but they didn't come to hire students for internships or placements. About 8 to 10 students get placed every year out of 120 students.
review_content.Infrastructure: At my college, there is less infrastructure. There is no computer lab, no Wi-Fi connection, no AC and limited classrooms. There are no hostels or good canteens in my college, and there are limited food options. There are also no medical, sports, or recreation facilities.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Sc. in Data Analytics - Batch of 2024
reviews_list.review_title: The reality of data analytics in DSEU.

review_content.Placements: Since last semester, students have become eligible for campus placements. Average of about 5-7 companies visited & 50 offers made. The highest package is 5 LPA, and the average package is 3 LPA. Approximately 35–40% of students get placed. A company named 99 Acres offers a post of data analyst for an internship. The stipend offered by the company is 15,000 per month. At the internship, there are projects focused on Excel and CRM. But I suggest you get an internship on your own.
review_content.Infrastructure: The average campus area of the college is very small. The class and labs are well maintained by the staff. There are no hostels or PGs provided by the university. The bad aspects are that the campus is small and there is no support if you have an interest in sports or ECAs. In DSEU, you will get a proper environment for studying. There is a shortage of canteen availability on campus.

hostel_campus.college_name: Bhai Parmanand DSEU Shakarpur Campus - II Infrastructure Details & Reviews

reviews.review_heading: This is the first batch for CSE students, and the infrastructure is good.
reviews.review_text: Everything is new and in good condition. Faculty members are strict about maintaining a clean and good infrastructure. Any college-related issues are resolved within 2 to 3 working days; you just need to write a letter to the head. After all, the college is good.

reviews.review_heading: Take admission if we have no other choice.
reviews.review_text: Our college campus is very small, even we do not have college life here. Campus is very small and does not have a canteen facility. If we are a sports person and want a field to play then do not take admission here. Infrastructure is very low, and college does not have any sports also.

reviews.review_heading: Campus is small but the infrastructure is top notch.
reviews.review_text:
Infrastructure and facilities are good, and the building is new; that's why everything is good.
On the other hand, the lab and library are fully air-conditioned, and all books are available.
Sports ground isn't available, but the tournament is held in a stadium between other campuses of DSEU.

reviews.review_heading: Strong Industry Focus and Vibrant Campus Life at Bhai Parmanand Institute of Business Studies.
reviews.review_text: The facilities that I will be making use of for my course at Bhai Parmanand Institute of Business Studies include a modern classroom, a computer laboratory equipped with the latest technology, an internet connection, and a library. At the moment, hostel facilities are not available.

reviews.review_heading: College review of Bhai Parmanand DSEU Shakarpur Campus - II.
reviews.review_text: At my college, there is less infrastructure. There is no computer lab, no Wi-Fi connection, no AC and limited classrooms. There are no hostels or good canteens in my college, and there are limited food options. There are also no medical, sports, or recreation facilities.

reviews.review_heading: The reality of data analytics in DSEU.
reviews.review_text: The average campus area of the college is very small. The class and labs are well maintained by the staff. There are no hostels or PGs provided by the university. The bad aspects are that the campus is small and there is no support if you have an interest in sports or ECAs. In DSEU, you will get a proper environment for studying. There is a shortage of canteen availability on campus.

reviews.review_heading: Low infrastructure, low college culture, good faculty and courses, and average placements.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure was average the college building was not that good the classrooms doesn't have AC's. However, the libraries were good with AC and Wi-Fi and the classrooms also had Wi-Fi for students and projectors. The hostel was not available in our college.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Bhai Parmanand DSEU Shakarpur Campus - II.
reviews.review_text: In our college, no wi-fi facilities are available. There is library but not all books are available. The canteen is also closed now. Labs are there but not accessible to all. If I talk about sports, then I say no sports are there; you have to bring your own equipment to play, like badminton, and the ground is also too small.

reviews.review_heading: Overall, the college is good, and the faculty is also very good.
reviews.review_text: Currently, our college doesn't provide any hostel or PG accommodation, but hostels are planned for the future. The infrastructure facilities are very good, with filtered drinking water, a library with a huge amount of books of different types, Wi-Fi, etc.

reviews.review_heading: Comprehensive insights : my college experience.
reviews.review_text: The ShakurPur campus feels rather small and reminisces of a school setting; however, it's worth nothing that the main campus in Dwarka hosts most of the festivals. Despite its size, the library impressed with its collection of books, albeit limited due to space constraints.

reviews.review_heading: Absolutely dissatisfied because of fest, infrastructure, and facilities.
reviews.review_text:
At my college, there is less infrastructure. There is no computer lab, no Wi-Fi connection, no AC, no projectors and limited classrooms.
There are no hostels or good canteens in my college, and there are limited food options. There are also no medical, sports, or recreation facilities.

reviews.review_heading: It is a good college with excellent teachers.
reviews.review_text: Our college provides good infrastructure. Wi-Fi is available throughout the campus. Computer labs are good. A library is available. Air-conditioners are not available in classrooms. It is very difficult to go to college in the summer.

reviews.review_heading: Everything is good in our college.
reviews.review_text: Hostel facilities are not provided in our college, and its area is small. Its infrastructure is average. Washrooms are clean but have a shortage of water. Air-conditioners are not provided in all the classrooms.

reviews.review_heading: College where you need to do hard work.
reviews.review_text: Yes Wi-Fi is on for all the students, faculty regarding canteen, it is also good and most importantly in the whole campus there is cleanliness which is quite nice. For now there is no hostel facilities available in this campus of DSEU, but we can hope in near fuit is available.

reviews.review_heading: Overall, a good college with lack of space.
reviews.review_text: The classrooms are clean and tidy, with all the facilities. The only thing missing from our college is air conditioners. The college also has a new building, which is currently under construction. Once that is completed, the AC problem will be solved. Hostels are not available.

review_summarisation.heading: What students say about Bhai Parmanand DSEU Shakarpur Campus - II

likes.text: Top-recruiting companies like Coca Cola, Amazon, Flipkart, HDFC, SBI Insurance and many more visit the campus.

likes.text: The Wi-Fi is available but only for staff, the classrooms are good, lots of books are available in the library, facilities are good and food items are also good.

likes.text: They are always ready to help students, and their teaching quality is good.

individual_reviews.title: Absolutely the best college ever because they have internships to gain practical knowledge.

content.Placements: Placements are given based on internship performance. The average package is 3 LPA. Placements are mainly given in freight forwarding or logistics companies. 80 to 90% of students get the best placements. The role offered in placement is executive responsibility.

Also, field visits are also organised by the college to ports, warehouse manufacturers' unit, etc.

Recruiting companies are Asian Paints, Nerolac, and Berger. 100% of students got internships in 3rd sem for 3 months and in 6th sem for 3 months.

admission_overview.college_name: Garware Institute of Career Education and Development Admission 2025: Eligibility, Application Process, Fee, Dates

admission_process.title: Garware Institute of Career Education and Development Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: Garware Institute of Career Education and Development (GICED) was established in 1981 and is affiliated to the University of Mumbai. The institute offers a cluster of courses in diversified fields of study at UG, PG and Diploma level. The admission to the Bachelor of Sports Management (BSM) and Masters of Sports Management (MSM) are based on the score of Sports Management Admission Test (SMAT). Candidates willing to take admission to the GICED can apply online on the official website of the university.

The admission to Garware Institute of Career Education and Development is conducted online through the official website of the institute. The admission to all the programmes is based on the candidate’s score in the written entrance test conducted by the institute. After qualifying the entrance exam, candidates need to appear in the GD and PI round of admission. Shortlisted candidates will get admission to the institute.

Many top recruiters , such as TCS, Thomas Cook, Infosys, Wipro, etc. visited the campus. Furthermore, the average and lowest packages stood at INR 5 LPA and INR 3 LPA , respectively.

faqs.question: Are MBA placements at Garware Institute of Career Education and Development good?
faqs.answer: Placement Experience: Yes, we had internship and placements during our course. In fact, the second semester was solely assessed on our 3-month internship experience. The assessment form was filled by our department managers where we did our internship. Regarding campus placement, at out time all major companies and MNCs of travel industry such as Thomas Cook, SOTC, Kesari had conducted interviews and selected Freshers for their companies. During our batch, only one girl was not able to get placement, rest all got jobs through campus placement.

hostel_campus.college_name: Garware Institute of Career Education and Development Infrastructure Details & Reviews

labs.description: Available Facilities: Computer Lab, Pollution Control Lab, Jewelry Lab

reviews.review_heading: Absolutely the best college ever because they have internships to gain practical knowledge.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi, labs, and classrooms are best and campus of college is also well maintained. Facilities provided by the college are best quality, and education is given in the form of practical knowledge. Also, field visits are also organised by the college to ports, warehouse manufacturers' unit, etc.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Garware Institute of Career Education and Development.
reviews.review_text:
We have a separate paint lab where we test and make paints and see certain parameters for manufacturing paints. We don't have a hostel specific to our college but there are hostels of Mumbai University. The food quality is very good and at a moderate price. We have a hospital in university and we get medical facilities free by showing a college ID card. 
There are events conducted not daily but 3 or 4 in a year.

reviews.review_heading: The course does have an elevating impact on our professional life.
reviews.review_text: GICED's infrastructure reflects a blend of tradition and modernity. While some facilities are well maintained, there's room for improvement in terms of upgrading technology, expanding resources, and enhancing overall accessibility to create an optimal learning environment.

reviews.review_heading: Best Place to Learn. Career will be good if you study here.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure is good. Canteen food is also good. College is surrounded by garden. Labs are also good. If anyone misses the practicals, they can repeat it. IT labs are also available. Good library with enough reference books is available.

reviews.review_heading: It has the best placements.
reviews.review_text: They don't have Wi-Fi for students. It is only for faculty members who work over there. It's great.

reviews.review_heading: GICED & BSS foundation both are doing a fantastic job in providing such good courses.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure was full of facilities provided by the college and also the food available was of good quality and hygiene was maintained. Sports, games and other curricular activities was arranged by the college in specific intervals which kept the students motivated and energetic during the course.

reviews.review_heading: I am highly satisfied with this college. They provide good placements and makes us industry ready.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is good. They have Wi-Fi, Labs, Classrooms and Library. They also have computer lab. They also have average canteen facility. So I think they need to work on canteen facility. Classroom is very spacious. They also need to work on Wi-Fi facility. Sometimes Wi-Fi does not work properly.

reviews.review_heading: Garware Institute is one of the best institutions in Mumbai.
reviews.review_text: BMS in travel and tourism management is a 3-year full-time course. It has 6 semesters. We have a computer lab, classrooms with good seating arrangements and a library too. Garware has its own canteen, and the food is fresh and delicious. One can peacefully sit over there and enjoy their food.

reviews.review_heading: The institute is one of the best institutes in India, in terms of career.
reviews.review_text: The library and the paint lab are having good facilities, and the quality of the lab is good. The lab has the facilities of paint booth for painting objects or components, and the testing equipment which is generally used for after painting test and raw test painting. The campus canteen facilities are also very good.

reviews.review_heading: Excellent and bravo industry, but you must have patience.
reviews.review_text: The institute is well developed. The canteen is good. There are no air-conditioners in every classroom, but they are good. It also has audio room. The computer labs are also there as well as the library is big. As well as every classroom has projectors and faculty is also very good and experienced in the field.

reviews.review_heading: Mixed Bag: Excellent Facilities, Poor Faculty Despite Strong Placement Record.
reviews.review_text: High-speed Wi-Fi access throughout the building, well-equipped specialized labs for hands-on learning, modern classrooms with audio-visual aids, and a well-stocked library offering a diverse collection of relevant textbooks, journals, and digital resources.

reviews.review_heading: Mumbai University is great to study.
reviews.review_text: Mumbai University infrastructure is quite impressive. The university has two campuses: the Kalina Campus and the Fort Campus. The Kalina Campus is the main campus and spans over 230 acres, boasting modern infrastructure, including state-of-the-art laboratories, libraries, and computer centers .

reviews.review_heading: Highly dissatisfied because of faculty, but placements opportunities are good.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure is been overlooked by staff and college. There are no proper benches. Lab facilities and libraries need to be developed. Medical facilities are good that I can guarantee. Food is average but the canteen food is good.

reviews.review_heading: All about MUMBAI UNIVERSITY.
reviews.review_text: Mumbai University infrastructure is the topclass infrastructure and they provide hostels, playground, for the students to get rid of the stress and anxiety you'll get the opportunity for best games and other facilities. You can play many games and participate in the games as well.

reviews.review_heading: Absolutely satisfied with the course exams and placement and all it's amazing.
reviews.review_text: Classrooms are amazing and they do have big space to do studies near university. Labs and other facilities are also available for other courses which is essential and everything is perfect and faculty members are also helpful they do help us in studies and cooperative tooLabs and other facilities are also available for other courses which is essential and everything is perfect and faculty members are also helpful they do help us in studies and cooperative too.

The TG ICET 2026 registration process has started for admission to MBA and MCA courses. Students will be able to register themselves till Mar 16, 2026, without a late fee. The exam will be conducted on May 13 and May 14, 2026.

Below are a few more updates related to the Sree Chaitanya College of Engineering:

student_insights.feedback: Students can work with faculty on research projects
Offered in the final year only
Many students looking for better jobs
Students are expected to reach out to companies themselves
Strong alumni network that help with placement opportunities
Very Active and resourceful, college is also involved

faqs.answer:
A:    Sree Chaitanya College of Engineering has below criteria for taking admissions to it's various courses: CoursesEligibilityMBA/PGDMCandidate must have passed Bachelor Degree (BA / B.Com/ B.Sc/ BBA / BBM / BCA / BE / B.Tech / B. Pharmacy / Any 3 or 4 year Degree except Oriental Languages). Examinations of minimum three years duration with at least 50% marks (45% marks in case of reserved categories) in the qualifying examinations.
Final year appearing students may also apply on provisional basis.
The minimum age of the candidates should be 19 years as on the date of notification (Candidates whose date of Birth up to 30th MARCH,  2003). No maximum age limit.B.E. / B.TechCandidates who have passed or appeared at the final year of the Diploma examination in Engineering conducted by the State Board of Technical Education and Training, Telangana / Andhra Pradesh or any other examination recognised as equivalent thereto by the State Board of Technical Education and Training, Telangana / Andhra Pradesh.
Candidates should have completed 16 years of age, as on 31st December of the year of admission. There is no upper age limit.MCACandidate must have passed the qualifying examination with Mathematics at 10+2 level or at Graduation level.
