reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering - Batch of 2028
reviews_list.review_title: Heartily satisfied with taking admission in this college.

review_content.Placements: A minimum of 70% of students are placed in campus placements. The highest package is 12 LPA, and the lowest is 4 LPA. The top companies are IBM, TCS, and Wipro. 50 to 70% students got internships from the ECE course in TCS, like companies, Frontend Engineers, and developers, like roles offered.
review_content.Infrastructure: There are separate labs for every subject and a huge central library with a full stock of all books, including newspapers and other books, and every classroom has one projector for digital classes. There is a fully hygienic canteen and mess for the college hostel with good food. In case of emergency, they will take us to the hospital, especially. Our college provides insurance to students.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering - Batch of 2025
reviews_list.review_title: Overall, the college is good for studying, it also teaches life stability.

review_content.Placements: Around 10% of students from our course are placed. The highest package offered is ₹2 LPA, and the lowest is ₹1.5 LPA, with the average being around ₹1.7 LPA. Top roles offered included Production and Quality Control. The companies that visited the campus were mostly small firms like Prathiraj Mental Masters. Internship opportunities were limited, with very few students receiving offers from local industries.
review_content.Infrastructure: Overall infrastructure is average. Labs and classrooms are basic but functional. Library facilities are available, but students need to pay additional charges for access. The college is for day scholars only, so there are no hostel or mess facilities. Students bring their own food, and there are no major sports or medical facilities provided on campus.

overview_faqs.question: Can Sree Chaitanya College of Engineering be considered as a reputed Institute?
overview_faqs.answer: The flagship courses offered at Sree Chaitanya College of Engineering are MBA/PGDM, B.Tech, MCA. The Institute has experienced faculty offering the best education to students. On the basis of Shiksha verified reviews, Sree Chaitanya College of Engineering has a rating of 4 by students. The college's campuslife, placements, faculty and Infrastructure has been rated as 4, 3.7, 4.2 and 3.9 as per reviews by students.

review_summary.college_name: Sree Chaitanya College of Engineering Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: Nothing to say good and nothing to say bad compared to the local college.

content.Placements: I belong to the CSE batch of Sree Chaitanya College of Engineering. Around 40-60% students are placed. The highest package is about 10 LPA, and the average is 3-4 LPA. Top recruiters included TCS, Wipro, and Infosys. Roles offered are software engineer and IT support.
content.Infrastructure: The department has good labs, Wi-Fi, spacious classrooms, and a decent library. Hostel rooms are adequate, the mess food is average, and the canteen offers basic meals. Medical facilities are available. Sports options are limited but functional, and they conduct sports week.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering - Batch of 2025
individual_reviews.title: College has excellent faculty and curriculum. But placements and facilities need improvement.

content.Placements: Around 10% of students from our course are placed. The highest package offered is 2 LPA, the lowest is 1.5 LPA, and the average remained around 1.7 LPA. Top roles offered include production and quality control. Companies that visit the campus are mostly small firms like Prathiraj Mental Masters. Internship opportunities are limited, with a very few students receiving offers from local industries.
content.Infrastructure: Overall infrastructure is average. Labs and classrooms are basic but functional. Library facilities are available, but students need to pay additional charges for access. College is for day scholars only, so there is no hostel or mess facility. Students bring their own food. There are no major sports or medical facilities provided on campus.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: Heartily satisfied with taking admission in this college.

content.Placements: A minimum of 70% of students are placed in campus placements. The highest package is 12 LPA, and the lowest is 4 LPA. The top companies are IBM, TCS, and Wipro. 50 to 70% students got internships from the ECE course in TCS, like companies, Frontend Engineers, and developers, like roles offered.
content.Infrastructure: There are separate labs for every subject and a huge central library with a full stock of all books, including newspapers and other books, and every classroom has one projector for digital classes. There is a fully hygienic canteen and mess for the college hostel with good food. In case of emergency, they will take us to the hospital, especially. Our college provides insurance to students.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering - Batch of 2025
individual_reviews.title: Overall, the college is good for studying, it also teaches life stability.

content.Placements: Around 10% of students from our course are placed. The highest package offered is ₹2 LPA, and the lowest is ₹1.5 LPA, with the average being around ₹1.7 LPA. Top roles offered included Production and Quality Control. The companies that visited the campus were mostly small firms like Prathiraj Mental Masters. Internship opportunities were limited, with very few students receiving offers from local industries.
content.Infrastructure: Overall infrastructure is average. Labs and classrooms are basic but functional. Library facilities are available, but students need to pay additional charges for access. The college is for day scholars only, so there are no hostel or mess facilities. Students bring their own food, and there are no major sports or medical facilities provided on campus.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: Decent infrastructure, average faculty members, but strong placement opportunities.

content.Placements: The Electronics and Communication Engineering (ECE) department at Sri Chaitanya College of Engineering has a placement rate of around 20% to 25%. The highest salary package offered is 8 LPA. The lowest salary package offered is 1.5 LPA. The average salary package offered is 2.4 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Radiant, Wipro, Tech Mahindra, and Qualcomm. Roles offered are software designer and others. While specific data on internships is not available. This college encourages students to gain practical experience through internships. The placement cell continues to work towards enhancing opportunities for students.

description: Sree Chaitanya College of Engineering cutoff 2025 has been released for admission to MBA and MCA programmes via the TSI ICET entrance examination result. Students should scroll down to this page to know the round, category, and year-wise cutoff for TSI ICET and other accepted exams. Refer to the pointers below for more updates:

Sree Chaitanya College of Engineering TSICET cutoff 2025 concluded with the cutoff release for all rounds and categories belonging to the AI and HS quotas. Among the General category students under the Home State quota, the cutoff for MBA in the last round was 33716. In comparison, with the OBC HS quota, the MBA programme last round cutoff rank was 54614, suggesting that the competition for General HS is higher than the OBC HS category.

The Sree Chaitanya College of Engineering MBA cutoff 2025 for the General HS category in the last round was 33716. In contrast, the cutoff in 2024 was 41116, and the 2023 cutoff was 31935 for the aforementioned course and category. According to this data, we can say that the competition for MBA has been fluctuating in the last 3 years.
Check the table below to know the year, round, category and quota-wise cutoff.

Sree Chaitanya College of Engineering TSICET Cutoff 2025 has been published for all rounds and categories belonging to the AI and HS quotas. Students who want to appear for the TSICET entrance exam to gain admission to the MBA and MCA courses can refer to the table below to know the important dates for the upcoming admission year.

Telangana Council of Higher Education conducts the TS ICET entrance exam annually for admission to the MBA and MCA. Students can refer to the table below to download the consolidated PDFs for 2025, 2024, and 2023.

For B.E. / B.Tech admission, the top three most competitive branches were B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering, B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering and B.Tech. in Computer Science and Design, with competitive TS EAMCET last round cutoff ranks of 77059, 83921 and 88031, respectively. These ranks are valid for the students belonging to the General HS quota.

hostel.description: Separate hostel for both boys and girls with 100 and 96 rooms respectively. Hostel rooms have all the necessary facilities which include mattress, almirah, table and chair. Free medical check-ups and diagnostic check ups are organized.

Separate hostel for both boys and girls with 100 and 96 rooms respectively. Hostel rooms have all the necessary facilities which include mattress, almirah, table and chair. Free medical check-ups and diagnostic check ups are organized.

reviews.review_heading: Nothing to say good and nothing to say bad compared to the local college.
reviews.review_text: The department has good labs, Wi-Fi, spacious classrooms, and a decent library. Hostel rooms are adequate, the mess food is average, and the canteen offers basic meals. Medical facilities are available. Sports options are limited but functional, and they conduct sports week.

reviews.review_heading: College has excellent faculty and curriculum. But placements and facilities need improvement.
reviews.review_text: Overall infrastructure is average. Labs and classrooms are basic but functional. Library facilities are available, but students need to pay additional charges for access. College is for day scholars only, so there is no hostel or mess facility. Students bring their own food. There are no major sports or medical facilities provided on campus.

reviews.review_heading: Heartily satisfied with taking admission in this college.
reviews.review_text:
There are separate labs for every subject and a huge central library with a full stock of all books, including newspapers and other books, and every classroom has one projector for digital classes. There is a fully hygienic canteen and mess for the college hostel with good food. In case of emergency, they will take us to the hospital, especially. Our college 
provides insurance to students.

reviews.review_heading: Overall, the college is good for studying, it also teaches life stability.
reviews.review_text: Overall infrastructure is average. Labs and classrooms are basic but functional. Library facilities are available, but students need to pay additional charges for access. The college is for day scholars only, so there are no hostel or mess facilities. Students bring their own food, and there are no major sports or medical facilities provided on campus.

reviews.review_heading: Decent infrastructure, average faculty members, but strong placement opportunities.
reviews.review_text: Our college consists of so many labs mentioned in the syllabus for students. The labs are neatly maintained and the classrooms are also very well. We have sufficient library and daycare center for girls to take rest. It also has seminar halls, playground, auditorium, examination branch center, book store, canteen, etc. Hostels are also good and the food in hostel is average. The canteen food is sometimes good as every time we eat. Our college also conducts sports and has a big playground.

reviews.review_heading: Nice college to learn and experience things in a practical way.
reviews.review_text: Our college has Wi-Fi connection. Labs are present for every practical-related subject. Classrooms were good enough. The library is also present, consisting of numerous books written by different authors. Sports and games were conducted once a year. The canteen is present in our college.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied with our college, teachers, infrastructure, etc.
reviews.review_text: The facilities are very good. They explain every problem very detailly. The labs are very good. The infrastructure of the college is very good. They encourage sports every year. They provide us with very fresh food on time. The facilities are very good in our hostel.

reviews.review_heading: Sree Chaitanya College of Engineering.
reviews.review_text: SCCE offers well-equipped labs, efficient classrooms, a digital library, and seminar halls. Hostels are decent with clean rooms, basic amenities, and medical care. Mess food is average. Sports include cricket, volleyball, and indoor games for recreation.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Sree Chaitanya College of Engineering.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of the course is very good. The course is divided into 8 semesters in 4 years for regular students and 6 semesters in 3 years for lateral entry students. The syllabus is allotted for the required of the course. In the final year, there are 2 projects we have to do.

reviews.review_heading: Review of SCCE (Sree Chaitanya College of Engineering) .
reviews.review_text: College infrastructure includes many things, such as classrooms and labs and Wi-Fi facilities are very secure by the respective departments. There is no hostility on the campus. But there are private hostels around the campus with well-equipped facilities. Canteens on campus are very good.

reviews.review_heading: The overall college is good and great value for money.
reviews.review_text: The facilities towards my course are good, but some changes are also needed. Labs are okay, and classrooms are very good; however, the library is not that appreciated. The hostel facility is good, and other private hostels are also available around the college. As for sports and games, there is a conducting of sports every year.

reviews.review_heading: I am very much satisfied because of the faculty, good placements, and good infrastructure.
reviews.review_text: The facilities available in my course are: the WIFI availability in labs is good for working; the classrooms are neat and clean; and all types of books are available in the library. The food in the mess and canteen is average and the medical facilities are good enough because the pharmacy course is available on our campus. And the sports and games are played in the institution yearly by competition between the branches of students.

reviews.review_heading: I am very satisfied because of the faculty, good placements, and excellent infrastructure.
reviews.review_text: The facilities and infrastructure available in my course are satisfactory. Wi-Fi availability in the labs is good for working, and the classrooms are neat and clean. All types of books are available in the library. The food in the mess and canteen is average. Medical facilities are good enough due to the pharmacy course available in our institution. Sports and games are played yearly through competitions between student branches.

reviews.review_heading: Dissatisfied because of placements and faculty.
reviews.review_text: Facilities and infrastructure in my college are good, and classrooms are very neat. The college is good. The library is there in my college, which has all departments' books. Labs are also very neat. In the hostel, food is acceptable. Sometimes the food quality is not good. The canteen is there in the college. Sports and games are conducted every year.

reviews.review_heading: I am very much satisfied because of the faculty, good placements and good infrastructure.
reviews.review_text: The facilities and infrastructure available in my course are: the Wi-Fi availability in the labs is good for working, the classrooms are neat and clean and all types of books are available in the library. The food in the mess and canteen is average and the medical facilities are good enough because the pharmacy course is available in our institution. Sports and games are played annually by the competition between the branches of students.

Impact College Patna popular programmes are MBA and BCA. MBA students are provided 100% placement assistance. Those students who could not afford the fee can also apply for the scholarships provided by the college. MBA and BCA students are trained with the help of modern technology. MBA students are taught the communication, presentation, and various other skills. There are separate hostels available for the MBA and BCA students. The USPs of joining this college's popular programmes are mentioned below:
Below mentioned are some of the courses and their respective eligibility and fees:

The total fee includes various components such as admission fee, tuition fee, etc. Admission fee is paid only once in the start. Besides, the students also have to pay university registration of INR 4,000 and examination fee of INR 5,500 per semester, respectively.
faqs.question: What is the fee for MBA at Impact College, Patna?

review_summary.college_name: Impact College Patna Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA) - Batch of 2024
individual_reviews.title: Average college if any one want to take admission.

content.Placements: There are no placements for BCA students on campus. For other courses the highest off-campus placement salary is Rs 2 lakh. IT companies do not come to this college but there are some improvements.
content.Infrastructure: The college provided Wi-Fi and labs, although many of the computers were not working properly. The classrooms were good and the education provided was good as well.
content.Faculty: The classrooms were good and the education provided was good as well. Some teachers are helpful, well qualified and knowledgeable but many teachers are not good. The curriculum at this college just feels like a coaching class. It is not difficult and if we study well, we will get good marks in the semester.

individual_reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA) - Batch of 2022
individual_reviews.title: Our college provides satisfactory faculty members and placements.

content.Placements: 70-80% Students got placed from our course this year. The highest salary package offered differs every year, the average package offered is around 3-4LPA. Top roles offered to the students are graduate trainee, software developer, analysts, web designer & developer in several companies like Accenture, Tech mahindra, Wipro, Tata consultancy services, Infosys and many others.
content.Infrastructure: College infrastructure, mess, hostel, food are top-notch serving the best. Facilities provided by our college are excellent. The Wi-Fi speed and connectivity is also good. The library is huge and has every book a student needs. Classrooms are also well-equipped with projectors and all.

admission_process.title: Impact College Patna Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: Impact College Patna admissionsare merit-based. Candidates have to fulfil the eligibility requirements for admission to the college.Impact Collegeoffers courses at UG and PG levels in Law, Business and other fields. The programmes include BBA, BCom, BA LLB, etc. The college offers courses in affiliation withAryabhatta Knowledge University. Besides, the law courses are offered in affiliation withPatliputra University. Interested candidates can contact the admission office or fill out the enquiry form on the college's website for admission.

The college offers admission to courses based on merit of the candidates in the qualifying exam. Aspirants should meet the eligibility criteria specified by the college for admission. Below are some of theImpact College coursesalong with their eligibility and selection criteria:
Note:In the absence of information, the eligibility and selection criteria taken for all courses except BA LLB and BBA LLB, is generic.
Download:Impact College Law Courses
Impact College admission process includes registration, selection and admission confirmation. Aspirants have to follow the below steps to get a seat in the college:
Step 1:Candidates must fill out the admission enquiry form on the official website of the college or contact the admission team for the application form.
Step 2:The selection for all UG and PG courses is based on merit of the aspirants in the last qualifying exam.
Step 3:Once selected, the college informs the candidates about their admission. Shortlisted aspirants have to pay theImpact College feeto confirm their seat in the college.

courses_data.name: Impact College Patna BA LLB Admission 2025
courses_data.description: Impact College offers a five-year integrated BA LLB course at the UG level. The selection to the course is merit-based. Candidates who have passed Class 12 examination from any recognised board with a minimum of 45% aggregate are eligible to apply for BA LLB. There is a 5% relaxation in the aggregate for SC, ST or PH candidates.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology - Batch of 2026
individual_reviews.title: Review of Vikrant University.

content.Placements: I don't remember the exact number, but a lot of students from my batch have got placed, and the average package is Rs. 2.5 Lacs per annum. The highest package is around 8 to 10 Lacs per annum, and the average package is around 2.5 Lacs per annum. A lot of companies come, like Gal India Pvt. Ltd. and VPS Pvt. Ltd., etc. Around 25 to 30% of students got placed in my batch. They offer many roles like fire safety engineer, IT engineer, consultant, system engineer, etc.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure here is good, and the faculty is also fine. They mingle well with the students and are not pressurized too much. The faculty here is such that their method of studying is very different, and they teach very well. Every year, events and organizations like tournaments are organized here, in which anyone from the city can take part and win a lot of prizes.

For internships, 100% of students get an internship. Annual income is not good, but placement is good not any problem. If you are good in studies, you should take up placement .

They have all grounds.

admission_process.title: Vikrant University Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: Vikrant University admissionsare primarily entrance-based. Candidates can register online for admission to the course. The admission process at Vikrant University is below:-
Vikrant University Application Process 2025

The mode of application is online/offline. For UG and PG courses, candidates must visit the official website and for the PhD courses, students can either apply online or offline. The application fee for PhD course is INR 2,000. To apply offline for the PhD course, students must go to the institute campus. Candidates can fill out the application form on the university's official website.

The university accepts entrance exam scores such as GATE and JEE Main for admission to the MTech & BTech courses. For PhD course admission, candidates are selected based on in-house entrance exam scores, VU Research Aptitude Test followed by PI.
Merit List & Admission Confirmation

After the release of theVikrant University cutoff, it also releases a merit list based on the score of the candidates for admission. Shortlisted students need to come for document verification and pay theVikrant University feeto confirm their seats in the university.

faqs.question: How can I get admission to various courses at Vikrant University?
faqs.answer: Vikrant University admissions are entrance-based. The university considers national-level entrance exam scores for various course admission. The mode of application is online/offline. For UG and PG courses, candidates must visit the official website and for the PhD courses, aspirants can either apply online or offline. The application fee for PhD course is INR 2,000. To apply offline for the PhD course, students must visit the institute campus. Candidates can fill out the application form on the university's official website. Selected candidates must keep their educational documents ready for verification purposes.

faqs.question: Are admissions to various courses open at Vikrant University?
faqs.answer: Vikrant University admissions are currently open for various courses. The university offers courses such as BTech, BCA, MBA, M.Tech etc., at the UG and PG level. Apart from the UG and PG courses, the university also offers certificate, diploma, PhD and vocational courses. Vikrant University admission 2025 is entrance-based for PhD courses. However, candidates are selected based on merit for the rest of the course level, i.e., UG, PG, Certificate, Diploma and Vocational. Interested candidates who meet the eligibility criteria can fill out the form.

hostel_campus.college_name: Vikrant University Infrastructure Details & Reviews

reviews.review_heading: Review of Vikrant University.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure here is good, and the faculty is also fine. They mingle well with the students and are not pressurized too much. The faculty here is such that their method of studying is very different, and they teach very well. Every year, events and organizations like tournaments are organized here, in which anyone from the city can take part and win a lot of prizes.

reviews.review_heading: Yes, all are good for placement, and the overall experience is also good.
reviews.review_text: They don't have any hostel. All students take their own house rent. They have their own room and canteen. There are 3 canteen. They have an Amul canteen, but one canteen is not good. The other 2 are the best in food and food quality are best in our college in sport field, they are the best because they are the best. They have all grounds.

reviews.review_heading: Overall, I would like to say that this is one of the best colleges I have ever researched.
reviews.review_text: Our college provides library facilities. The environment of our college library is peaceful. Our provides Wi-Fi to improve the skills to study and grow to gain knowledge. Our classrooms are huge. Their environment is very friendly.

reviews.review_heading: A great infrastructure with facilities, but fell short of faculty and placments in 2023.
reviews.review_text: For a BBA course, facilities and infrastructure generally provide a conducive environment for both academic learning and extracurricular activities. Computer labs are equipped with business-related software and tools for data analysis. Smart classrooms are also available.

reviews.review_heading: I am living a very amazing college life at Vikrant University.
reviews.review_text: Facilities are well maintained and infrastructure is also good. All the necessary things are available, like: Wi-Fi, laboratories, cricket ground, classrooms, technical laboratories, and library. The canteen is average, but medical facilities, sports, and games are amazing.

reviews.review_heading: A step towards a bright future and career.
reviews.review_text:
The infrastructure of my college is so good. The environment, classrooms, computer lab, Science lab, and Wi-Fi facility are good. In my department, facilities are good.
Eight ceiling fans are in every classroom. The seating system is also good.
I have not used the hostel facilities, but the canteen is not very good and does not offer a wide variety of food. A medical facility is also on my campus, and it is good for emergency purposes. Sports and many games are also played on my campus.

reviews.review_heading: It is an excellent college with good facilities and motivated teachers.
reviews.review_text: Our college provides excellent facilities. The quality of food is good and healthy. Computer labs are good. Many books are available in the library. Games and sports teachers are available. Indoor and outdoor games are provided by this university. Medical facilities are available.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Vikrant University.
reviews.review_text: Our college has good infrastructure. Wi-Fi is available. Our classrooms are clean. There is a library and a canteen. There are 3-4 buildings, one for management, one for technical, and another for administration. There is sufficient space in classrooms to study.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Vikrant University.
reviews.review_text: The college is painted, so it looks good. A huge playground is available. Many games are played, like basketball, cricket, etc. There is a canteen, a washroom, and an excellent computer lab. We also have a library.

reviews.review_heading: It is an excellent university in the Gwalior region as well as in Madhya Pradesh.
reviews.review_text: Our college provides good facilities. Wi-Fi is available throughout the campus, like in libraries, labs, etc., The college is under CCTV surveillance. Our classrooms are good. The canteen is good.

reviews.review_heading: It is an excellent university in Gwalior.
reviews.review_text: There is a separate department for B.Tech. The campus is neat and clean. There are many classrooms. A canteen is available. The quality of food in the canteen is good. There are many labs, like chemistry, physics, mechanical labs, etc. Workshop facilities are available.

reviews.review_heading: It is the best university in Gwalior.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of our college is good. It has advanced labs for practical learning, a central library, an auditorium, sports grounds and facilities, drinking water, a canteen, etc. Classrooms are well-lighted and spacious.

reviews.review_heading: Our college provides good atmosphere for education.
reviews.review_text: Library of our college is good. Canteen is available. There are good classrooms and medical facilities. Our college provides good sports teachers.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Vikrant Institute of Technology and Management, Gwalior.
reviews.review_text: The college infrastructure is good. The campus has a playground, where all the engineering and management students can play lots of sports. In my opinion, the infrastructure is good. There are several buildings for academics.

reviews.review_heading: It is the best college in Gwalior.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of our college is one of the best infrastructures in Gwalior city. It has free Wi-Fi, has a medium-size library which is also a digital library. Classroom of our college in just like as hall of a house, about 100-120 student can sit in one time.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech. in Civil Engineering - Batch of 2021
reviews_list.review_title: It is a very good college with affordable fee structure.

review_content.Placements: About 80% of the students are placed in our college. The highest salary package offered was 7 LPA in 2021, and the average salary package offered is about 3 LPA - 4 LPA. The lowest salary package offered is around 2.5 LPA. It is a good college with an affordable fees structure with a big campus. Recruiting companies are Campengini, TCS, ACC, etc.
review_content.Infrastructure: Facilities and services are good in college as they provide a very hygienic atmosphere. The mess and food are good and always fresh foods are served. On different days we have a different menu, and the quality of food is so good and tasty. Overall, the hostel is good.

reviews_list.review_title: I am glad to be a part of this college, and placements were great in the year 2014.

review_content.Placements: Almost 90% of students in our course got placed in a high profile company. The highest salary package offered is 5 LPA, and the lowest salary package offered is 2 LPA. description: Dr. Virendra Swarup Group of Institutions cutoff 2025 has been announced for admission to BTech programme for all categories and rounds in the both the All India and Home State quota. Students can scroll to the exam-wise sections below for details about Dr. Virendra Swarup Group of Institutions UPTAC Cutoff 2025 and other exams. A few more exam-related updates are in the pointers below:

The Dr. Virendra Swarup Group of Institutions cutoff 2024 was concluded for JEE Main with the release of the final cutoff list. The cutoff was released as the opening and closing ranks for admission to the BE/BTech, courses. During the Dr. Virendra Swarup Group of Institutions BE/BTech cutoff 2024, the last-round closing ranks ranged between 1132671 and 1247302 for the General AI category students. Of all the BE/BTech specialisations, the one that faced fierce competition was B.Tech. in Computer

The JEE Main cutoff 2024 was released for the General, OBC, ST, SC, EWS, and PWD categories in the AI quota. Considering the last round 2024 cutoff, B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering was the most sought-after BE/BTech specialization with a closing rank of 1132671 for the general AI quota. The closing cutoff for the same stood at 1042426 in 2023.

Dr. Virendra Swarup Group of Institutions accepts JEE Main scores, followed by JoSAA and CSAB counselling rounds for admission to BTech and Integrated BTech courses. Candidates seeking admission to Dr. Virendra Swarup Group of Institutions can refer to the table below for tentative JEE Main schedule.

Dr. Virendra Swarup Group of Institutions JEE Main cutoff 2024 is now over for BTech, Integrated BTech, and BArch courses. For JEE Main, a total of five counselling rounds were conducted. Additionally, two CSAB counselling rounds were also conducted to fill the vacant seats. Candidates can refer to the table below to download the consolidated year-wise counselling rounds for Dr. Virendra Swarup Group of Institutions.

As the Dr. Virendra Swarup Group of Institutions UPTAC Cutoff 2025 has been concluded for all rounds and categories under the AI and HS quota. Students can refer to the table below to find the Round 1 and Last Round closing cutoff ranks for admission to various B.E. / B.Tech specialisations available at Dr. Virendra Swarup Group of Institutions.
In this section, students can see UPTAC Cutoff 2025 for admission to various B.E. / B.Tech specialisations.

For 2025, in the last round, the top three most competitive specialisations for admission in the General AI category students were B.Tech. in Electrical Engineering, followed by B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering, and B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering, with the closing ranks of 1328957, 1808645 and 2115601, respectively.

For admission to Dr. Virendra Swarup Group of Institutions for B.E. / B.Tech students have to clear the UPTAC exam and attain valid ranks to qualify for a seat at this institute. Students can see the table below to know the important dates for admission to Dr. Virendra Swarup Group of Institutions.

Students who want to know the UPTAC Cutoff 2025 for various rounds can refer to the table below. Candidates also have the option to view the cutoff data for the previous two years, i.e., 2024 and 2023. These cutoff lists can also be downloaded for later use.

reviews.review_heading: It is the worst college with no proper management.
reviews.review_text: The academic building is good, but the infrastructure of the college is the worst. There is no Wi-Fi facility provided to the students. reviews.review_heading: Absolutely dissatisfied with the infrastructure, facilities and placements.
reviews.review_text: The college's infrastructure is barely satisfying the standards. Small campus, lack of proper furniture, lack of lab equipment, and lack of skilled teachers. However, the library provides all the necessary books for your course. But, no other useful book is in the library. The classrooms are cleaned once in a week. Sports and games are not seen often. No medical facilities. The canteen has quite tasteless food. The hostel rooms are small and dirty. The hostel is also vulnerable to monkey attacks...

reviews.review_heading: Absolutely satisfied because of faculty, good placements in 2016 and really good infrastructure.

My college has a free Wi-Fi campus. All types of labs with all instruments are available. There have two libraries and one medical room facility. 
There is a separate basketball ground and a big ground for cricket or football. There are two hostels are for living.

college_info.college_name: Aditya College of Engineering and Technology: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Reviews, Info

highlights.summary: Here are some additional updates regarding the Aditya College of Engineering and Technology:

placements.overview: UG Degree (4 year) : In year 2017-18, for 4 year UG Degree, a total of 602 students were admitted at Aditya College of Engineering and Technology and 720 completed their graduation in 2020-21. Out of 720 students 682 were placed with median salary of INR 385000 and 25 students opted for higher studies. A total of 499 students were admitted in year 2018-19 for 4 year UG degree at Aditya College of Engineering and Technologyand 690 completed their graduation in 2021-22. Out of 690 students 670 were placed with median salary of INR 395000 and 15 students opted for higher studies. PG Degree (2 year) : In year 2019-20, for 2 year PG Degree, a total of 130 students were admitted at Aditya College of Engineering and Technology and 98 completed their graduation in 2020-21. Out of 98 students 45 were placed with median salary of INR 325000 and 2 students opted for higher studies. A total of 150 students were admitted in year 2020-21 for 2 year PG degree at Aditya College of Engineering and Technologyand 110 completed their graduation in 2021-22. Out of 110 students 63 were placed with median salary of INR 336000 and 5 students opted for higher studies.

fees_and_eligibility.overview: Aditya College of Engineering and Technology offers diverse programmes at UG and PG levels in Full Time mode. The offered programmes can be chosen from streams such as Engineering, Business & Management Studies and IT & Software. At the UG level, candidates have the provision to opt from courses such as B.E. / B.Tech and BBA. Whereas, at PG level, Aditya College of Engineering and Technology offers courses such as M.E./M.Tech, MBA/PGDM and MCA. Aditya College of Engineering and Technology fee structure for all the courses is around INR 72,000 to 2,14,000.

faqs.answer: A:    Yes, it is possible at 60 and 70 percentiles in High School to get into Aditya College of Engineering. Candidates seeking admission in MBA or MCA courses through APICET should fulfill the following criteria: 1)Candidate should be an Indian National and should conform to the local/non-local status requirement as per government rule 2)Candidates should have passed a three-year Bachelors degree course in any stream with a minimum 50 per cent aggregate (SC, ST and BC with 45 per cent aggregate) from a recognised university3)Candidates in their final year of 3-year Bachelor's degree and awaiting results are also eligible to apply for APICET 2025 exam.
faqs.question: Can I get into Aditya College of Engineering if I have scored just 60% in 10th and 70% in 12th?

faqs.answer: A:    Aditya College of Engineering and Technology provides MBA and MCA programs based on APICET score. The Institute has released the APICET cutoff for Home State Categories, issued the Andhra Pradesh ICET cutoff in 2024. The Aditya College of Engineering and Technology cutoff 2024 for Master of Computer Applications (MCA) in 2024 was 17063, and for MBA in Retail Management, it was 41984 under the General Home State quota. So, based on the Aditya College of Engineering and Technology APICET cutoff 2024, we can conclude that in order to be admitted to the institute, aspirants must achieve a rank less than 30000 for MBA admissions in upcoming APICET admission sessions.
faqs.question: Why do you need to score less than 30000 rank in APICET to get into an Aditya College of Engineering and Technology?

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering - Batch of 2026
reviews_list.review_title: There are average placements for us.

review_content.Placements: For our batch, which is the 2026 batch, on average, till now, 20 to 30 percent of students have been placed. But many are not satisfied because most of the companies are non-IT companies, but students are expecting IT companies to get placed and show their skills. I don't remember the highest package, but the lowest is 2.5 LPA. We have only one top MNC company, which is Infosys.
review_content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure and facilities like labs, library and classrooms are good. I am not a hostel student, but what I know from my friends is that the hostel is good with healthy food and good security for girls. But there is no proper Wi-Fi in our college.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering - Batch of 2027
reviews_list.review_title: The college has good infrastructure and good faculty.

review_content.Placements: Batch 2019-2023, B.Tech ECE at Aditya College of Engineering and Technology, around 65% students placed. The highest package was 8 LPA, the lowest was 3 LPA, and the average was 4 LPA. TCS, Infosys, Wipro were the top recruiters. 40% of students got internships. Roles offered are Software Engineer and Analyst.
review_content.Infrastructure: Aditya College of Engineering and Technology has good Wi-Fi, well-equipped labs, smart classrooms, and a spacious library. Hostels are decent with average food quality. Medical facilities are basic. Sports grounds and indoor games are available and maintained reasonably well.

overview_faqs.question: Can Aditya College of Engineering and Technology be considered a good college?
overview_faqs.answer: Aditya College of Engineering and Technology is a reputed institute for MCA, BBA, MBA/PGDM, M.E./M.Tech, After 1th Diploma, B.Tech. Students can opt these programs to pursue their career in IT & Software, Business & Management Studies, Engineering. Institute has trained & experienced faculty who deliver these programs. Aditya College of Engineering and Technology has a review rating of 4.2 on the basis of reviews by students. In addition to this, it has been rated 4.5 on campuslife, 4 on placements, 4.3 on faculty and 4.4 on Infrastructure.

review_summary.college_name: Aditya College of Engineering and Technology Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: Best out of all colleges for placements.

content.Placements: 80 percent of students got placed in the best companies. The highest package is around 30 LPA. The lowest package is around 3 LPA. The average package is around 6 LPA-7 LPA. So many people are placed in an internship in their 3 year. They got an SDE and developer roles in top companies like Amazon, TCS, etc.
content.Infrastructure: The college is surrounded by greenery and spacious blocks with well-educated and trained faculty. We have so many labs with an AC facility, and the library is full of updated books and Wi-Fi facilities. In the library, we have reference rooms where we can take interviews, no one can enter the room.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: Review of Aditya College of Engineering and Technology.

content.Placements: 70 percent of students are studying in Aditya College of Engineering and Technology. The highest package offered in placements of Aditya College of Engineering and Technology is 8 LPA, and the lowest package is 2 LPA. The average package is 4 LPA. Wipro is one of the top recruiting companies in Aditya College. 70 percent of students get internships. Roles like software developer and technical work are offered here.
content.Infrastructure: Facilities available in Aditya College of Engineering and Technology hostel are very good and hygienic. Labs are very nice. The food in the canteen is very good and hygienic. Medical facilities are also available in the Aditya College.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering - Batch of 2026
individual_reviews.title: There are average placements for us.

content.Placements: For our batch, which is the 2026 batch, on average, till now, 20 to 30 percent of students have been placed. But many are not satisfied because most of the companies are non-IT companies, but students are expecting IT companies to get placed and show their skills. I don't remember the highest package, but the lowest is 2.5 LPA. We have only one top MNC company, which is Infosys.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure and facilities like labs, library and classrooms are good. I am not a hostel student, but what I know from my friends is that the hostel is good with healthy food and good security for girls. But there is no proper Wi-Fi in our college.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: The college has good infrastructure and good faculty.

content.Placements: Batch 2019-2023, B.Tech ECE at Aditya College of Engineering and Technology, around 65% students placed. The highest package was 8 LPA, the lowest was 3 LPA, and the average was 4 LPA. TCS, Infosys, Wipro were the top recruiters. 40% of students got internships. Roles offered are Software Engineer and Analyst.
content.Infrastructure: Aditya College of Engineering and Technology has good Wi-Fi, well-equipped labs, smart classrooms, and a spacious library. Hostels are decent with average food quality. Medical facilities are basic. Sports grounds and indoor games are available and maintained reasonably well.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: I recommend others to join this college.

content.Placements: I think 60% of my seniors are selected in campus placements. The highest package from my department is 35 LPA, and the lowest package is around 4-5 LPA, I guess. The top recruitment companies are Infosys & tech Mahindra. When it comes to internships, almost 80% students will get internships.
content.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure in my college are ok. Wi-Fi is available, but not useful for students. I mean, the internet is slow, and each department has its own separate library. When it comes to food, the hostel food is not up to mark (note: I'm not a hosteler but my friends told me the hostel food is bad) and the canteen food is good.

admission_process.title: Aditya College of Engineering and Technology Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: Aditya College of Engineering and Technology admissions are entrance-based. The institute accepts scores in JEE Main, GATE, and AP EAMCET, etc.Aditya College of Engineering and Technologyoffers courses at UG level in Engineering, Business and Management Studies and IT and Software stream. The institute offers B.E. / B.Tech for 4 years in various specialisations. Candidates can fill out the application form online for admission.

The total tuition fees for UG course isINR 80,000 - 2,14,000. Aspirants have to pay the programme fees at the time of admission to confirm their seat in the institute. The total fees may also include other components such as caution deposit, hostel fees, etc.

faqs.question: Why do you need to score less than 30000 rank in APICET to get into an Aditya College of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: Aditya College of Engineering and Technologyprovides MBA and MCA programs based on APICET score. The Institute has released the APICET cutoff for Home State Categories, issued the Andhra Pradesh ICET cutoff in 2024. TheAditya College of Engineering and Technology cutoff 2024for Master of Computer Applications (MCA) in 2024 was17063, and for MBA in Retail Management, it was41984under the General Home State quota. So, based on theAditya College of Engineering and Technology APICET cutoff 2024, we can conclude that in order to be admitted to the institute, aspirants must achieve a rank less than 30000 for MBA admissions in upcoming APICET admission sessions.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility to get admission in Aditya College of Engineering and Technology for UG/PG courses?
faqs.answer:
Aditya College of Engineering and Technology has below criteria for taking admissions to it's various courses:CoursesEligibilityMCACandidate must have passed Bachelor degree of 3/4 years duration with Mathematics as one of the subject at Intermediate or Degree level with above mentioned marks from any recognised University/Institute.
45% marks for BC categories.
Candidate who are appearing for the final year degree examination are also be eligible.
Degree obtained by Distance Mode Program should have recognition by Joint Committee of UGC, AICTE and DEC/DEB.

faqs.question: Can I get into Aditya College of Engineering if I have scored just 60% in 10th and 70% in 12th?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is possible at60and70percentiles in High School to get into Aditya College of Engineering. Candidates seeking admission in MBA or MCA courses through APICET should fulfill the following criteria:1)Candidate should be an Indian National and should conform to the local/non-local status requirement as per government rule 2)Candidates should have passed a three-year Bachelors degree course in any stream with a minimum 50 per cent aggregate (SC, ST and BC with 45 per cent aggregate) from a recognised university3)Candidates in their final year of 3-year Bachelor's degree and awaiting results are also eligible to apply for APICET 2025 exam.

faqs.question: How many seats are available for various courses offered at Aditya College of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: Courses offerred by Aditya College of Engineering and Technology are approved by eminent Government bodies like AICTE. The combined seats available for courses offered at Aditya College of Engineering and Technology goes up to 1386.

reviews.review_heading: Best out of all colleges for placements.
reviews.review_text: The college is surrounded by greenery and spacious blocks with well-educated and trained faculty. We have so many labs with an AC facility, and the library is full of updated books and Wi-Fi facilities. In the library, we have reference rooms where we can take interviews, no one can enter the room.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Aditya College of Engineering and Technology.
reviews.review_text: Facilities available in Aditya College of Engineering and Technology hostel are very good and hygienic. Labs are very nice. The food in the canteen is very good and hygienic. Medical facilities are also available in the Aditya College.

reviews.review_heading: There are average placements for us.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure and facilities like labs, library and classrooms are good. I am not a hostel student, but what I know from my friends is that the hostel is good with healthy food and good security for girls. But there is no proper Wi-Fi in our college.

reviews.review_heading: The college has good infrastructure and good faculty.
reviews.review_text: Aditya College of Engineering and Technology has good Wi-Fi, well-equipped labs, smart classrooms, and a spacious library. Hostels are decent with average food quality. Medical facilities are basic. Sports grounds and indoor games are available and maintained reasonably well.

reviews.review_heading: I recommend others to join this college.
reviews.review_text: The facilities and infrastructure in my college are ok. Wi-Fi is available, but not useful for students. I mean, the internet is slow, and each department has its own separate library. When it comes to food, the hostel food is not up to mark (note: I'm not a hosteler but my friends told me the hostel food is bad) and the canteen food is good.

reviews.review_heading: I am from ECE. This is an honest review of Aditya College of Engineering and Technology.
reviews.review_text: In my college, library facilities are very good, and every student has their own portal to see their details. Medical facilities are available, and when we have a health issue in my college, there is an Apollo facility. We have more canteens to eat food, and the building is also very good.

reviews.review_heading: Aditya College of Engineering and Technology review.
reviews.review_text: The facilities of Aditya College of engineering and Technology hostel is very good and hygiene and labs are very nice. The food in the canteen is very good and hygienic. Medical facilities are available.

reviews.review_heading: Overall review of the Aditya College, which is useful for new students.
reviews.review_text: Classrooms and premises are very neat and green. It has Wi-Fi facility, labs with a full structured system, and well-updated and functionalized systems. Hostels are available separately for both girls and boys with high security, good medical facilities, and extracurricular activities.

reviews.review_heading: Good college at a very low cost.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure is good but depends on blocks. New blocks are good but old blocks have old benches and poor interior, but exterior is good. Wi-Fi, labs and library also depends on blocks. Hostel is great with great facilities, safe for girl students and medical facilities we have Apollo.

reviews.review_heading: Good college with low cost but if you have money then it is not your level.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is good but depends on the blocks. Old blocks look good from outside, but the interior is bad with old benches and old classrooms. New blocks are great, with smart classes and good-looking infrastructure both outside and inside, with high-tech learning, full Wi-Fi, and AC facilities.

reviews.review_heading: Good satisfaction in studies, campus life, and placements.
reviews.review_text: Facilities are good enough. There are projectors, fans, and good benches. Labs are well-structured with good internet and systems. Wi-Fi is available for teachers only. Hostels are spacious with a luxurious setup for students, with a maximum of three students per room. Rooms have beds, electricity, hot water, and a good dining mess. Food quality is good. Medical facilities and an ambulance are available. Sports facilities include great grounds and courts. Events for sports and other activities c...

reviews.review_heading: College has positive academics with strong academics.
reviews.review_text: The department offers well-equipped classrooms with projectors, modern computer labs, high-speed Wi-Fi, and a library containing textbooks, reference materials, and e-resources. Hostel facilities are satisfactory. It provides clean rooms, safe drinking water, regular maintenance, and good security. The mess serves hygienic food with a balanced menu. The canteen offers affordable snacks. Medical facilities include a health centre with basic treatment and emergency support. Sports facilities such ...

reviews.review_heading: Aditya College of Engineering and Technology review.
reviews.review_text: The facilities of Aditya College of Engineering and Technology hostel are very good, and hygiene and labs are very nice. The food in the canteen is very good and hygienic. Medical facilities are available in the Aditya College of Engineering and Technology.

reviews.review_heading: In 2015, a maximum of 96 percent of students got placed.
reviews.review_text: Every facility includes a central library, classrooms, Wi-Fi, and professional labs with experienced faculty. In the hostel, there are sports and events twice a week, and our hostel canteen provides clean food with hygienic facilities and full Wi-Fi.

reviews.review_heading: Really good college, good campus placements, and also a good environment.
reviews.review_text: I am not a hostler, but my friends told me the mess food is good, but maybe the North Indians feel bad, because they are used to North Indian food. There are good labs, classrooms, and a good environment. They provide Wi-Fi in college, but it doesn't work properly, that's the main problem, I think, and also we don't get a mobile signal when we enter the college.

college_info.intro:
The flagship programmes offered at IAMR Group of Institutions include BBA and BCA. BBA is a three-year undergraduate degree program, with the major objective to incorporate training and practical experience in the form of case studies, presentations, internships, industrial visits, and interaction with seasoned industry professionals.
On the other hand, BCA course mainly comprise of subjects like the DBMS, Data Structure, Java, C Programming, Software engineering, Python and programming languages, Web designing, etc. Students can check the popular programmes offered at IAMR Group of Institutions in the table provided below:

overview_faqs.question: Is IAMR Group of Institutions a good college/Institute?
overview_faqs.answer: IAMR Group of Institutions is a reputed institute for MBA/PGDM, BBA, BCA, B.Sc., BPT, M.Sc., MPT, B.A., B.Ed. Students can opt these programs to pursue their career in Business & Management Studies, IT & Software, Science, Medicine & Health Sciences, Mass Communication & Media, Teaching & Education. Institute has trained & experienced faculty who deliver these programs. IAMR Group of Institutions has a review rating of 4.1 on the basis of reviews by students. In addition to this, it has been rated 4.2 on campuslife, 4.2 on placements, 3.8 on faculty and 4.3 on Infrastructure.

overview_faqs.question: Is IAMR Group of Institutions degree valid?
overview_faqs.answer: Yes, any degree obtained from IAMR Group of Institutions is valid and widely accepted across the country. The institution is recognised by AICTE, Bar Council of India, IAP, IIC Delhi, NCTE and UGC in addition to being affiliated to various universities, such as AKTU, CCSU, ABVMU, etc. Students can get all the latest information about the college's courses and their degrees by visiting the official website of the institution.

review_summary.college_name: IAMR Group of Institutions Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: B.Sc. (Hons.) in Biotechnology - Batch of 2026
individual_reviews.title: A campus of possibilities: My experience at IAMR.

content.Placements: Top recruiting companies such as Dabur, Yakult, Mother Dairy, and Bisleri offer placement opportunities for students. About 55% of students secure placements based on their overall academic performance. Microbiology students often find positions in well-known pathology labs. Internships are available in research centers for both biotechnology and microbiology students.
content.Infrastructure: The college has well-equipped biotechnology, microbiology labs, and dry labs for bioinformatics. Classrooms are well furnished clean, and ventilated. The library provides excellent support for research and learning. Wi-Fi facilities are also provided. The canteen food is also worth it.

individual_reviews.course: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) - Batch of 2026
individual_reviews.title: Our college is really good if you want to receive the best education.

content.Placements: The placement of our college is totally dependent on your skill and knowledge. If you have good skills and knowledge, you can get the best placement. So overall, the placement system depends on you, but the college also tries to improve your skills and knowledge so that you can get the best job.
content.Infrastructure: Our college infrastructure is also good, and the campus is enjoyable to walk around. The infrastructure facilities are provided according to our needs, so overall, the infrastructure is best. We love our college campus and everything about it.

individual_reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2020
individual_reviews.title: Review of IAMR Group of Institutions.

content.Placements: Adequate placement rate is there. If the student has good skills and acquires new things regularly, then that student definitely cracks the job easily. Above 60% of students are placed every year. Top recruiting companies such as Microsoft, Amazon, IBM.
content.Infrastructure: We have good classrooms and sufficient grounds for playing. There's a good nature view with trees and a garden area. Some additional clubs are there apart from studies, where we can show our talents. For exams, we take books from the library and prepare from those books.

individual_reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2022
individual_reviews.title: It is the best MBA college in Ghaziabad.

content.Placements: Placements of IAMR (Institute of Advanced Management and Research) are good. Major mass recruiters visit this campus and offer decent salary packages. The website of this college is well updated regularly, including the information of placements records and various events. Various reputed companies like Accenture, City Bank, etc., have also visited this campus for placements.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of this college is very good. This college has well build blocks and all the facilities which a management college requires. Our campus has a free Wi-Fi facility, and the range and speed of Wi-Fi are also very good. Hostels in this college are very clean, and there are hostels for both girls and boys.

individual_reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2022
individual_reviews.title: I am satisfied because placements, faculty members and environment are good.

content.Placements: Almost 70% of the students got placed. In our course, the highest salary package offered is 5 LPA, the average salary package offered is 3 LPA and the lowest salary package offered is 2 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Microsoft, Infosys, HCL, Agile and IBM. Almost 70% of the students got an internship from our course.
content.Infrastructure: Many facilities are provided for students such as Wi-Fi, labs, classrooms, library, playground, medical facilities, canteen and sports and games. There are good facilities in our college hostel, mess, canteen, medical facilities and sports and games. I am very happy with our college.

admission_overview.title: IAMR Group of Institutions Admission Overview 2025
admission_overview.description: IAMR Group of Institutions admissions are a blend of both merit and entrance-based. Students seeking to apply for any of the courses offered at the institution need to ensure that they meet the course-specific admission criteria of the desired programme. The institute offers a wide range of courses at undergraduate and postgraduate levels across several fields, such as Applied Sciences, Physiotherapy, Computer Applications, Management, Law, Education, and more. Students may get selected either on the basis of academic merit or on an entrance basis, depending on the course and norms set by the institute. IAMR Group of Institutions offers courses via its various institutes/ colleges. The application process for the institute commences online. Interested students can read the following article to learn all about the courses and their respective admission criteria and procedures.

eligibility_selection.title: IAMR Group of Institutions Eligibility & Selection Criteria 2025
eligibility_selection.description: IAMR Group of Institutions course admission is made on the basis of preset admission criteria. Students seeking to apply for any of the courses offered at the college need to make sure that they fulfil the admission criteria for the desired programme. For undergraduate admissions, students need to make sure they have passed Class 12 or equivalent with relevant subjects and secured the specified aggregate. Similarly, for postgraduate admissions, candidates must have finished their graduation in the relevant field. Students are selected based on various parameters, including academic merit, entrance exam scores, and PI, whichever is applicable. Interested students can take a look at the following table to learn all about the general admission criteria for some of the top IAMR Group of Institutions courses:

admission_process.title: IAMR Group of Institutions Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: IAMR Group of Institutionsadmissionis based on merit scores of the students in the last qualifying exam or course-level entrances accepted by it. The institution offers various programmes at the UG and PG levels. These are offered in multiple streams, such as Medicine and Health Sciences,Business and Management Studies, IT and Software,Mass Communication and Media, Science and Teaching and Education. The application process for the institute generally commences online; however, offline applications may also be accepted. Interested students can follow the step-by-stepIAMR Group of Institutionsadmission processexplained below:
Step 1: Check your eligibility

The first step requires students to check the admission criteria of the desired programme. Students can either visit the official website of the institute or the college campus to obtain the latest information.
Step 2: Apply for the desired course

Eligible students can then visit the official website of the institute to apply for the desired programme by filling out the application form available online. The website mentions the detailed admission process of each course. For some courses, students may need to register for state-level counselling, while for courses such as LLB, students need to register at CCSU's website.
Step 3: Selection Rounds and Shortlisting

Students are selected on the basis of several parameters. The institution selects students who meet both the general eligibility and the course-specific selection criteria. Students are either selected based on their academic merit or scores obtained in the accepted entrance test. Further selection rounds, such as a Personal Interview, are also conducted for selective courses.
Step 4: Document Verification & Admission confirmation
Selected students need to go through document verification and pay theIAMR Group of Institutions feesto secure their spots at the institute.Download IAMR Group of Institutions LAW Brochure

hostel.description: The college hostels rooms are well-furnished and spacious.Facilities such as dining, internet browsing, library and reading room, medical facilities, laundry, inbuilt canteen, xerox centre etc. are available in all the hostels.

library.description: Institute of Advanced Management and Research has well-equipped library with a collection of  more than10,000 books, 80 international and national journals,CDs etc. It highly spacious and designed in a manner so that more than 100 students may sit comfortably at a time to carry out any kind academic activity such as reading books and journals, Digital Library section, computer programming, software development etc.

sports.description: Available Facilities: Hockey, Football, Cricket, Basketball, Lawn Tennis, Badminton, Table Tennis, Volleyball

reviews.review_heading: A campus of possibilities: My experience at IAMR.
reviews.review_text: The college has well-equipped biotechnology, microbiology labs, and dry labs for bioinformatics. Classrooms are well furnished clean, and ventilated. The library provides excellent support for research and learning. Wi-Fi facilities are also provided. The canteen food is also worth it.

reviews.review_heading: Our college is really good if you want to receive the best education.
reviews.review_text: Our college infrastructure is also good, and the campus is enjoyable to walk around. The infrastructure facilities are provided according to our needs, so overall, the infrastructure is best. We love our college campus and everything about it.

reviews.review_heading: Review of IAMR Group of Institutions.
reviews.review_text: We have good classrooms and sufficient grounds for playing. There's a good nature view with trees and a garden area. Some additional clubs are there apart from studies, where we can show our talents. For exams, we take books from the library and prepare from those books.

reviews.review_heading: It is the best MBA college in Ghaziabad.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of this college is very good. This college has well build blocks and all the facilities which a management college requires. Our campus has a free Wi-Fi facility, and the range and speed of Wi-Fi are also very good. Hostels in this college are very clean, and there are hostels for both girls and boys.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied because placements, faculty members and environment are good.
reviews.review_text: Many facilities are provided for students such as Wi-Fi, labs, classrooms, library, playground, medical facilities, canteen and sports and games. There are good facilities in our college hostel, mess, canteen, medical facilities and sports and games. I am very happy with our college.

reviews.review_heading: A review on Institute of Advanced Management and Research.
reviews.review_text: The college has an average infrastructure. The classrooms are fully air-conditioned. Many types of gaming products are provided by the campus. The library is the best part of our education because from there, I learned many new things that are helpful in the corporate world after getting placed.

reviews.review_heading: Awesome experience here.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi, computer labs, library, smart class, delicious food, 24X7 light, and Wi-Fi connection are there. In hostel, the warden and all workers are very kind and very helpful. Make memories in hostel life and always remember.  The landmark location of the college is very easy to reach on this location.

reviews.review_heading: Really very good and fantastic .
reviews.review_text:
Infrastructure of college is good
There are good classrooms and also classroom are neat and clean 
And also college Wi-Fi is working properly in classroom but in some different area Wi-Fi not connection due to lack of signal 
But foods items are good in our mess.

reviews.review_heading: It is an excellent college that provides all facilities at a minimum fee.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi is available throughout the campus. There is a studio for media students. The quality of food in the canteen is good. All students are allowed to participate in other activities, which makes them capable of doing everything.

reviews_list.review_title: If you want college for minimum fees and also do not want to go to college regularly.

review_content.Placements: 30% of students are placed in a company. The highest package is 10 LPA, and the average package is 4 LPA. IT park companies came to the college. 10% students do an internship in companies for free. Companies can't pay for an internship. We have to pay for college for an internship.
review_content.Infrastructure: The college campus is big, around 12-15 acres approximately. No network connection in the classroom, jamers are there in the classroom. Wi-Fi are present in the labs, and the library is well. Both girls' and boys' hostels are present in the college. Mess is very decent. Cafe is available outside the college. We can go during the lunch break. Sports and games tournaments happen in the college.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2024
reviews_list.review_title: The college is best for me.

review_content.Placements: The students were 50 to 60 percent placed in the course. The highest package offered was 10 to 12 LPA, and the lowest package offered was 6 LPA, with an average package of 8 LPA. The companies, included TCS and Infosys. Many students had gotten internships. The percentage ratio was 40 to 50 percent.
review_content.Infrastructure: Facilities were good in all courses and departments. Labs were neat and clean. The Wi-Fi was also in good condition. The library was available in the course for students and staff. The hostels were not on campus, but we knew that good facilities were provided by the college.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2028
reviews_list.review_title: Campus, mess, and faculty members are good in college. Value for money, but decent in placement.

review_content.Placements: Only 40 percent of students who studied hard got placed. I am a 2nd-year student, so don't know too much about placement. 12 LPA was the highest last year, with an average of 4 LPA. Infosys, TCS, and IT park companies came. MNCs do not come to college. CS has high chances of placement.
review_content.Infrastructure: College infrastructure is good, with a big campus area. Computer labs and the central library are available. Both girls' and boys' hostels are available in the college. Mess, canteen, and cafes are available in the college. Decent food was available. Sports and games tournaments happen in the college.

faqs.answer: After JEE session 2 is completed, only those candidates who are aiming for IITs need to start preparing for JEE Advanced after clearing JEE Main. Those who are above the 98th percentile should start preparing for JEE Advanced as soon as possible. Those below this, between the 95th and 98th percentile, should focus on attempting more mock tests and previous year question papers so that they have a better chance of clearing JEE Advanced

Students can choose these courses to embark on their careers in the field of Medicine & Health Sciences, Engineering, Business & Management Studies, IT & Software, Accounting & Commerce. The institute is staffed with highly skilled and experienced faculty members dedicated to delivering these programs. Chameli Devi Group of Institutions boasts an impressive review rating of 3.81 based on student feedback at Shiksha. Additionally, it has received a rating of 3.84 for Campus Life, 3.64 for Placements, 3.77 for Faculty, and 4.05 for Infrastructure.

review_summary.college_name: IDGI Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech in Civil Engineering - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: Good college environment with decent fees.

content.Placements: 40 percent of students got placed from this course. 12 LPA is the highest package, and the average package is 4 LPA to 5 LPA. LNT, Lodha, and Tata Group companies came to the college for the placement. 50 percent of students got internships. Mostly roles offered by companies are civil engineer officer.
content.Infrastructure: The campus of the college is good, with well-built buildings constructed, and a good atmosphere, all greenery is present. Wi-Fi labs and libraries are well-managed. Classrooms a are decent. Hostel facility available for the students. Boys' and girls' hostels are separate. Mess and canteen football decent. You can play sports and games in your free time.

individual_reviews.course: Bachelor of Pharmacy (B.Pharma.) - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: It is a very good college for both B.Tech and B Pharmacy.

content.Placements: Chameli Devi Institute is one of the most well-known colleges for placement. The average package is 5 to 8 LPA. Our college has a good reputation, which helps us in interviews. More than 20 to 30 companies come for recruitment. Internship programmes are there for building students’ knowledge about work.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is very good. Our college has a very big ground nearby, 5 acres. The hostel is very big. Nearly 4000 students live there. Hostel gives good quality of food and a wide variety of foods, Wi-Fi, mineral water and many more.

individual_reviews.course: B.Com. with Computer Application - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: If you want college for minimum fees and also do not want to go to college regularly.

content.Placements: 30% of students are placed in a company. The highest package is 10 LPA, and the average package is 4 LPA. IT park companies came to the college. 10% students do an internship in companies for free. Companies can't pay for an internship. We have to pay for college for an internship.
content.Infrastructure: The college campus is big, around 12-15 acres approximately. No network connection in the classroom, jamers are there in the classroom. Wi-Fi are present in the labs, and the library is well. Both girls' and boys' hostels are present in the college. Mess is very decent. Cafe is available outside the college. We can go during the lunch break. Sports and games tournaments happen in the college.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2024
individual_reviews.title: The college is best for me.

content.Placements: The students were 50 to 60 percent placed in the course. The highest package offered was 10 to 12 LPA, and the lowest package offered was 6 LPA, with an average package of 8 LPA. The companies, included TCS and Infosys. Many students had gotten internships. The percentage ratio was 40 to 50 percent.
content.Infrastructure: Facilities were good in all courses and departments. Labs were neat and clean. The Wi-Fi was also in good condition. The library was available in the course for students and staff. The hostels were not on campus, but we knew that good facilities were provided by the college.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: Campus, mess, and faculty members are good in college. Value for money, but decent in placement.

content.Placements: Only 40 percent of students who studied hard got placed. I am a 2nd-year student, so don't know too much about placement. 12 LPA was the highest last year, with an average of 4 LPA. Infosys, TCS, and IT park companies came. MNCs do not come to college. CS has high chances of placement.
content.Infrastructure: College infrastructure is good, with a big campus area. Computer labs and the central library are available. Both girls' and boys' hostels are available in the college. Mess, canteen, and cafes are available in the college. Decent food was available. Sports and games tournaments happen in the college.

admission_process.title: Chameli Devi Group of Institutions Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: Chameli Devi Group of Institutions admissionis based on both merit or exam scores of the candidates. Besides, Chameli Devi Group of Institutions considers scores in JEE Main, CMAT, and MPPET for admission to specific courses.Chameli Devi Group of Institutionsoffers courses at the UG and PG levels.
The college offers UG programmes for 2 years - 3 years. For programmes at PG level, the duration is 2 years.
The total tuition fee for UG programmes isINR 38,000 - 1,50,000. Likewise, the PG programmes fee isINR 40,000 - 56,000. Students can pay the fee amount via online or offline mode.
Please note that this fee information is obtained from the official website/ sanctioning body but is subject to change.
