faqs.question: What to do after JEE Main session 2 result?
faqs.answer: After JEE session 2 is completed, only those candidates who are aiming for IITs need to start preparing for JEE Advanced after clearing JEE Main. Those who are above the 98th percentile should start preparing for JEE Advanced as soon as possible. Those below this, between the 95th and 98th percentile, should focus on attempting more mock tests and previous year question papers so that they have a better chance of clearing JEE Advanced

description: Chameli Devi Group of Institutions cutoff 2025 is finally out for aspirants seeking admission to the BTech and Integrated BTech courses. The JoSAA Round 1 seat allotment result 2025 has been released as opening and closing ranks across different categories belonging to the AI and HS quotas. Candidates can scroll down to this page to view the Chameli Devi Group of Institutions JEE Main cutoff 2025 for various specialisations and categories. A few more updates are below:
NTA has released the JEE Main Result 2024 for Session 2. Candidates can download their scorecard from the NTA website jeemain.nta.ac.in.
The Joint Seat Allocation Authority (JoSAA) will start the registration for JEE Main Counselling 2024 on June 10. A total of 6 rounds of JEE Main 2024 counselling will be conducted.

Chameli Devi Group of Institutions cutoff 2025 was released via MPBE entrance exam for admission to the B.E. / B.Tech course. For the General HS category students, the last round cutoff range was between 219466 and 1467145 for B.E. / B.Tech admission. Considering the lowest cutoff rank of 219466, B.Tech in Civil Engineering turned out to be the most competitive branch for admission. In the first round, the cutoff rank for the same branch was 1466734.
Considering the JEE Main last round cutoff 2025 for the General HS category students, the top most competitive course for admission was B.E. / B.Tech, with a cutoff rank closing at 219466.
For more categories, rounds and quotas, candidates must use the provided filters.
Some of the important dates related to JEE Main 2026 for admission are provided below. Candidates can keep track of the upcoming dates to be eligible for admission.
The cutoff PDFs below can be downloaded to view the cutoff details of the last three years for multiple rounds. This will help students understand the past years' cutoff trends.

To make an informed decision students must compare different colleges accepting JEE Main for admission. The given below comparison data is based on the JEE Main last round cutoff data. The cutoff is for the General HS category.

Considering the Chameli Devi Group of Institutions B.E. / B.Tech cutoff 2025, the top three most competitive specialisations for General HS category students were B.Tech in Civil Engineering, B.Tech in Information Technology and B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (IoT and Cyber Security), with last-round closing ranks of 219466, 969308, and 1228592, respectively.

reviews.review_heading: Good college environment with decent fees.
reviews.review_text: The campus of the college is good, with well-built buildings constructed, and a good atmosphere, all greenery is present. Wi-Fi labs and libraries are well-managed. Classrooms a are decent. Hostel facility available for the students. Boys' and girls' hostels are separate. Mess and canteen football decent. You can play sports and games in your free time.

reviews.review_heading: It is a very good college for both B.Tech and B Pharmacy.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of the college is very good. Our college has a very big ground nearby, 5 acres. The hostel is very big. Nearly 4000 students live there. Hostel gives good quality of food and a wide variety of foods, Wi-Fi, mineral water and many more.

reviews.review_heading: If you want college for minimum fees and also do not want to go to college regularly.
reviews.review_text: The college campus is big, around 12-15 acres approximately. No network connection in the classroom, jamers are there in the classroom. Wi-Fi are present in the labs, and the library is well. Both girls' and boys' hostels are present in the college. Mess is very decent. Cafe is available outside the college. We can go during the lunch break. Sports and games tournaments happen in the college.

reviews.review_heading: The college is best for me.
reviews.review_text: Facilities were good in all courses and departments. Labs were neat and clean. The Wi-Fi was also in good condition. The library was available in the course for students and staff. The hostels were not on campus, but we knew that good facilities were provided by the college.

reviews.review_heading: Campus, mess, and faculty members are good in college. Value for money, but decent in placement.
reviews.review_text: College infrastructure is good, with a big campus area. Computer labs and the central library are available. Both girls' and boys' hostels are available in the college. Mess, canteen, and cafes are available in the college. Decent food was available. Sports and games tournaments happen in the college.

reviews.review_heading: Great infrastructure, helpful teachers, and career opportunities.
reviews.review_text: College provides good infrastructure with well-equipped labs, high-speed Wi-Fi, smart classrooms, and a central library with plenty of resources. Hostels are clean and maintained regularly, with 24X7 water and electricity. Mess food is average but hygienic, and the canteen offers good variety. Medical facilities are available on campus. There are sports grounds for cricket, football, volleyball, and indoor games, making students' life balanced and engaging.

reviews.review_heading: College environment is good. Faculty members are also very good. I like the infrastructure.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure is quite good, I like it. CDGI's infrastructure aligns well with modern educational standards, delivering strong academic, extracurricular, and research facilities. Whether you are focused on engineering, management, pharmacy, or law, the campus provides a comprehensive environment for holistic development.

reviews.review_heading: A very nice journey with friendly teachers and excellent guidance.
reviews.review_text: Many facilities are available in college, such as Wi-Fi, labs, clean classrooms, and a library. Very good teachers and faculty provide excellent teaching quality and focus on every student, helping them in their studies, which helps students get good marks in exams.

reviews.review_heading: I think this is the best college for placement and study.
reviews.review_text: I don't know about the hostel, but the infrastructure and feedback are very good. All facilities like Wi-Fi, labs, classrooms, etc., are good in this college.

reviews.review_heading: No placements at this college.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of college was under construction. The new infrastructure at the college was average. Hostel facility of the college was excellent. Toilets were good. Medical facilities were also present in deen office, and you had canteen facilities on college campus.

reviews.review_heading: Good infrastructure and lively campus, decent placements, but curriculum needs improvement.
reviews.review_text: The department offers well-equipped labs, high-speed Wi-Fi, smart classrooms, and a good library. Hostel facilities are decent, with average mess food and a better canteen. Medical support is available on campus, and sports facilities are good for various games and activities.

reviews.review_heading: My best time at CDGI, Chameli Devi Groups of Institutions.
reviews.review_text: Many of the facilities are provided and overall infrastructure is also good. All students who live in the hostel have access to the Wi-Fi. Labs are also available. Library is also available for them all the time. Overall, the quality of the facility provided by the college is very good. The food is excellent. There is a canteen available. Students can purchase and eat anything of their choice like manchurian noodles, baked samosas, and many more things. There are medical rooms available for sick...

reviews.review_heading: This is my overall experience of the college in 3.5 years.
reviews.review_text: The overall infrastructure is good. There are many facilities provided by the college, such as many classrooms, high-tech computer labs, and many more labs, according to the requirements of the branch to which the student has selected. The canteen is very big, and there is a mess providing food. Medical facilities are also there, and many events are sponsored by the college, such as Citronics.

reviews.review_heading: With this amount of money, it is the best college for poor students to grow.
reviews.review_text: The facilities and infrastructure are good. All labs are decent and classrooms are also good. The library is also good but they should add some more books. The quality of the facilities in my hostel is very good. The food is available for all students and medical supplies are also good.

reviews.review_heading: The overall college experience is good.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of the college is quite nice and decent. The facilities for hostel students are a secure place to live, yummy and hygienic food to eat, and provide best medical services for the students. They organize cultural and sports events, especially for hostel students.

review_summary.college_name: IES College of Technology Bhopal Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: Overall, very low cost with high quality of education and a disciplined college.

content.Placements: It has decent placements, but not too much to expect, but it allows you to give, so it's on you. You can find a lot of opportunities here.
content.Infrastructure: Good classrooms and infrastructure, good quality of food in canteens. You can find the labs of BEEE Computer Chemistry and every needed lab. Sports facilities, NCC training, and a lot of events and seminar sessions with some of the top professionals in your field.
content.Faculty: Every faculty member is supportive, and they are always there to help you. There are very friendly staff, well-educated, and sports coaches in every field. This college makes you ready for the industries with its programs like TCS and many more.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: Satisfied because of the good placements and infrastructure in this price range.

content.Placements: The percentage of students who placed in the year 2024 is somewhat disappointing. The highest package offered in 2024 was 21 LPA, and the average package for CSE was 4–5 LPA. The top recruiting companies included HCL, Infosys, Wipro, TCS, etc.
content.Infrastructure: The college infrastructure is pretty good. The campus is enabled with high-speed Wi-Fi. The classrooms and library are good enough. The hostel facilities are satisfying, as they provide good rooms and the mess food is satisfying to students.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: A truth about my college .

content.Placements: Almost 60% students are placed in this college. And the highest package of this college 21 LPA and average package 6 to 10 LPA and the lowest package of this college 3 to 4 LPA. And company are tcs, juspay, capsimany, and Mahendra and so on. And. College provide internship .
content.Infrastructure: College facilities is good and also infrastructure is good labs are available in this college and libraries is available and college hostel are avarage and not big hostel food is good medical facilities and sports are provide from college.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: A truth about my college.

content.Placements: 60% of students were placed in this college. The highest package was 21 LPA, the lowest package was 3 LPA, and the average package was 5 LPA. Top recruiting companies included Infosys, TCS, Virtusa, and Juspay. Many students received internship opportunities from companies such as Juspay, TCS, and Microsoft.
content.Infrastructure: The classroom infrastructure is good. It is well-equipped with Wi-Fi in corridors and labs. The hostel facilities are of good quality. The food in the mess is of excellent quality and hygiene. Medical facilities are also available in the hostel. Sports equipment is available as well.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: A truth about my college.

content.Placements: 50% of students get placed in this college. The highest package is 21 LPA, the lowest package is 3 LPA, and the average package is 5 LPA. Infosys, Juspay, HCL, and Virtual are the top recruiting companies. Many students get internships. The top role is Associate Software Engineer.
content.Infrastructure: The college infrastructure is good. Classrooms have well-functioning fans, smart boards, and labs. The hostel offers facilities such as beds, self-study areas, and more. The food quality in the hostel is good. Only a boys' hostel is available in this college.

description: IES College of Technology Bhopal cutoff 2025 was released via MPBE entrance exam for admission to the B.E. / B.Tech course. For the General HS category students, the last round cutoff range was between 748699 and 1401104 for B.E. / B.Tech admission. Considering the lowest cutoff rank of 748699, B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering turned out to be the most competitive branch for admission. In the first round, the cutoff rank for the same branch was 954598.
Considering the JEE Main last round cutoff 2025 for the General HS category students, the top most competitive course for admission was B.E. / B.Tech, with a cutoff rank closing at 748699.
For more categories, rounds and quotas, candidates must use the provided filters.
Some of the important dates related to JEE Main 2026 for admission are provided below. Candidates can keep track of the upcoming dates to be eligible for admission.
The cutoff PDFs below can be downloaded to view the cutoff details of the last three years for multiple rounds. This will help students understand the past years' cutoff trends.

To make an informed decision students must compare different colleges accepting JEE Main for admission. The given below comparison data is based on the JEE Main last round cutoff data. The cutoff is for the General HS category.

Considering the IES College of Technology Bhopal B.E. / B.Tech cutoff 2025, the top three most competitive specialisations for General HS category students were B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering, B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science) and B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science, with last-round closing ranks of 748699, 991665, and 1034625, respectively.

college_info.intro:
Rajiv Gandhi University offers UG, PG, diploma, certificate, and PhD courses across various streams such as Science, Education, Arts, Engineering, and others. BSc, BA, and MTech are flagship courses offered at RGU.
Rajiv Gandhi University, Arunachal Pradesh, offers a full-time, three-year BSc programme at the UG level. The BSc programme offered at the university covers core courses in the areas of Agriculture, Geology, Physical Education, and others. The MTech programme offered by the RGU is a two-year programme. It has several specialisations such as Electronics & Communication Engineering and Computer Science and Engineering. Below-mentioned are Rajiv Gandhi University popular programmes:

faqs.answer: A:    Rajiv Gandhi Central University offers the BCom course via its affiliated colleges and campus. The overall seat intake of the BCom programme under the university is 1537. The BCom seats are unevenly distributed among the affiliated colleges. Candidates must qualify the eligibility as per the affiliated college's admission guidelines. Tabulated below are the BCom seat intake for the academic year 2024:InstitutesSeatsJawaharlal Nehru College200Dera Natung Government College200Indira Gandhi Government College216Jawaharlal Nehru College, Pasighat200Don Bosco College100St. Claret College330Government College, Bomdila24Wangcha Rajkumar Government College1Donyi Polo Government College50Indira Gandhi Government College216
faqs.question: What is the BCom seat intake at Rajiv Gandhi Central University?

faqs.answer: A:    Rajiv Gandhi Central University admission to BCom is merit-based. Therefore, the university doesn't accept any entrance exam for admission to its BCom programme. Candidates are only required to qualify for the BCom eligibility criteria and fill out the BCom application form online in any BCom college (under Rajiv Gandhi Central University's affiliation) they want to pursue the degree. reviews_list.batch_info: M.Sc. in Botany - Batch of 2021
reviews_list.review_title: Teachers talk with students in a friendly way.

review_content.Placements: From 3rd year, students become eligible for campus placements. The college also gives opportunities to sit in placements even after passing out. The average package that our college offers is 3.6 LPA. The highest package ranges from 16-18 LPA, and it is based on students' merit and performance. Every year many renowned companies visit and offer career opportunities to students.
review_content.Infrastructure: Books and journals are available in the college library. We should buy class books from the bookstore. Sports activities are held by one-time annual sports. Our college has a public website where teachers provide notes and important notices.

reviews_list.batch_info: M.A. in English - Batch of 2023
reviews_list.review_title: Overall, best university for M.A. in English course.

review_content.Placements: At RGU, 70% of students got placements in our course. Once we graduated from college, we had to choose our own path to success because the college placement cell was fair. Top recruiting companies were HarperCollins, Pearson, Infosys, etc. Top roles offered were content writers, professors, etc. Decent number of students got internships. The average salary was 20 LPA.
review_content.Infrastructure: Our university system was excellent. The campus had a Wi-Fi facility, AC classrooms, and 24X7 on-site electricity and plumbing connections. All of our lab and classroom facilities were completely satisfactory. All the food in the restaurant was good. Mess food was also okay and charged Rs 50 per late. Hotel rooms and facilities always meet our requirements.

fees_overview.description: Aspiring students wishing to join Rajiv Gandhi Central University are required to pay a certain amount as fees. Rajiv Gandhi Central University fee structure for all courses consists of various components, namely tuition, security deposit, and hostel fee, etc. Among these components, some are to be paid only once during Rajiv Gandhi Central University admission, while the remaining are charged according to the fee guidelines. overview_faqs.question: Is Rajiv Gandhi University a good university?
overview_faqs.answer: Rajiv Gandhi University is one of the eminent universities which offers quality education to young talent. The university is recognised by the UGC and accredited with an A Grade by NAAC. It is a well-recognised, state-funded central university in Arunachal Pradesh with a clean, aesthetic environment and positive aspects regarding academic support for cultural activities. The university appoints well-trained and expert faculty members with extensive experience in their respective fields.

review_summary.college_name: Rajiv Gandhi University Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com.) - Batch of 2026
individual_reviews.title: College education depends on good teachers, and the teachers in our college are the best.

content.Infrastructure: Hostel rooms are also very good, and the food served is also good, both veg and non-veg. Breakfast is also good, and there are good bathroom facilities as well. Juniors also have to visit our college if they want to join. They must know about the college.
content.Faculty: Teachers of my B.Com department are very good and knowledgeable, and the HOD is the best. All the teachers teach very well. Teachers teach well, hence the children's exams also go well. The teachers and our respected principal are the best, which makes our college the best.

individual_reviews.course: B.A. in History - Batch of 2026
individual_reviews.title: I'm absolutely satisfied because of the faculty, good infrastructure, and facilities.

content.Placements: About 80% of students in my course receive offers, and 20,000 offers are made each year. It depends on the students whether they should apply to a company or not. Many students crack the APCS exam. Many students graduated from this college. It's an excellent college in the Itanagar region, and many jobs are offered to students after graduation.
content.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is good enough, and the library is excellent. Classrooms are also good. Every year, college week is held, including all sports like badminton, football, and volleyball. The hostel food and infrastructure are excellent, with no problems. I'm absolutely satisfied with the infrastructure of the college and the hostel.

individual_reviews.course: M.Sc. in Botany - Batch of 2021
individual_reviews.title: Teachers talk with students in a friendly way.

content.Placements: From 3rd year, students become eligible for campus placements. The college also gives opportunities to sit in placements even after passing out. The average package that our college offers is 3.6 LPA. The highest package ranges from 16-18 LPA, and it is based on students' merit and performance. Every year many renowned companies visit and offer career opportunities to students.
content.Infrastructure: Books and journals are available in the college library. We should buy class books from the bookstore. Sports activities are held by one-time annual sports. Our college has a public website where teachers provide notes and important notices.

individual_reviews.course: M.A. in English - Batch of 2023
individual_reviews.title: Overall, best university for M.A. in English course.

content.Placements: At RGU, 70% of students got placements in our course. Once we graduated from college, we had to choose our own path to success because the college placement cell was fair. Top recruiting companies were HarperCollins, Pearson, Infosys, etc. Top roles offered were content writers, professors, etc. Decent number of students got internships. The average salary was 20 LPA.
content.Infrastructure: Our university system was excellent. The campus had a Wi-Fi facility, AC classrooms, and 24X7 on-site electricity and plumbing connections. All of our lab and classroom facilities were completely satisfactory. All the food in the restaurant was good. Mess food was also okay and charged Rs 50 per late. Hotel rooms and facilities always meet our requirements.

individual_reviews.course: M.A. in Economics - Batch of 2026
individual_reviews.title: The wonderful Rajiv Gandhi University.

content.Placements: Placements in other domains are good compared to what I am studying. So far, I haven't heard of any placements from my course, but there have been some placements provided to other courses, usually science-related courses such as CSE and engineering courses.
content.Infrastructure: The facilities provided by our university are very good, to be honest. There is Wi-Fi, labs, classrooms, a library, a park, and many more. The hostels are pretty good. The facilities provided to students are very good for the growth of students. I think overall everything is good.

faqs.answer: NTA will release CUET 2026 city intimation slip online. Candidates who will complete the CUET application process by paying the requisite fee can log in with their username and password and download the slip to check the city where their CUET UG 2026 exam centre will be located.CUET intimation slip mentions the date of examination, shift, subject/test papers and medium chosen by the candidate while filling the application form. City intimation slips are released subsequently for the exams scheduled on different dates. CUET city intimation slip is not an admit card. It is an advanced information about the allotment of city. Based on the city allotted, candidates will have to make the necessary arrangement for travel, accommodation, etc.

admission_process.title: Rajiv Gandhi University Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: Admissions to RGCU are both merit and entrance based. Check below a detailed outline of the admission procedure:
1: Application Process

The admission process at RGCU commences with the application stage. Obtain the application forms from the university's official website. Once filled, the application form must be submitted either via post or in person to the respective department at the university. Application and entrance exam fee must be paid online. Candidates are required to attach the pay slip along with two copies of the online bank challan to the application form.
2: Selection Rounds

For PG courses, admission at RGCU is primarily entrance-based. Candidates must successfully clear either the university-level or state-level entrance exams such as CUET-PG for their respective courses. Additionally, the university offers UG courses through its affiliated colleges, with admission based on the merit scores attained in the last qualifying examination.
3: Merit List Release & Counselling

Following the completion of all selection rounds, candidates are required to participate in the counselling process for their respective courses. Subsequently, the university will publish the merit list in multiple rounds, indicating the selected candidates. Those whose names appear on the merit list are required to pay a stipulated fee to secure their seats.

RGCU fees include multiple components such as Tuition Fees, Admission Fees, etc. Candidates have to pay for a certain amount of fees at the time of admission. The below table mentions the Rajiv Gandhi Central University fees for various UG & PG courses:
The above-mentioned fee is taken from an official source/sanctioning body. Hence, it may vary.

placement_data.title: Rajiv Gandhi Central University Placement Overview
paragraphs: Over 35 students were placed during Rajiv Gandhi Central University placements 2022 in leading companies such as ICICI Bank, ICFRE, and TCS, among others. Some of the well-known designations offered were Research Assistant, Software Engineer, and Assistant Manager. The University has also released the NIRF report 2023, according to which the median package offered to UG (3-year) and BFA students during Rajiv Gandhi University placements 2022 was INR 3.50 LPA and INR 3 LPA , respectively. For PG (2-year) and PG (3-year) courses, the median package stood at INR 4.50 LPA and INR 4 LPA , respectively.

hostel.description: There are 7 hostels in the university, 4 for men and 3 for women which can accommodate 638 students in total. Most of them have facilities like the common room, TV, indoor games and mess run by hostelers on a co-operative basis. Accommodation in separate of residence for B.Ed/M. Ed, regular M.Phil, and Ph.D. scholars are also provided on the basis of merit.

library.description: The library has 64,400 books and subscribes to various national and international journals. The library also provides access to the different online journals under various consortium comprising more than 10,000 e-journals and full-text articles. It also has 343 Ph.D. thesis and 353 dissertations are available. Library uses open source library management software KOHA and has implemented RIFD technology for its smooth functioning of circulation operations and theft detection.

reviews.review_heading: Teaching methods and professors are well-trained in how to teach.
reviews.review_text: Technology facilities are good in classrooms. The campus has a friendly environment. There are clubs where we can join. They all conduct different programs according to their clubs. The infrastructure is good, but I will say that the campus is a little bit small.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2025Offered by Jawaharlal Nehru CollegeReviewed on 24 Nov 2024)
reviews.review_heading: Some Reviews of my college.
reviews.review_text: There is no Wi-Fi in the classroom and one classroom is not enough for the students. Hostel facilities are good, but not enough seats are available. If the students study hard and also study by themselves, then the semester exams will be easy. It is not that hard.

reviews.review_heading: Overall best College for M.A. In History Course.
reviews.review_text: The main building is now the college administration building. It houses the director, the dean of academic affairs, the dean of student affairs, the gymkhana, the examination cell, and the college’s other major administrative leaders. The building is nearly three stories tall, with a base floor length of 18 meters and a width of 9 meters. The building was restored in 2012.

reviews.review_heading: Overall best University for M.A. in Economics Course.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure at our university is excellent. The campus features Wi-Fi, air-conditioned classrooms, and water and electricity available around the clock. We have completely satisfactory lab and classroom facilities. Overall, there is good food available at the canteen. Mess food costs Rs 50 per plate and is also acceptable. The hostel amenities and rooms always meet our needs.

reviews.review_heading: Absolutely satisfied with the college, but it lacks placement and sports facilities.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of our college was good enough to study. Because of its remote area, it was quite a good place, and the library was also very large in size. The classrooms and toilets were very well-facilitated. I don’t have much idea about the hostel because I was a day scholar, but the canteen was good enough. Regarding sports, they don’t give much attention to sports.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2027Offered by Indira Gandhi Government CollegeReviewed on 9 Nov 2024)
reviews.review_heading: College is really good with many facilities. The teachers are not good.
reviews.review_text: We have a library with a computer room and labs for B.Sc. students. We have two canteens, and the sports secretary and general secretary arrange sports and games. The canteen food is good and affordable.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2025Offered by Venerable Uktara Bethany CollegeReviewed on 7 Nov 2024)
reviews.review_heading: It is the best college for studies, not for enjoyment.
reviews.review_text: Our college provides decent facilities and infrastructure for two courses. B.A. and B.Com students are in the same building. A low-quality food is available in the mess and canteen. Medical facilities, sports, and games are not so known. The hostel has a good building. It does not provide good food.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2024Offered by Dera Natung Government CollegeReviewed on 31 Oct 2024)
reviews.review_heading:
The faculty members are great. The curriculum was great 
The environment of the campus is also good.
reviews.review_text: The facilities are not so great, but average. No Wi-Fi is provided on the campus. The library is there with a number of books, but it could be better. The canteen is not so good. Sports and games are also entertained during college week, and cultural programs are also present.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2021Offered by Dera Natung Government CollegeReviewed on 12 Oct 2024)
reviews.review_heading: Average experience and affordable
reviews.review_text: The building was very old and the infrastructure was also not upto mark. Most of the fans didn't work and the window panes also remained broken most of the time. Maintenance was poor. The college grounds were big but it was used only during college fest.

reviews_list.review_title: You must join this college if you are from a middle class family.

review_content.Placements: 65% of students get placed in top teaching companies at our college. The top recruiting companies are Wipro, TCS, Infosys, etc. The highest package is INR 8 LPA. The average package is INR 5 LPA, and the lowest package is INR 2–3 LPA. Students have to apply off-campus for internships, but colleges provide all the necessary details about them. The top roles offered in college by recruiters are software engineer, full-stack developer, etc.
review_content.Infrastructure: Labs, classrooms, and libraries are well furnished and equipped with wi-fi, projectors, desktops, etc. The medical facilities are good. Sports Week is organized every year. There are two canteens on campus. The food in canteens is good. Hostel facilities are not good. The hostel feels like a cage for students. The food is a total waste.

Our college had a canteen, medical facilities, and sports.

individual_reviews.title: Review of Rameshwaram Institute of Technology and Management.

content.Placements: Placements are average. The average salary package offered by companies is approximately 3 LPA. Students who join here should not have high expectations regarding jobs. The library has a good amount of books related to our course. Our college also provides hostels for the accommodation of students. The food quality is average in the hostel and canteen.

admission_overview.college_name: Rameshwaram Institute of Technology and Management Admission 2025: Eligibility & Selection

admission_process.title: Rameshwaram Institute of Technology and Management Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: Rameshwaram Institute of Technology and Management admissions 2025are open to all the courses. The institute offers various courses such as BTech, BCom, MPharma, MBA etc. at the UG and PG level. Apart from the UG and PG courses the institutions also offer polytechnic and diploma courses. The admissions process atRITMis a mix of accepted entrance exams and university-level entrance exams. However, for courses like BPharma, MPharma MTech etc, the institute accepts CUET PG scores and conducts university entrance exams for BEd course. The institute is affiliated withAKTU UP, BTE UP,Lucknow Universityand NCTE.

The application process at RITM is a mix of online and offline procedures. The institute also offers direct admission. Rameshwaram Institute of Technology and Management offers 11 full-time courses and BTech, MTech BPharm, MBA, Polytechnic and DPharm are the flagship courses. Read the following article to know more aboutRITM course admission2025.

RITM admissions to all the courses are based on national/university-level entrance exam scores excluding the BTC course. Along with that, candidates must also fulfil the minimum eligibility requirements of the respective courses. Check below the course-wise eligibility & selection criteria forRITM course admission 2025:
The admission process at RIMT is a multi-step procedure. Students can check the detailed Rameshwaram Institute of Technology and Management admission process steps below:
STEP 1: RIMT Application Process 2025
Candidates can apply online on the official website of the institute. Aspirants who opt for the offline admission process, need to physically visit the institute to obtain the form.
STEP 2: Selection Rounds

RIMT shortlists candidates based on the entrance examination + counselling as per respective courses. Alternatively, applicants can apply for admission at RITM through the Central Universities Common Entrance Test (CUCET) counselling process. Follow the guidelines provided for CUCET application and counselling.
STEP 3: Merit List andAdmission Confirmation
Once selection rounds are over, candidates need to confirm the seat candidates are required to pay the application fee at the admission receipt centre.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Rameshwaram Institute of Technology and Management.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of the college is good. Classrooms are well-modified and the furniture of classrooms is in good condition. Labs are well-equipped with glassware, chemicals, and instruments. They have a proper environment and drainage system to perform experiments. The library has a good amount of books related to our course. Our college also provides hostels for the accommodation of students. The food quality is average in the hostel and canteen.

reviews.review_heading: My experience at RITM Lucknow.
reviews.review_text: The facilities and infrastructure available for my department are good, but I think management has to focus on them to make them much better. The hostel is outside the college campus, and the quality of the food in the mess and canteen is the worst. I also left the hostel after living in it for one year because of the food.

reviews.review_heading: You must join this college if you are from a middle class family.
reviews.review_text: Labs, classrooms, and libraries are well furnished and equipped with wi-fi, projectors, desktops, etc. The medical facilities are good. Sports Week is organized every year. There are two canteens on campus. The food in canteens is good. Hostel facilities are not good. The hostel feels like a cage for students. The food is a total waste.

reviews.review_heading: It is a very good college in terms of facilities within the fee structure.
reviews.review_text: All facilities and infrastructure were available in all departments. Wi-Fi was mostly available at the time of admission. Lab sessions are regularly scheduled. Students are provided with extra classes. The huge library had a lot of books related to our interests. All facilities and good-quality food were provided, especially at the time of admission. Our college had a canteen, medical facilities, and sports.

reviews.review_heading: My college is very awesome.
reviews.review_text:
Wi-Fi, computer labs nice building nice classroom nice libraries very knowledgeable teacher good teaching management
Good food daily routine is very yummy 
Medical facilities are there.
Big playground. Our college is very good in the CSE department. 
You can take admission here.

reviews.review_heading: I suggest you choose this college. I had the worst experience of my college life. I regret.
reviews.review_text: There is no Wi-Fi here, and even there is a network in college. Classrooms are very dirty, and there are small classrooms. Even they don't allow students to sit in the library, and even there are no books in the library. The canteen is small, and the food is not served. In the mess, the quality of food served is very bad.

reviews.review_heading: I have a good experience at this college.
reviews.review_text: It has a good environment and better resources material to study. We also have access to the library, and it has a variety of books. Our campus has a full Wi-Fi facility. We have properly done our coding experience in the coding lab.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Rameshwaram Institute of Technology and Management.
reviews.review_text: Facilities like top-class and free Wi-Fi campus, and also a digital library are available. We have proper labs for computer science students and also there is a properly designed coding lab. We have a very good library. Food available in the mess is very hygienic and tasty as well proper care while preparing is taken. We have sports club in college and various sports-related activities are held here.

reviews.review_heading: Our college is very good for study and for students to get placements in companies.
reviews.review_text: There are various facilities in our college like air-conditioning labs, playground and many more.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Rameshwaram Institute of Technology and Management.
reviews.review_text: The college infrastructure is very good. The campus is fully digitalised and Wi-Fi enabled. Every classroom is fully digitalised and has a smart screen and projector. We also get software skills on the smart screen. The library is huge, and lots of books and research papers are available here, but only two books are provided to each student. Mess food quality is very bad, but hygiene is maintained. The food is very oily. There are no sports and games facilities available on campus. The canteen f...

reviews.review_heading: Over all a good college for students.
reviews.review_text:
The hostel is just a bit good. But in terms of food, it is not that great. It does not have Wi-Fi and a lab. No special features in the hostel are there. 
 A vegan hostel but not for non-vegetarian people because it is not spicy and yummy.

reviews.review_heading: An overview of my college RITM in my view.
reviews.review_text: Library has well stocked books available and we have also provided digital library with aktu named nalanda consortium. Campus has free Wi-Fi facilities to students. We have proper labs and well known lab experts are available. Mess food is average type some times it's oily so much. But menu has various dishes available. We have also medical facilities available in campus. Sports are played twice in week and also there is competition between students during sports week.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Rameshwaram Institute of Technology and Management.
reviews.review_text: Facilities like free Wi-Fi on the entire campus, etc., are available, and Wi-Fi helps students to avail online materials. There is a library facility, and we can issue a maximum of 2 books at a time for 1 week. Labs are conducted properly by us, and teachers coordinate with us. Classrooms are properly designed as per convenience, and also digital facilities are available in classrooms. The hostel facility is very good here, and the food is prepared in a proper manner and takes care of hygiene. V...

reviews.review_heading: This college has good facilities and there is good placements for 2018.
reviews.review_text: The library is beautiful, students can read in this college. The classrooms are average. Our college provides games like volleyball and cricket. The canteen is good, and the quality of food served in the canteen is good.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Rameshwaram Institute of Technology and Management.
reviews.review_text: Our institute is good. The hostel facility is good. The food served in a mess is good. The library is full of books of the latest edition. All books are available, and you can also purchase them. Our college provides an unlimited Wi-Fi facility.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering - Batch of 2023
individual_reviews.title: Review of Vedavyasa Institute of Technology.

content.Placements: Around 10% of students get placed in the mechanical department. The highest salary offered is Rs.10,000 to Rs.60,000 per month. Around 100% of students have completed their internships in manufacturing companies like Minar TMT, Peekay Steel, etc. Royal Enfield, Maruti Suzuki, and Peekay steel are the recruiting companies.
content.Infrastructure: Our college has an average mess, canteen, and medical facilities. Management doesn't give much importance to sports and games but students intended a lot. The lab facility is average and some lab instruments are damaged because of less maintenance.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2024
individual_reviews.title: It is an average college.

content.Placements: Around 61% of students get placed in our college. The lowest salary offered is Rs.19,000 per month and the highest salary package offered is 7 LPA. Civil-based companies offer more placements in our college with an average salary package.
content.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi facilities are limited. Labs are available with limited computers. The library is good. Canteen food is average and does not have value for money.
content.Faculty: Teachers in our college are average.

individual_reviews.title: I am satisfied with this college. I highly recommend you join this college.

content.Infrastructure: Our college provides excellent facilities, good libraries, classrooms and labs. Mess, canteen and all other facilities were good here. Vehicle facility was good, and it is near to main transport line. The college bus was available for students.

reviews.review_text: Our college has an average mess, canteen, and medical facilities. Management doesn't give much importance to sports and games but students intended a lot. The lab facility is average and some lab instruments are damaged because of less maintenance.

reviews.review_heading: It is an average college.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi facilities are limited. Labs are available with limited computers. The library is good. Canteen food is average and does not have value for money.

reviews.review_heading: Average campus life, good teaching.
reviews.review_text: Very good infrastructure with all the necessary facilities. Hostels are well-equipped with Wi-Fi and good rooms well maintained with cleaned washrooms and lobby areas. It has big mess with varieties of food and hygiene is maintained. Library facilities are available e library also available, there is a food court as per the budget great food and affordable. Wi-Fi facilities are there yes they are all maintained.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied with this college. I highly recommend you join this college.
reviews.review_text: Our college provides excellent facilities, good libraries, classrooms and labs. Mess, canteen and all other facilities were good here. Vehicle facility was good, and it is near to main transport line. The college bus was available for students.

reviews.review_heading: Our college provides good infrastructure, facilities, and supportive teachers.
reviews.review_text: Our college provides good infrastructure and facilities. The campus is calm and beautiful. We have Wi-Fi and labs are well-equipped and have enough number of systems so that individual system can be used. We had a good canteen, medical facilities, sports and games zone. Transportation facilities are good.

reviews.review_heading: It is a good college for studies.
reviews.review_text:
The whole campus is Wi-Fi enabled. We enjoyed campus life a lot. Seminar rooms were very good and well-equipped. Classrooms were the best. The library was excellent. I have never purchased any textbook as I have extensively used the library facilities. 
The college management was very supportive. We have conducted many sports tournaments. We enjoyed the hostel life. This college is highly recommended for any student.

reviews.review_heading: It is better not to study here. Poor placements and faculty.
reviews.review_text: The college infrastructure is average. Most of the instruments required for the students are available. Students have to do practicals mostly in large groups. An average library is available in the college.

reviews.review_heading: This is the best college in Kozhikode.
reviews.review_text: The college has an open Wi-Fi facility and can be accessed by the students anytime with the guidance from the teachers. The library has dozens of books for the students, and they can also borrow them from the library. The labs are of good quality. The staff and the teachers have good knowledge.

The college is situated at Ramanattukara, karadu parambu. It’s on a hill top. Academically the college lacks good teachers. But the management is trying to improvise their standard every year.

reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is good. Our classrooms are well-maintained. It also provides a huge library. Workshops are also conducted for each course. This college has a large playground. Sports like football, cricket, volleyball, and tennis are conducted.

reviews.review_heading: The college is very good in terms of education and activities.
reviews.review_text: The college has good and well-equipped labs, and it is a Wi-Fi enabled campus with digital classrooms. Hostel and canteen are very good. Quality of food available in the mess and canteen is very good and tasty. There is a medical officer in college and always taking care of students.

reviews.review_heading: Excellent college for Engineering aspirants.

Our Department has got an excellent lab with all the updated electronics equipments. reviews.review_heading: Review of Vedavyasa Institute of Technology.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of the college was one of the best design in our state because the topmost civil engineers designed it. The representation of the steps between the two blocks of the college was the best one because any college in any state never constructed it. There was an open place auditorium on campus.

reviews.review_heading: Really nice ambience and supportive faculty members.
reviews.review_text: Good infrastructure. Classrooms and the library are well-maintained. Books covering the syllabus, as well as thousands of books from various other topics or domains, are available at the library. Various online books are also provided through the site. The hostel and mess food are good. Annual sports events are conducted.

Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology offers various UG, PG and PhD courses across multiple streams such as Engineering, Management, etc. UG-level courses offered at the institution include BTech while MTech, MBA, and MCA courses are offered at the PG-level to students.

faqs.answer: A:    Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology admission is entrance-based for all courses. It offers UG and PG courses. For Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology admissions, candidates are required to appear for various exams, such as CAT/CMAT/KMAT/KEAM/AMIE/AMIETE/GATE/LBS entrance exam for the respective courses. Candidates can apply for ASIET admission 2024 in an online mode on the college official website.
faqs.question: What are the entrance exams accepted for admission at Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology?

faqs.answer: A:    No, its not hard to get admission at  Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology. The institute offers admission is based on merit and entrance exams. The institute accepts national entrance exams such as CAT, CMAT, KMAT, KEAM, AMIE, GATE, and others. Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology course admission begins with an online application.
faqs.question: Is Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology hard to get?

faqs.answer: A:    Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology accepts Class 12 in Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics (PCM) put together with 45% aggregate from a recognised board for admission to undergraduate i.e., BTech courses. Further, to be eligible for admission candidates are required to apply and appear for the accepted entrance exam i.e. KEAM.
faqs.question: Does Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology accept class 12 marks for admission?

faqs.answer: A:    No, Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology offers admission to MBA at 50% aggregate in graduation. However, Applicants must appear for one entrance exam accepted by the college i.e. CAT.CMAT/ for admission. Candidates seeking admission to the courses must have a 50% aggregate score in graduation along with the accepted entrance exam.

overview_faqs.question: How is life at Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology?
overview_faqs.answer: The Adi shankara institute of engineering and technology (ASIET), is a self financing college, situated in kalady, in Ernakulam district of Kerala. The college was started on 31 August 2001 ASIET is affiliated to APJ Abdul Kalam technological University. Life is good in ASIET, college provides good placements from campus, 100 CSE students got placed, company like TCS, IBMand HCL etc. visits the college for placement. The college has experienced and high qualified faculties, but infrastructure is average. The college has Labs, classroom and library but they are not spacious. It has a friendly and learning environment.

overview_faqs.question: Is B.Tech available in Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology?
overview_faqs.answer: Yes, BTech is available at ASIET. The overall seat intake of BTech courses at Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology is 660. Candidates must have Class 12 in Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics (PCM) put together with 45% aggregate from a recognised board to apply for admission. Further, candidates required to apply and appear for the entrance exam accepted by the institute. After the fulfillment of the eligibility criteria, candidates have to visit the official website of Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology to apply online.

admission_process.title: Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology admission 2025 is open. The college offers entrance-based admissions to all courses. Candidates seeking admission to ASIET courses must appear for various entrance exams for BTech, MTech, MCA, MBA and PhD courses.Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technologyconducts an online mode of application. Candidates seeking admission to the courses must visit the official website of the college to fill out the admission form. Read the complete article to know more about Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology admission, along with course-wise eligibility, selection criteria and admission process:

ASIET is currently accepting application forms for BTech, MCA, MBA, MTech and PhD courses. Candidates can apply online on the official website of the college. The college accepts national-level entrance exams like KEAM, CAT, CMAT, KMAT, etc., to provide admission to UG and PG courses. Below-mentioned are the ASIET courses eligibility and selection criteria:

ASIET feeis a sum of various components such as tuition fee, caution deposit, exam fee, etc. Some of the fee components like caution deposit are one-time paid while tuition fee is paid annually. Coming to affordability, it is one of the strong reasons why many don't opt for a degree or a college. While the availability of education loans and scholarships has made education accessible the terms and conditions required to become eligible for a student loan or a scholarship often stand as a challenge. Check below the total tuition fee for Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology courses:
Note:This information is sourced from official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change.

ASIET sea t intake varies course-wise. Candidates are offered seats based on their merit. Once the seat is allotted, candidates are required to pay the course fee to confirm their admission. Below is the intake for Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology courses:
Note:This information is sourced from official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change.

Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology admission process is carried out in multiple steps. The process starts with registration, selection rounds, merit-list preparation as per respective courses and final seat allotment. Candidates must follow the below steps forASIET admission process 2025:
STEP 1: ASIET Application Process 2025
Candidates are required to apply online on the official website of the institute. Before filling out the application form candidates must fill out the eligibility criteria.
STEP 2: Selection Rounds
Students will be selected based on the entrance exam. To get a seat candidates are required to appear and apply for their respective courses.
STEP 3: Merit List andAdmission Confirmation
Once selection rounds are completed, the college releases a merit list. To allow the final seat. Further, candidates are required to payASIET feeto grab the final seat.

courses_data.name: Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology MBA Admission 2025
courses_data.description: ASIET offers a two-year full-time MBA course in five specialisations. Apart from a full-time MBA, the college also offers add-on certificate courses, namely Business English Communication, Cambridge University, Certified General Marketer, Certified HR Analytics and Metrics and Certified Business Analytics for Finance and Marketing. Admission to MBA course will be based onCAT/CMAT/KMATscore followed by group discussion and personal interview. Check below to know more about ASIET MBA admission 2025:

faqs.question: Can I get admission to MBA at Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology with 40% in graduation?
faqs.answer: No, Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology offers admission to MBA at 50% aggregate in graduation. However, Applicants must appear for one entrance exam accepted by the college i.e. CAT.CMAT/ for admission. Candidates seeking admission to the courses must have a 50% aggregate score in graduation along with the accepted entrance exam.

faqs.question: What is the fee for MBA at Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology offers a two-year MBA degree at the PG level. The institute offers these courses in the range of INR 2.9 lakh. Additionally, candidates must have to pay another one-time fee at the time of admission. The fee is sourced from various sources. Hence, it's indicative.

faqs.question: How to get admission to MBA at Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology MBA admissions are completely entrance-based. Admission to the programme is based on entrance exam scores such as CMAT, CAT and MAT. Candidates can secure admission to following three specialisations:FinanceHuman Resource ManagementMarketing & Operations Management

faqs.question: How can I get admission to MBA at ASIET?
faqs.answer: Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology MBA admission is open. The institute offers admission based on merit and entrance exams. The institute accepts national level entrance exams such as CAT, CMAT, KMAT, and others. Aspiring candidates must qualify the eligibility criteria set by the institute for the desired course.

Candidates looking for admission to  MTech can apply online. To be eligible for admission to MTech, candidates must have an aggregate of 60% in graduation. Further, candidates are required to apply and appear in one entrance exam accepted by the college, such as AMIE/ AMIETE and GATE.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria for M.Tech at Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology?

Candidates looking for admission to M.Tech courses must have a graduation degree with 60% aggregate.The admission to the M.Tech course is entrance-based. The institute accepts various entrance exams including AIME, AMIETE and GATE for admission.

faqs.question: What are the various courses offered at ASIET?
faqs.answer: At the undergraduate level, the university offers BTech courses to students. At the postgraduate level, the university offers MBA, M.Tech and MCA courses to students. Admission to all the courses is entrance based. Candidate seeking admission to any courses can apply and appear for the exam for admission.

faqs.question: What are the entrance exams accepted for admission at Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology admission is entrance-based for all courses. It offers UG and PG courses. For Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology admissions, candidates are required to appear for various exams, such asCAT/CMAT/KMAT/KEAM/AMIE/AMIETE/GATE/LBS entrance examfor the respective courses. Candidates can apply for ASIET admission 2024 in an online mode on the college official website.

faqs.question: How can I get admission to various courses at Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology (ASIET) admission to MBA, MTech, BTech and MCA is entrance- based. The college accepts various entrance exam scores, such as CAT/CMAT/KMAT/GATE/KEAM/AMIE and others for admission to UG and PG courses. Further, to be eligible for admission, applicants also need to pass Class 10 and Class 12 for admission to UG courses and graduation degree for admission to PG courses.

faqs.question: Are admissions to various courses open at Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: Yes, admission is open to Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology for all courses. The college offers entrance-based admission. To get admission, candidates are required to apply and appear in respected entrance exam and complete the basic eligiblity. Further, candidates must visit college official website to fill out the application form.

placement_data.title: Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology Placement overview
paragraphs: Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology has concluded its placement drive for the batch passed out in 2022. As per the latest report, the institute recorded 90% placements for its BTech batch and 85% placements for its MBA batch in the academic year 2021-2022. The highest and average package offered to BTech students during Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology placement 2022 was INR 20 LPA and INR 5 LPA , respectively. On the other hand, the highest and average package offered to MBA students stood at INR 9.2 LPA and INR 3.6 LPA , respectively. The top recruiters of Adi Shankara college in 2022 included TCS, Wipro, Infosys, Zoho, Capgemini, IBM, ITC, Federal Bank, Intellipat, ICICI Prudential, Motilal Oswal, Hedge, Capitalvia, Axis Bank, IndusInd Bank , etc.
The key highlights of Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology placements for the class of 2022 are tabulated below:
BTech Placement Statistics (2022)
MBA Placement Statistics (2022)
Total students registered
Read more: Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology Admission Process

The average package offered to BTech students during Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology placements 2022 stood at INR 5 LPA. The course-wise average package offered during Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering placements 2022 is tabulated below:
Average Package (2022)

The average package offered during to MBA students during Adi Shankara college placements has constantly risen since 2020. From INR 3 LPA in 2020 and INR 3.3 LPA in 2021, the average salary reached INR 3.6 LPA in 2022. For more clarity, check out the graph below:

As per the latest report, the highest package offered to BTech students during Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology placements 2022 stood at INR 20 LPA. The course-wise highest package offered during Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering placements 2022 is tabulated below:
Highest Package (2022)
An improving trend in the highest package offered was observed during Adi Shankara college MBA placements between 2020 and 2022. Let’s take a look at the infographic below for a clear understanding:
The minimum package offered during Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology placements 2022 stood at INR 3 LPA. The same is tabulated below:
Minimum Package (2022)

According to the placement report 2022, 90% of the BTech batch 2022 and 85% of the MBA batch 2022 were placed in reputed companies. The key highlights of the 2022 batch placed during Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology placements are presented below:
BTech Placement Statistics (2022)
MBA Placement Statistics (2022)
Total students registered

As per the latest report, a diverse set of recruiters participated during the placement process 2022 at Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology. These participating recruiters placed students of the institute in various sectors viz., FMCG, Bank, NBFC, IT, ITES, Investment Banking, Insurance, Software, Hospitality, etc. Some of the prominent recruiters that visited the Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology during the 2022 placement drive are listed in the table below:
Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology Top Recruiters

As per the external sources, a major portion of Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology alumni are placed in the Engineering sector (50%), followed by Information Technology (20%) and Operations (14%). The pie chart below shows a sector-wise bifurcation of Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering alumni placements throughout the years:

faqs.question: Is Jindal School of Banking and Finance, O.P. Jindal Global University good for placements?
faqs.answer: Jindal School of Banking and Finance has excellent placements owing to its strong industry connections and dedicated placement cell. Top recruiters like ICICI, Axis, EY, Deloitte, JP Morgan hire students for profiles in investment banking, research, modelling etc. 90% of 2021-22 batch received placements with the highest package being 18 LPA and average around 6-7 LPA. The school provides placement grooming via seminars, workshops and mock interviews. Students also get guidance on competitive exams like CFA and FRM. Overall, the school offers very good career opportunities in the field of finance.

hostel_campus.college_name: Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology Infrastructure Details & Reviews

reviews.review_heading: Amazing facilities and placements.
reviews.review_text: I am a day scholar. The department is providing top facilities in classrooms and labs.  The library has all the reference textbooks for each subject. The hostels are providing good facilities for students. I heard that the food is good in the canteen. Necessary medical, sports, and game facilities are provided.

reviews.review_heading: Good teaching quality, but average placements and limited campus space.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of my college is average because the campus is relatively small. It does not have much open space. Only a few classrooms and labs receive stable Wi-Fi, while the remaining rooms have very slow speeds. Mobile signals drop inside the campus. Classrooms are clean. Smartboards and projectors work properly. Most labs are in good condition. Faculty is renovating the obsolete ones. The library is calm and well-stocked. Friends say hostel rooms are neat. The food is good, though fully...

reviews.review_heading: The college has good infrastructure and facilities.
reviews.review_text: The college provides the best facilities and infrastructure for the students with sufficient labs, classrooms, library. The college also provides hostel facilities which are also quite. The college hostel provides excellent food and co-curricular activities for the students.

reviews.review_heading: The college is good, but the university is not good enough.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of the department is very good. All classrooms have Wi-Fi availability, and labs are really useful. But the hostel facility is an average and also the canteen. In 4 years, students are passing through various subjects that will help them in the future.

reviews.review_heading: A college with good infrastructure and facilities.
reviews.review_text: There are good labs, classrooms, and a library. The hostel is better than the others. It provides a gym facility and a ground. The old canteen was bad. The new one is better and has better food. There is a huge football ground, cricket nets, volleyball court, and basketball court. Inside the hostel, there is a badminton court.

reviews.review_heading: As a beginner, I am currently satisfied with my college.
reviews.review_text: One of the main specialities of our college is its infrastructure. There are a lot of amenities and facilities both inside and outside the campus area. There is a vending machine for refreshments, which is not common in other colleges. Within the department, there is also a startup mission lab for the students to light up their ideas. As I am a day scholar, I am not informed about the hostel facility. But the college infrastructure is one of the most highlighted parts.

reviews.review_heading: Experienced college review.
reviews.review_text: The college has a great infrastructure. It has a central library for everyone. Also, each department has its own libraries. Each classroom is advanced and contains Wi-Fi accessible to the students. Hostel is arranged near the college building. MS is handled by the students and the staff. Food available in the canteen is of good quality.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology.
reviews.review_text: Our college provides good infrastructure and facilities for our course. They provide labs for the students and high-quality equipment for the experiments. They provide us with free Wi-Fi in every corner of the college. There is a library for every department and also a main library at the center hall.

reviews.review_heading: ASIET is good if you want to focus on both enjoying yourself and studying.
reviews.review_text: There is a lab for the practical sessions. The college provides wi-fi connections for classes. There is a library too and the infrastructure is also good at our college. The hostel facilities are okay and the canteen food is not that impressive at college. But overall, the college is good.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied with my college, which has a good ambience, good facilities, infrastructure.
reviews.review_text: All the facilities for students are available. A Wi-Fi network is available for the students. Lab facilities for doing projects, etc., are also provided by the college. A large library is also available, where students can go anytime and take books and refer to them.

reviews.review_heading: Absolutely satisfied with the faculty.
reviews.review_text: Campus is fully equipped with free Wi-Fi. And also, good labs are there; libraries are there with wide varieties of books; books are arranged topic-wise, making it easy for us to find the required books; and online PDFs are also available on the library website. Classrooms are equipped with projectors and each department has its own Wi-Fi system.

reviews.review_heading: Good college in Eranakulam.
reviews.review_text: Facilities and features in classrooms are great as every classroom has wifi and projectors. Labs are also well-maintained and have powerful machines. The food in the hostel is not that good as the college is vegetarian, only vegetarian food is available in the hostel and in the canteen.

reviews.review_heading: Adi shankara can give you a college life that you wish.
reviews.review_text: Campus infrastructure is a 9/10. The college offers excellent advanced labs and technologies for all kinds of studies. The campus is divided into blocks where each block is very much well-maintained. Wi-Fi network is available for all the students and staffs with high-speed internet. The college also offers you required support in sports and arts. There is a medical room where you can rest.

reviews.review_heading: Satisfied because of the course.
reviews.review_text: The overall campus is very good. The environment around the campus is very nice. There are 3 labs for the Department of Artificial Intelligence and about twenty to thirty faculty members for teaching. The canteen is very clean, and the food is very tasty. Every year, the college conducts sports and arts festivals.

reviews.review_heading: Best in class for your bright future with placements, infrastructure and academics.
reviews.review_text: At the first look of the infrastructure, you will see the engineering design from the entrance itself. There are mainly 4 main blocks which are separated from each other. The main office building has EEE, ECE and CS AI branches, and in a separate building alone, mechanical branch is there. There is another separate building for civil and biomedical branches. The whole campus is Wi-Fi enabled which is available for the students also. The hostel being inside the campus compound is the best part. O...

review_summarisation.heading: What students say about Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology

likes.text: Top recruiting companies include TCS, Wipro, Tech Mahindra, QST Global, Keltron, and so on.
The students also got the internship in institutions like BSNL, AIR, Doordarshan, Keltron, Infosys etc.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2027
reviews_list.review_title: The furniture of the Computer Science department is good.

review_content.Placements: 80 percent of the students are placed in companies in my course. The highest package offered outside the campus is 22 LPA. Inside the campus, the highest package is 11 LPA, the average package offered is 4 LPA and the lowest package offered is 3 LPA. The top recruiting companies of the college are TCS, Mahindra, Amazon, and Flipkart. Roles offered are web developers.
review_content.Infrastructure: The quality and the infrastructure of the hostels and departments are good. Wi-Fi facilities with low speed are available on the campus. The facilities like reading rooms and sports rooms are available in the hostels. The quality of the food provided in the hostels is good. A canteen, a dispensary and a big ground are available on the campus.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2027
reviews_list.review_title: Absolutely dissatisfied with practical skills and placements.

review_content.Placements: Students should be placed in our course with a rank of 1 to 13k. The highest package is 10 to 13 LPA, the lowest package is 4.5 LPA and the average Package is 6 to 7 LPA. TCS, Infosys, and FactSet are the top recruitment companies in our college. The student will get internship with a minimum of 7.5 to 8 CGPA. The offered roles in our college are web developer and program developer.
review_content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is average in our college with normal and simple looking. It has good facilities compared to old Hostels. When it comes to college infrastructure our CSE department is the biggest department in our college with every single facility per student requirements. When it comes to food in a hotel, sometimes the food is good and sometimes bad, no precautions or cleanness in the food preparation place and less workers to clean the hostel or college to maintain cleanliness. Sometimes they use students as cleaners by taking attendance as a season, except for NSS.

faqs.answer: Admission to the MBA course at JNTUA subject to a valid score in the state-level entrance exam: Andhra Pradesh ICET. Only the students with an exam score are shortlisted and called for counselling following which seats are allotted. There is no other way to get admission to a full-time MBA course at JNTUA. Therefore can't apply for MBA at JNTUA without an entrance examination. To be eligible for the exam candidates must have the below qualification:CourseEligibilitySelectionMBABachelor's degree with 50% aggregate from a recognised universityAP ICET + Counselling

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Civil Engineering - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: Absolutely it is nice because of good faculty.

content.Placements: There are 60 members placed in my course including lateral entry people. There are 77 members in our course. The average package offered to my course is 4 LPA. Top recruiting companies in our course are Ultra tech and Tata companies. 90 percent of students have got placed.
content.Infrastructure: We have Wi-Fi facilities everywhere around our college. We have free Wi-Fi in our library to study well. In our lecture halls also, they provide us Wi-Fi free of cost. The quality of hostel facilities is very good. We have medical facilities also. In our college there is a dispensary which gives us treatment. In our mess they provide quality food with high rich protein and vitamin food. We have a canteen also in our college which provides food at less cost. We have a large ground where there is a physical education teacher to conduct activities.

About 80 percent of students got internships. Top roles offered in the college are web developer roles.

paragraphs: JNTUA College of Engineering, Ananthapuramu admissionis based on both merit or exam scores of the candidates. Besides, JNTUA College of Engineering, Ananthapuramu considers scores in GATE, AP EAMCET, and AP ECET for admission to specific courses.JNTUA College of Engineering, Ananthapuramuoffers courses at the UG and PG levels.
The college offers UG programmes for 3 years - 4 years. For programmes at PG level, the duration is 2 years.
The total tuition fee for UG programmes isINR 30,000 - 3,00,000. Likewise, the PG programmes fee isINR 54,000 - 1,00,000. Students can pay the fee amount via online or offline mode.
Please note that this fee information is obtained from the official website/ sanctioning body but is subject to change.

description: JNTUA College of Engineering, Ananthapuramu cutoff 2025 is available for admission to B.E. / B.Tech via the AP EAMCET exams. Students can scroll down this page to view the cutoff of various accepted exams for different courses, rounds and categories. A few more updates can be seen in the pointers below:

JNTUA College of Engineering, Ananthapuramu AP EAMCET Cutoff 2025 has been published for all rounds and categories under both the All India and Home State quota. For the General category candidates belonging to the All India quota, the cutoff range in the last round was 2108 to 11648, wherein B.E. / B.Tech was the hardest course to get admission to for this category.

JNTUA College of Engineering, Ananthapuramu B.E. / B.Tech cutoff 2025, along with the cutoffs for 2024 and 2023 for various categories and rounds, can be found in this section. As per the last round of AP EAMCET, the hardest course for admission was B.E. / B.Tech for the General AI category, which had the cutoff of 2108.
Students can see the table below to know the cutoff for other categories and quotas.

Students who want admission to JNTUA College of Engineering, Ananthapuramu for courses offered via AP EAMCET examination can see the table below to know the important dates for enrolment. Candidates can also download these essential dates as a PDF file for later use.

The Andhra Pradesh State Council of Higher Education (APSCHE) conducts the AP EAMCET exam for admission to BTech, BPharm, and BSc in Agriculture, Bachelor's in Fisheries, and Bachelor's in Horticulture programmes. Students can refer to the table below to either view or download the round-wise cutoff for 2025, 2024, and 2023.

The table below compares different colleges, including JNTUA College of Engineering, Ananthapuramu, based on the last round cutoff ranks of the AP EAMCET exam. The table below compares the General AI category candidates. To view the cutoff for other categories and quotas, use the filters below.
For the General AI category, the last round closing cutoff for MCA in 2025 was 1528.
Students can refer to the table below for the AP ICET Cutoff 2025, as well as for the cutoff for the previous two years, i.e., 2024 and 2023 rounds, categories, quotas, and gender-wise.
