reviews.review_heading: Absolutely it is nice because of good faculty.
reviews.review_text: We have Wi-Fi facilities everywhere around our college. We have free Wi-Fi in our library to study well. In our lecture halls also, they provide us Wi-Fi free of cost. The quality of hostel facilities is very good. We have medical facilities also. In our college there is a dispensary which gives us treatment. In our mess they provide quality food with high rich protein and vitamin food. We have a canteen also in our college which provides food at less cost. We have a large ground where there is ...

reviews.review_heading: The scholarship opportunities are very nice, especially for girls.
reviews.review_text: The facilities and the infrastructure in the classrooms and library are very good. Wi-Fi facilities are available, but only in respective departments, not on the whole campus. The speed of the Wi-Fi in the library is very good. Facilities like the reading room and sports room are available in the hostels.

reviews.review_heading: The furniture of the Computer Science department is good.
reviews.review_text: The quality and the infrastructure of the hostels and departments are good. Wi-Fi facilities with low speed are available on the campus. The facilities like reading rooms and sports rooms are available in the hostels. The quality of the food provided in the hostels is good. A canteen, a dispensary and a big ground are available on the campus.

reviews.review_heading: Absolutely dissatisfied with practical skills and placements.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is average in our college with normal and simple looking. It has good facilities compared to old Hostels. When it comes to college infrastructure our CSE department is the biggest department in our college with every single facility per student requirements. When it comes to food in a hotel, sometimes the food is good and sometimes bad, no precautions or cleanness in the food preparation place and less workers to clean the hostel or college to maintain cleanliness. Sometim...

reviews.review_heading: The quality of education provided is very good.
reviews.review_text: Facilities and the infrastructure in the departments and the hostels are very good. Wi-Fi facilities are available. The high speed Wi-Fi is available in the library. The quality of the food in the hostels is very good. A dispensary is available on the campus, and ground is available.

reviews.review_heading: Everything is perfect, faculty brilliance, college environment with 90 percent placements.
reviews.review_text: The facilities and infrastructure are perfect in my college because in our department, the labs, classrooms are very attractive, motivating, and peaceful. The library is very huge and has every book you need without fail. The quality of the facilities is perfect. The food is also very good in the mess and very healthy. The medical facilities are also good. We have a dispensary at my college and they also encourage us to play games.

reviews.review_heading: Satisfied with the professors' teaching.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi facilities are available in the department labs and in the library, but with slow internet. The quality of the food in the hostels is good, and the hostel facilities are also good. The dispensary is present on the campus. A canteen and a ground are available. Sports are encouraged a lot.

reviews.review_heading: It is a good college, I like it so much.
reviews.review_text: The campus has good Wi-Fi, clean classrooms, well-equipped labs, and a resourceful library. Hostel facilities are average, food in the mess is okay, while the canteen is better. Basic medical help is available, and sports grounds and equipment are decent.

reviews.review_heading: Good campus, and average labs.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi is provided across the campus, but only for student laptops, not for mobile phones. Labs contains the necessary tools and equipment useful for experiments. Classrooms have seating for 60 people and digital class facilities. The library consists of more than 2,000 books.

reviews.review_heading: JNTU Anantapur College review by a CSE student.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is good and the library is very good. We can sit there, practice, study, and use computers there for our work. Classrooms and labs are good, where we can stay most of the time. The. The hostel is good compared to other hostels, but we can't leave easily in case of an emergency.

reviews.review_heading: A decent university experience that justifies its name and stature.
reviews.review_text: The college’s infrastructure is average, the classrooms, departments, and labs are good, but the hostels are disappointing, and even the Wi-Fi didn’t function well, the quality of the food is decent, but the rest of the facilities are very average. We could utilize facilities like the library and ground well, but no other extracurricular activities are up to expectations.

reviews.review_heading: An absolutely amazing college with low fees and high-quality education.
reviews.review_text: Facilities provided in our college include Wi-Fi, classrooms, a library, a canteen, a CAD lab, and a bookshop. The facilities in our hostel are Wi-Fi, CCTV, food, and TV. The food in the canteen is nice, with reasonable prices and good quality. Medical facilities are also available in our college.

reviews.review_heading: No dissatisfaction during the period.
reviews.review_text: There are so many facilities provided during the time, and good infrastructure will be developed. Especially, Wi-Fi classrooms and a library are provided in a good atmosphere. In the hostel, there are no compromises in facilitating the quality of food in the mess and canteen. Medical facilities are also provided, and there are no compromises in sports and games.

reviews.review_heading: Good placements in 2025.
reviews.review_text: There are wide range of facilities and the infrastructure of college is unique from other colleges. There is a peaceful environment. The department of CSE is so big and there are many labs. Wi-Fi connection is somewhat poor, and classrooms have a digital board. The quality of food in mess is good and it is suitable for Telugu people. The mess and canteen are available during college timings. The medical facilities are there in the dispensary. There is a big ground for sports and games.

reviews.review_heading: It has good placements and a big and friendly college life. Every place is well-structured.
reviews.review_text: In our department, there are huge facilities, and it is so much bigger than other departments. Classrooms and seminar halls are so big and open. The Wi-Fi facility is not good. Its signal is less. In the hostel, rooms are better as it is a government hostel and the food is also good. It has all facilities. It also includes a digital library.

review_summarisation.heading: What students say about JNTUA College of Engineering, Ananthapuramu

likes.text: Software companies like TCS, Wipro, Tech Mahindra, Cognizant, etc, and many more core companies hire students from our college.
Better with Placements and good support from staff and the university is giving placements every year and maximum students will get placed.

Infrastructure is good in classrooms as well as in the hostel, But the food maybe not good as you think.

highlights.summary: ICRI- Jagannath University, Delhi admission 2023 to all UG and PG courses is open now. Candidates can visit the official website and apply online. Additionally, ICRI-Jagannath University, Delhi boasts of 100% placements offered to its students in various streams such as Clinical Research, Healthcare, and Pharmacovigilance. ICRI-Jagannath University, Delhi placements of all eight campuses are conducted centrally by the authorities of the Institute of Clinical Research of India. The official placement report is not out yet. As per the Shiksha students' reviews, the highest package offered over the past few years was INR 12 LPA and the average package stood at INR 5 LPA.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning - Batch of 2023
reviews_list.review_title: Good placements and career opportunities.

review_content.Placements: The college aims to place all students enrolled in the course. The highest package is 12 LPA now and the average is 5 LPA. Mostly the recruiters are startups and mass recruiters are also hires. Companies hire for various roles in tech and non-tech both profiles.
review_content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is very good with wi-fi, labs are well-equipped with the latest operating systems and canteen facilities are also very good they provide every type of food such as south Indian, Chinese etc. Sports facilities are less on campus because of the small size there is just a volleyball and basketball ground.

reviews_list.batch_info: MBA in Logistics and Supply Chain Management - Batch of 2021
reviews_list.review_title: Review of ICRI - Jagannath University, Delhi.

review_content.Placements: Our college and course were very well known for their placement opportunities. Top roles such as marketing manager, disaster manager, and HR manager were offered. Top recruiting firms are Kotak, HDFC, IFL, Reliance, Infosys, TCS, etc. The salary packages offered ranged from 7 LPA to 8 LPA.
review_content.Infrastructure: Our campus was not very big and a bit old, but it was in a prime location in Delhi. All the hangout spots were near our college. Wi-Fi was not provided on campus. The hostel was good. The food served in the mess was good.

faqs.answer: The ICRI Delhi BSc admission criteria is entrance-based for all courses. The institute conducts entrance exam to shortlist candidates for the personal interview round. The final step in the shortlisting process includes screening of the candidate's profile. The entrance exam is conducted to analyse the knowledge of the candidate which is based on Quantitative ability, Communication, Logical Reasoning, General Knowledge, General English & Aptitude Test.
faqs.question: Q: How to get admission at ICRI Delhi BSc course?

faqs.answer: Various companies are invited to ICRI-Jagannath University, Delhi campus by the active placement cell. Here is the step-by-step process of placements at ICRI-Jagannath University, Delhi:Companies are given an option to go to any one of the eight campuses for recruitment of studentsCompanies are assigned a convenient date to follow-up for negotiationAfter confirmation provided by the company, a pre-placement talk is arranged on the date with ICRI-Jagannath University, Delhi authoritiesAfter that, companies conduct a test and/or Group Discussion (GD) to shortlist the interested candidatesShortlisted candidates are then interviewed for final selection by the companyResult of the final selection is usually announced on the day of interview or within 2-3 days
faqs.question: Q: Is ICRI Delhi worth it?

overview_faqs.question: Is ICRI Delhi worth it?
overview_faqs.answer: Various companies are invited to ICRI-Jagannath University, Delhi campus by the active placement cell. Here is the step-by-step process of placements at ICRI-Jagannath University, Delhi:Companies are given an option to go to any one of the eight campuses for recruitment of studentsCompanies are assigned a convenient date to follow-up for negotiationAfter confirmation provided by the company, a pre-placement talk is arranged on the date with ICRI-Jagannath University, Delhi authoritiesAfter that, companies conduct a test and/or Group Discussion (GD) to shortlist the interested candidatesShortlisted candidates are then interviewed for final selection by the companyResult of the final selection is usually announced on the day of interview or within 2-3 days

review_summary.college_name: ICRI - Jagannath University, Delhi Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: B.Sc. in Nutrition and Wellness Management - Batch of 2026
individual_reviews.title: Absolutely the best university and I would recommend joining here.

content.Placements: There are 45 students in my course. I am pursuing B.Sc. The highest package offered in placements by our college is around 5 LPA - 6 LPA. Every student gets an internship easily but they will be punctual and have knowledge about the subjects studied during their course.
content.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is perfectly arranged on the campus. It is free for all students and faculty members. Labs are well-equipped. The library has multiple books for all courses. Hostels are well-furnished and provide good food for students. Sports meets are also held by the university every 2-3 months.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning - Batch of 2023
individual_reviews.title: Good placements and career opportunities.

content.Placements: The college aims to place all students enrolled in the course. The highest package is 12 LPA now and the average is 5 LPA. Mostly the recruiters are startups and mass recruiters are also hires. Companies hire for various roles in tech and non-tech both profiles.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is very good with wi-fi, labs are well-equipped with the latest operating systems and canteen facilities are also very good they provide every type of food such as south Indian, Chinese etc. Sports facilities are less on campus because of the small size there is just a volleyball and basketball ground.

individual_reviews.course: MBA in Logistics and Supply Chain Management - Batch of 2021
individual_reviews.title: Review of ICRI - Jagannath University, Delhi.

content.Placements: Our college and course were very well known for their placement opportunities. Top roles such as marketing manager, disaster manager, and HR manager were offered. Top recruiting firms are Kotak, HDFC, IFL, Reliance, Infosys, TCS, etc. The salary packages offered ranged from 7 LPA to 8 LPA.
content.Infrastructure: Our campus was not very big and a bit old, but it was in a prime location in Delhi. All the hangout spots were near our college. Wi-Fi was not provided on campus. The hostel was good. The food served in the mess was good.

individual_reviews.course: MBA in Healthcare and Hospital Management - Batch of 2021
individual_reviews.title: Everything here is uncertain.

content.Placements: I can't say anything about placements because until now only I don't know anything what is going to happen in the next months. There is no proper campus placement facility. I am sure if they are available. I don't know the top recruiting companies for our course.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is average as there is no proper access to the library, but it has proper classrooms. There are no Wi-Fi facilities on the campus. Labs facilities are not available here, and only classrooms are available, which are in good condition. The hostel is good, and there are no issues.

admission_overview.college_name: ICRI - Jagannath University, Delhi Course Admissions 2025: Fees, Eligibility, Dates & Application Process

admission_process.title: ICRI - Jagannath University, Delhi Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: ICRI- Jagannath University, Delhi admissionto all courses is entrance-based. The institute shortlists candidates in three selection rounds and they are the entrance exam, the personal interview round and the screening and selection of candidates based on merit. Interested candidates must begin their admission process by meeting the course-specific eligibility criteria followed byfilling out the enquiry formthrough the official website.

Institute of Clinical Research (ICRI) Delhioffers more than ten courses at undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma levels. The courses are offered in various areas of study such asEngineering,Management,Aviation, etc. For more details, stay tuned.

TheICRI Delhi admission criteriaare entrance-based. All aspirants are required to appear for the selection rounds conducted by the institute. However, candidates must meet the eligibility criteria to appear for the selection rounds. The table below shows theICRI Delhi course eligibility and selection criteria:
Make your selection here, to check the eligibility and selection criteria for other courses.

The ICRI Delhi fee for courses is inclusive of various components such as admission fee, tuition fee, caution deposit, etc. Candidates are required to pay the admission fee to secure their seat, at the end of the admission process. Interested candidates can refer to the table below forICRI course feesand total seat intake:

ICRI Delhi admission processbegins with the submission of an admission enquiry and a free counselling session provided to the candidate. The complete ICRI admission process consists of several steps. Interested candidates can check them out below:
1: Admission query and Counselling
Eligible students should fill the admission enquiry form. Based on the query of the candidates, the admission officer will provide free counselling to the applicant.
2: Application Form

After free counselling, candidates are required to fill out the application form. Theapplication process is conducted offline, therefore the candidates have to purchase the form and prospectus from the campus forINR 1,300.
3: Selection Rounds

After filling the application form candidates are required to appear for the entrance exam conducted by ICRI. Candidates who perform well in the entrance exam are called for the personal interview round. Based on the scores secured in the entrance exam, PI and the profile of the candidate, the final selections are made.
4: Final Admission

Shortlisted stundets will receive a selection letter. The letter will consist of some important information including the registration date. The candidates will have to visit the ICRI Delhi campus on or before the mentioned registration date and pay the registration amount to secure their seats.
The ICRI Registration amount for different courses is mentioned below:

placement_report.college_name: ICRI - Jagannath University, Delhi Placement & Salary Insights

placement_data.title: ICRI - Jagannath University, Delhi Placement Overview 2024
paragraphs: The ICRI - Jagannath University , Delhi Clinical Research and Healthcare placement recorded the highest international package of INR 342.07 LPA offered by Astrazeneca UK. The highest domestic package stood at over INR 50 LPA . Leading global recruiters that took part in the placements include- Cipla, Wipro, Accenture Pharmaceuticals, etc in the ICRI - Jagannath University, Delhi placement in 2024.

ICRI India is a top provider of 100% job placements in Healthcare and other fields Since its inception, the institution has successfully placed 65% to 100% of its students in well-known companies. Placements, including final jobs and summer internships, are a key part of ICRI India's yearly schedule. The placement activities focus on students and are transparent, beginning with posting student profiles on our dedicated placement website, accessible to students, faculty, and placement staff. The Placement Department invites top companies from various sectors to the campus, where qualified students go through thorough selection processes based on their skills, performance, and industry needs.

faqs.answer: A:    No, Supreme Knowledge Foundation isn't hard to get. The Supreme Knowledge Foundation Group of Institutions application process is conducted online. The college offers a diverse range of programmes at UG, PG, and diploma levels. To be admitted to the SKFGI, candidates must meet the eligibility criteria set by the college. SKFG admissions are based on entrance exam scores and offers online mode of application.
faqs.question: Is Supreme Knowledge Foundation hard to get?

fees_and_eligibility.overview: Supreme Knowledge Foundation offers a diverse range of programmes at UG, PG, and diploma levels. The college mainly offers programmes in streams such as Engineering, Management, Information Technology, Hospitality, Media and Design, and Health Science. At the UG level, the college offers various programmes such as BTech, BBA, BCA, BSc, and BOptom.

faqs.answer: A:    Yes, for admission to MTech courses, candidates must have a valid score, i.e., GATE, WBUT PGET at Supreme Knowledge Foundation. This exam is particularly conducted for admission of students to its PG courses. Students can get admission to MTech after qualifying for this exam.
faqs.question: Does Supreme Knowledge Foundation have an entrance exam for M.Tech?

faqs.answer: A:    Supreme Knowledge Foundation offers a MBA programme, and the total tuition fee for this programme is INR 4.5 lakh. The fee covers various academic expenses like tuition fees, laboratory charges, examination fees, library fees, and other relevant charges. It is important to note that the fee structure is subject to change, and candidates are advised to refer to the official website of the university for the latest and most accurate fee structure.

review_content.Placements: Almost 90% of students are placed from our college. The highest package is 8 lakhs per annum, with an average of 4 lakhs per annum and the minimum package being 2 lakhs per annum. Basically, IT-based companies are coming like TCS, Cognizant, Wipro, KPIT, and one technology-based company, Sisir Radar.
review_content.Infrastructure: There is no Wi-Fi facility available on our college campus. There are up to 200 classrooms, up to 40 laboratories, one library, and one study room here. Hostel facilities are available on our campus. Football, volleyball, basketball, etc., are available in our college campus.

review_content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is pretty good and the labs are well maintained. SKFGI has a very nicely renovated language lab and a well-decorated library as well. Classrooms are clean and have enough space for students. The canteen is also nice. There is a medical room on every floor of the institute.

overview_faqs.question: What is the total tuition fee for B.Tech at Supreme Knowledge Foundation?
overview_faqs.answer: The fee range for the BTech programme at Supreme Knowledge Foundation falls between INR 2.7 Lacs and INR 4.7 lakh. Supreme Knowledge Foundation offers a Bachelor of Technology programme, and the total tuition fee for this programme varies depending on the specialisation chosen by the candidate. The fee structure is sourced from unofficial sources, hence indicative. As the fee differs based on the specialisation, the range is broad. The fee covers various academic expenses like tuition fees, laboratory charges, examination fees, library fees, and other relevant charges. It is important to note that the fee structure is subject to change, and candidates are advised to refer to the official website of the university for the latest and most accurate fee structure.

review_summary.college_name: Supreme Knowledge Foundation Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning) - Batch of 2026
individual_reviews.title: Short review about SKFGI.

content.Placements: In my stream, our batch is the first batch. Internships are provided to all students in the batch. Top companies do come to the college, but mostly placements are in average tech companies.
content.Infrastructure: College library and labs are good. Classrooms are spacious. Wi-Fi connection is poor. A huge amount of books are available in the library, which are barely accessible. Labs have computers, which do their job but sometimes they even crash.
content.Faculty: Good faculty members with proper knowledge about the course. Most of the faculty members are friendly and helpful. Except some who are not that friendly and see teaching only as their job, not a method of helping students learn. HODs are good and helpful.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science Engineering - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: Satisfied with Faculty Members, Good Infrastructure, and Also Good Placement.

content.Placements: Approximately 80-90% students are placed in B.Tech-CSE. The lowest package offered is 2 LPA and the highest package offered is 30 LPA. You have to be skilled to crack good placements here. Seniors also help you a lot in your projects and almost in everything.
content.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi facility is available, and classrooms are well-furnished. Seniors are very friendly and help a lot in every possible way. Food quality is very good in the mess, with both vegetarian and non-vegetarian options available according to your preference.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Civil Engineering - Batch of 2025
individual_reviews.title: The advantage of Supreme Knowledge Foundation Group of Institutes.

content.Placements: Almost 90% of students are placed from our college. The highest package is 8 lakhs per annum, with an average of 4 lakhs per annum and the minimum package being 2 lakhs per annum. Basically, IT-based companies are coming like TCS, Cognizant, Wipro, KPIT, and one technology-based company, Sisir Radar.
content.Infrastructure: There is no Wi-Fi facility available on our college campus. There are up to 200 classrooms, up to 40 laboratories, one library, and one study room here. Hostel facilities are available on our campus. Football, volleyball, basketball, etc., are available in our college campus.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Civil Engineering - Batch of 2026
individual_reviews.title: SKFGI is a great place for students, with great faculty members and a good environment.

content.Placements: I am a student in the civil engineering department. 80% of students get placed every year in our institute by the civil department. Many known companies, like L&T and some local companies, are also included in the placement process. Students are offered a 3–5 LPA package. Students get job as site engineer, designers, etc.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is pretty good and the labs are well maintained. SKFGI has a very nicely renovated language lab and a well-decorated library as well. Classrooms are clean and have enough space for students. The canteen is also nice. There is a medical room on every floor of the institute.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering - Batch of 2026
individual_reviews.title: Review of SKFGI - Supreme Knowledge Foundation Group of Institution.

content.Placements: About 90% students get placed. Avg 2 LPA total package for B.Tech courses. Ultratech Cement, Lal Baba, IT companies. No one gets any internship during the course. After completing the course, you are completely industry-ready. In this course, you learn spoken English and aptitude skills also.
content.Infrastructure: Full setup available on campus. Very well-designed labs and classrooms are available. And you have access to unlimited books from the library for free. Canteen available but food is not much better. All types of sports and games are arranged by the institute. Medical facilities available.

admission_process.title: Supreme Knowledge Foundation Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: Supreme Knowledge Foundation admissionsare completely entrance-based. Candidates can register online for admission to their preferred course. The admission process at SKFG is as per the steps below:
STEP 1: Supreme Knowledge Foundation Application Process 2025

The application mode is online or offline. For admission to the various programmes, aspirants need to apply at the official website, https://www.skf.edu.in/admission-process.php. However, students looking for offline applications must visit the institute to collect the application form. Candidates can fill out the application form on the institute's official website.
STEP 2: Selection Rounds

The institute considers various entrance exam scores, such as GATE, JEE Main, etc, for admission to MTech, BTech, among courses. It also considers the candidates' academic performance for the final selection.
STEP 3: Merit List andAdmission Confirmation

Once the selection rounds are over, the institute releases a merit list. To allot and confirm the seat, candidates are required to pay the application fee at the admission receipt centre. Shortlisted aspirants need to come for document verification and pay theSupreme Knowledge Foundation feeto confirm their seats at the institute.

faqs.answer: For MTech course admission, candidates must meet the eligibility criteria set by the Supreme Knowledge Foundation. Aspiarnts should pass BE/BTech from any recognised state/national board. The admission criteria for the course is GATE, WBUT PGET.

faqs.question: Does Supreme Knowledge Foundation have an entrance exam for M.Tech?
faqs.answer: Yes, for admission to MTech courses, candidates must have a valid score, i.e., GATE, WBUT PGET at Supreme Knowledge Foundation. This exam is particularly conducted for admission of students to its PG courses. Students can get admission to MTech after qualifying for this exam.

Canteen available but food is not much better. All types of sports and games are arranged by the institute. Medical facilities available.

reviews.review_heading: Our college has value for money.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is very good. All facilities are available in this college. Our campus is Wi-Fi enabled. Laboratories are better. Several books are available in the library. The food served in the canteen is very good. Many sports accessories are available in this college.

reviews.review_heading: Literally impressed with the infrastructure.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is mind blowing the classrooms and washrooms are so clean and labs and library are very helpful. The hostel facilities are average and the canteen food is delicious and the medical facilities are very effective. Sports is given priority.

reviews.review_heading: It has  really good infrastructure.
reviews.review_text: Facilities of our courses are too good. A good library, Wi-Fi campus, neat and clean classrooms, digital classrooms are available here, and hi-tich labs. You can play and participate all kind of sports like football, badminton, volley, indoor and outdoor games .

reviews.review_heading: It is a good college for engineering, management, and medical students.
reviews.review_text: Modern and clean classrooms are available, and labs are air-conditioned. A library and a reading room are available. There are hostels for both girls and boys. There is a playground. Our college has a canteen, which we keep clean. Our college provides free Wi-Fi, so it's a good college.

reviews.review_heading: It is my favourite college.
reviews.review_text: The quality of food is not much good. Medical facilities are good. Many indoor and outdoor sports and games facilities are available.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied with this college because of its faculty members.
reviews.review_text: Our facilities are very good. Wi-Fi ie Jio fiber is enabled. All subject laboratory is provided, and the instrument is available. All classrooms are clean and fresh. The library is good. All types of food are available in our canteen.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied only with the faculty members.
reviews.review_text: I am a day scholar so I do not know about hostel facilities. The infrastructure is very good. Laboratory facilities are not good. The college canteen is also not up to the mark. But overall the college is good. There are two canteens on the campus. One of the canteens provides fresh food. But another is not up to the mark, and it provides low-quality foods.

reviews.review_heading: Our college surroundings are very good, and it all depends on students study for a job.
reviews.review_text: In our college, the Wi-Fi connection is very good. Laboratories, classrooms, and libraries all are very comfortable for studies. The hostel facility is good, and the food served is also very good in our college. The canteen's food quality is good. Sports and games are also conducted in our college every year. Medical facilities are available.

reviews.review_heading: Satisfied regarding the infrastructure and the placements of 2021 in this pandemic situation.
reviews.review_text: Classrooms, labs have good infrastructure. Sports and games events are held very successfully. Hostel facilities with indoor games are available. Quality of food is also decent. The non veg food is of different varieties and tasty too. There's dessert too in the meals.

reviews.review_heading: Our college provides good infrastructure as well as technical and non-technical faculty members.
reviews.review_text: Supreme Knowledge Foundation Group of Institution provides facilities like Wi-Fi, digital labs, digital classroom and digital library with the air-conditioned facility. The hostel rooms are good with study material and study room. The food served in the canteen is good, and the quantity is less. Medical facilities are good.

Students can choose Full Time programmes from streams such as Engineering, Business & Management Studies and IT & Software. At the UG level, students can choose the available programmes such as B.E. / B.Tech, BCA and BBA. Talking about PG level, some of the available courses include MBA/PGDM and MCA. The fee structure for the JMIT - Seth Jai Parkash Mukand Lal Institute of Engineering and Technology programmes is around INR 1,15,620 to 3,64,000.

faqs.answer: A:    JMIT - Seth Jai Parkash Mukand Lal Institute of Engineering and Technology has courses such as BBA, BCA, MCA, B.Tech, MBA/PGDM which are primarily in the stream of Business & Management Studies, IT & Software, Engineering. JMIT - Seth Jai Parkash Mukand Lal Institute of Engineering and Technology has specializations such as B.Tech specializations in Chemical Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Information Technology, Mechanical Engineering.

faqs.answer: A:    Courses offerred by JMIT - Seth Jai Parkash Mukand Lal Institute of Engineering and Technology are approved by eminent Government bodies like AICTE. reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2026
reviews_list.review_title: Good placements & faculty.

review_content.Placements: Our batch (B.Teach CSE 2022-2026) had around an 80% placement rate. Highest package offered was 15 LPA, average hovered around 5-6 LPA, and lowest was around 3 LPA. Companies like TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Accenture, and Capgemini visited for recruitment. Some core roles, like Software Engineer, Data Analyst, and Cloud Associate were offered. Around 60% of students also got internships, mostly in IT firms and a few startups. Placement cell organized training sessions, coding practice, and mock interviews that were very useful.
review_content.Infrastructure: Infrastructure for CSE students is fairly good with modern computer labs, table Wi-Fi across the campus, and project facilities in dedicated innovation labs. Library is well-stocked with reference books and digital journals. Hostel is decent with double occupancy rooms, regular cleaning, and access to purified drinking water. Food quality in the mess is average but hygienic, while the canteen offers affordable alternatives. Sports grounds, gym facilities, and a medical center with 24/7 availability add to the comfort of hostel life.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2026
reviews_list.review_title: You can opt for JMIT if you are local and don't have good JEE score, as it's best in Yamunanagar.

review_content.Placements: Overall, it is average college. Placements are quite down from the last 2 years. Limited companies are coming for campus placement, and giving 3 LPA - 4 LPA package. No MNCs hire students. CSE students are going to non-tech roles. Hardly 4-5 students from one batch get internships that too off-campus. The highest package they show of 36 LPA by Amazon off campus, and 3 years ago.
review_content.Infrastructure: Hostel is good, you will get AC rooms, one seater, two seater, 3 seater but if we talk about the hostel/mess food, it's quite average or we can directly say it's of low quality. Hostel have a common area to watch TV/sports, etc. There is a small ground to play games like badminton or volleyball.

answer.text: JMIT - Seth Jai Parkash Mukand Lal Institute of Engineering and Technology has been rated 3.5 on placements on the basis of 260 reviews done by students. In JMIT - Seth Jai Parkash Mukand Lal Institute of Engineering and Technology, 397 students were admitted in year 2015-16, out of which 231 graduated in 2018-19. From this, 201 qualified students got placed with a median salary of INR 300000 and 7 students got selected for higher studies. In year 2016-17, 384 students were admitted, out of which 176 graduated in 2019-20. From this, 172 qualified students got placed with a median salary of INR 300000 and 4 students got selected for higher studies. In year 2017-18, 283 students were admitted, out of which 286 graduated in 2020-21. From this, 177 qualified students got placed with a median salary of INR 370000 and 14 students got selected for higher studies.

review_summary.college_name: JMIT - Seth Jai Parkash Mukand Lal Institute of Engineering and Technology Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: Satisfied with college.

content.Placements: Placements are average if you have skills you will get guaranteed placements. Teachers are also helpful in nature, they will also help in preparing for the interview. Focus on learning the skill, and the job will automatically reach you. If you want to join our college, its a great choice.
content.Infrastructure: The college and the infrastructure of the course are beautiful. In our college there are two grounds present, one is the sports ground and the other is the main ground. The inbuilt big library, the computer labs, and the mess where the discolor and the hosteler can both eat food.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2026
individual_reviews.title: Good placements, decent infra & campus life.

content.Placements: Placements are quite good with many reputed companies like TCS, Wipro, Infosys, and Accenture visiting the campus. About 70-80% of students in our batch got placed. Highest package offered was around 12 LPA, and average stayed between 4 and 5 LPA. Internships were also offered by companies like Cognizant and Capgemini. Training and placement cell regularly arranges workshops, coding tests, and mock interviews to improve placement readiness.
content.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is decent with well-equipped labs, Wi-Fi-enabled campus, and spacious classrooms. Central library has good resources and online journals. Hostels are fine, with average quality mess food, but they are hygienic. Sports and medical facilities are available. Canteen food is affordable and good for daily use.

content.Infrastructure: Infrastructure for CSE students is fairly good with modern computer labs, table Wi-Fi across the campus, and project facilities in dedicated innovation labs. Sports grounds, gym facilities, and a medical center with 24/7 availability add to the comfort of hostel life.

individual_reviews.title: It is the best college in my life.

content.Placements: 100 percent of students from my course are placed. The highest salary package is 10 LPA while the average package is approximately 4 LPA. The most sought-after roles offered in my batch are software developer, web developer and data analyst.

placement_data.title: JMIT - Seth Jai Parkash Mukand Lal Institute of Engineering and Technology Placement overview
paragraphs: Seth Jai Parkash Mukand Lal Inst. of Engineering & Technology (commonly known as JMIT Radaur) successfully concluded the placements drive for 2022. According to the official website, 237 students were placed and a total of 98 students were waiting for the result of their placements. The highest package offered during JMIT Radaur placements 2022 was recorded to be INR 10.25 LPA, whereas the lowest package stood at INR 2.40 LPA. The average package offered during the placements drive was INR 3.50 LPA

A total of 358 offers were made by more than 40 on-campus and 5 off-campus companies. Some of the top recruiting companies included Nagarro, Bebo Technologies, Wipro and TCS, among various others. A company-wise bifurcation of the placements is given in the table below for reference:

hostel_campus.college_name: JMIT - Seth Jai Parkash Mukand Lal Institute of Engineering and Technology Infrastructure Details & Reviews

facilities: Affilated with KUK most famous university in the area.
Strong Placement record with frequent recruiters include TCS, INFOSYS, WIPRO and Dynamic Monk.

reviews.review_heading: Satisfied  with  college.
reviews.review_text: The college and the infrastructure of the course are beautiful. In our college there are two grounds present, one is the sports ground and the other is the main ground. The inbuilt big library, the computer labs, and the mess where the discolor and the hosteler can both eat food.

reviews.review_heading: Good placements, decent infra & campus life.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure is decent with well-equipped labs, Wi-Fi-enabled campus, and spacious classrooms. Central library has good resources and online journals. Hostels are fine, with average quality mess food, but they are hygienic. Sports and medical facilities are available. Canteen food is affordable and good for daily use.

reviews.review_heading: Good placements & faculty.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure for CSE students is fairly good with modern computer labs, table Wi-Fi across the campus, and project facilities in dedicated innovation labs. Library is well-stocked with reference books and digital journals. Hostel is decent with double occupancy rooms, regular cleaning, and access to purified drinking water. Food quality in the mess is average but hygienic, while the canteen offers affordable alternatives. Sports grounds, gym facilities, and a medical center with 24/7 availabil...

reviews.review_heading: You can opt for JMIT if you are local and don't have good JEE score, as it's best in Yamunanagar.
reviews.review_text: Hostel is good, you will get AC rooms, one seater, two seater, 3 seater but if we talk about the hostel/mess food, it's quite average or we can directly say it's of low quality. Hostel have a common area to watch TV/sports, etc. There is a small ground to play games like badminton or volleyball.

reviews.review_heading: It is the best college in my life.
reviews.review_text: The facilities and infrastructure are very nic.e Wi-Fi, labs, and classrooms are available and maintainable for students. The mess and canteens are very good and the quality of the food is very nice. Sport and extra activity are very good. They conduct competition like technovanza.

reviews.review_heading: All things are very good and memorable.
reviews.review_text: Facilities and infrastructure are excellent. Sports facilities are very good. After free time and at the end of the lectures, we play and the medical facilities are also very good. Quality of water and food is very good in the girls hostel. All things are managed nicely.

reviews.review_heading: Overall, it is one of the best universities for MBA.
reviews.review_text: You could readily access all of amenities at this college thanks to its outstanding infrastructure. The college library was good, and students could eat delicious meals at the cafeteria and mess. All administrative tasks could be completed online thanks to the college’s online ERP, which offered numerous advantages to students.

reviews.review_heading: My life's greatest college.
reviews.review_text: Our department or course has good infrastructure and facilities. The college also offers its students air conditioning in every classroom, smart classrooms, a well-maintained library, computer labs, and subject labs. Our hostels' amenities are of high quality, and the food served in the canteen and mess is also of high quality.

reviews.review_heading: All over the best college in this state.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure is very nice. Facilities given by the college are in proper manner and best for the students and positive attractive environment because of many stress and lovely infrastructure. Hostel facilities are very good. We have proper 24X7 light, water, medical, and all facilities given by them.

reviews.review_heading: The college is very good for placements and fun activities, and the Personality Development (PD) dep
reviews.review_text: The college has excellent infrastructure with new advancements, including the installation of a lift for both teachers and students. The facilities are very good, and the staff, including teachers and the warden, are always supportive and up-to-date. However, the quality of mess food is average, and medical facilities need improvement.

reviews.review_heading: The best college of my life.
reviews.review_text: There are 21 hostels among which anyone can be allotted to a candidate. The hostels are generally equipped with basic facilities and are generally comprised of twin-sharing rooms. Each hostel has its food canteen where breakfast, lunch, snacks, and dinner are provided daily. There are ample options for vegetarian as well as non-vegetarian candidates.

reviews.review_heading: Jmit the beginning of coding .
reviews.review_text: All classes and library are available. Students can access Wi-Fi and the quality of the classes is very top-notch. Classrooms have AC. The quality of mess food is average, one can pay Rs. 50 for one time. College has 2 grounds one is small and one is big, there is an audit also.

reviews.review_heading: The college review of- JMIT.
reviews.review_text: The facilities and infrastructure available for your course/department are good. All classes having AC, smart classes, a well-maintained library, computer, and subject labs are also provided by the college to the students. The quality of the facilities in your hostel, the quality of food available in the mess and canteen is also good.

reviews.review_heading: The best college of my life.
reviews.review_text: Rooms (my room, hostel 15) were clean and decently sized. Mess food was served 4 times a day and was decent for the price. They attempted to include a wide variety of cultures across India in the meals. Registration, room allotment, and mess registration happened seamlessly during admission and I had no issues with it. Hostel fees are included with tuition fees when we pay per semester. Most students lived on campus. Some of the holder boys' hostels were a bit small and needed to be revamped.

reviews.review_heading: JMIT [ review college ]. .
reviews.review_text: Well-maintained classrooms, full AC, and labs are also available on campus with a good network. The library is also available with book facilities and Wi-Fi. The canteen is also well-maintained. I didn’t take a hostel in college because I am a day scholar since my hometown is nearby.

review_summarisation.heading: What students say about JMIT - Seth Jai Parkash Mukand Lal Institute of Engineering and Technology

likes.text: Many companies like TCS, Infosys, Wipro, etc., visit our college for placements.
Our college is best compared to engineering colleges in Haryana in terms of placements because the college invites TCS, HCL, Wipro, Accenture, IBM and Concentrix every year for placements.

faqs.answer: The DPharma degree from Bhagwant University is 100% valid. The university is recognised by the University Grants Commission (UGC). It is also an ISO-9001-certified and JEE-listed University. Bhagwant University is a member of the Association of Indian Universities (AIU), Federation of Indian Chambers of Commerce and Industry (FICCI), Indian Association of Physiotherapists (AIP), and All India Management Association (AIMA).Therefore, after completing DPharma degree from Bhagwant University, students can legally pursue a variety of careers in the public and private sectors. Students can go for further education in the fields of Pharmacys such as Bachelor's in Pharmacy (BPharma).

overview_faqs.question: Is Bhagwant University DPharma degree valid or not?
overview_faqs.answer: The DPharma degree from Bhagwant University is 100% valid. The university is recognised by the University Grants Commission (UGC). It is also an ISO-9001-certified and JEE-listed University. Bhagwant University is a member of the Association of Indian Universities (AIU), Federation of Indian Chambers of Commerce and Industry (FICCI), Indian Association of Physiotherapists (AIP), and All India Management Association (AIMA).Therefore, after completing DPharma degree from Bhagwant University, students can legally pursue a variety of careers in the public and private sectors. Students can go for further education in the fields of Pharmacys such as Bachelor's in Pharmacy (BPharma).

overview_faqs.question: Is pursuing B.Tech at Bhagwant University Ajmer (BUA) expensive?
overview_faqs.answer: The cost of a B.Tech at Bhagwant University Ajmer can be said as expensive.Total fees per year is around 2.3 L - 3.1 L. Admission is done through JEE Main or CUET exam with 45 percent required in graduation.There are 30-60 seats available in each specialisation of B.Tech.

overview_faqs.question: What is the fee for BSc at Bhagwant University?
overview_faqs.answer: The overall fee for BSc at Bhagwant University ranges from INR 75,000- INR 4.5 lakh. The BSc fee varies throughout the specialisations candidates want to apply in. Applicants must pay the course fee at the final stage of the admission procedure confirming their admission. The BSc fees include multiple fee components such as caution deposit, incidental expenses, and alumni membership. This fee amount is as per the official website/sanctioning body. It is still subject to changes and hence, is indicative.

overview_faqs.question: What is the fee for BTech at Bhagwant University?
overview_faqs.answer: The fee for BTech at Bhagwant University ranges from INR 2.35 Lacs - INR 3.1 lakh. Candidates after selection need to pay Bhagwant University course fees for seat confirmation. The BTech fees include multiple fee components such as caution deposit, incidental expenses, and alumni membership. This fee amount is as per the official website/sanctioning body. It is still subject to changes and hence, is indicative.

review_summary.college_name: Bhagwant University Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: Bachelor of Pharmacy (B.Pharm.) - Batch of 2029
individual_reviews.title: My college is overall very good.

content.Placements: More than 1000 students every year pass out. In my college, the highest package is 10 Lacs, and the lowest package is more than 2 Lacs. In my college, the highest-paid company is Tata, and there are more than 10 companies. My college offers more than 80 percent internships.
content.Infrastructure: In my college, the faculty is very awesome.My college Wi-Fi is very stable and has good internet. My college has a very clean and calm environment. My college library is good.
content.Faculty: My college teachers are very helpful and have very good knowledge in particular subjects. B pharmacy is relevant to my career. My college students are ready for industry. The semester exams are moderate, and is relevant to my subjects.

individual_reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA) - Batch of 2025
individual_reviews.title: Say no to admission to Bhagwant University.

content.Placements: They only conduct the placement job fair for a whole year, and companies come into that fair to give us job opportunities, so students gain the opportunity as it is, without getting an approach from outside the campus. It is a 1-day process, and the results will get to you soon after 2 working days.
content.Infrastructure: BU has two big premises, one for engineering and the other for BCA students named AIT. Both are separated by some distance, and they conduct semester-wise exams and get the results according to the attendance of the students. All teachers are crowded on the college premises.

individual_reviews.course: B.A. LLB - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: It is a good college with average faculty members and infrastructure.

content.Placements: As a fresher, I'm unaware of recruiting companies. Internships are provided to students at NGOs or district courts.
content.Infrastructure: Classrooms are good. Wi-Fi is available in the library. The quality of food served in the hostel is good. Law faculty members organise every kind of sport. Canteen should be maintained hygienically and the food is average.
content.Faculty: Teachers in our college are helpful and kind. They teach students from scratch of the course. The course curriculum teaches the basics of the course and is enough for the field. Semester exams are averagely difficult, so students need some practice. The pass percentage is 33%.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering - Batch of 2021
individual_reviews.title: My college makes great engineers like me.

content.Placements: There are 60 % students placed every year. The highest package is 8 LPA and the lowest is 4.8 LPA. Maruti suzuki is the top recruiter. Many students got internship from our department.
content.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure available for Electrical and electronics department are the best. The library is also perfect. The faculty of my college are fully educated and humble in nature.
content.Faculty: The inspection of exams is very strict and no one can cheat in the exams. Discipline is maintained. The semester exams are conducted from time to time. Our faculty helps students in the exams.

individual_reviews.course: Integrated B.Sc. B.Ed. - Batch of 2022
individual_reviews.title: Our university has good faculty members, good infrastructure, and facilities.

content.Infrastructure: The hostel is quite good. Overall, our university provides all the facilities.
content.Faculty: Faculty members are quite good. They are helpful, well-qualified, and extremely knowledgeable. Our course curriculum is also good. There is no difficulty in exams. The quality of teaching is very good.
content.Other: Everything is good at this college. There are many students. Great events are organised.

admission_overview.college_name: Bhagwant University Admission 2025 (Open): Courses, Eligibility, Fee & Selection

admission_process.title: Bhagwant University Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: Bhagwant Unversity admiission process 2025is both merit and entrance-based. Bhagwant University has 12 distinct faculties, including Agriculture, Engineering & Technology, Pharmacy, Education, Law, Management, etc. These faculty collectively offer more than 49 courses at undergraduate (UG), postgraduate (PG), Diploma, Certificate, and doctoral ( PhD) levels. The main focus area ofBhagwant Universityis various streams in Aeronautical, Petroleum, and Mining Engineering, Agriculture Science, Education, programmess. The courses offered by Bhagwant University are approved by BCI, NCTE, PCI, and AICTE.

Bhagwant University offers various programs in full-time mode. The programs are undergraduate, postgraduate, doctoral, and Diploma levels. Bhagwant University's selection process for various courses is both merit-based and entrance examination-based. Find the Bhagwant University admission details below:

Before applying to Bhagwant University, aspirants must ensure that they are meeting the eligibility requirements set by the university. For undergraduate admission, students must have passed Class 12 with a valid percentage. The selection criteria for various undergraduate programmes are merit-based. Bhagwant University fees include multiple components admission fees, tuition fees, hostel fees, exam fees, lab fees, and other charges.

Coming to affordability, it is one of the reasons why many students leave a degree or a college. While the availability of student loans and financial aid has made education accessible but the requirements to become eligible for a loan or a scholarship often stand as a challenge. Below areBhagwant University tuition feesalong with average package details for popular courses:

The reservation policy for students belonging to Economically Weaker Sections (EWS) categories is 10%. Students belonging to categories such as Schedule caste and Schedule Tribe range between 12% to 16%. The reservation policy will be applicable as per the Government of India. Find below the reservation details about Bhagwant University seat reservations:
*Reservation (%)
Note: Candidates must note that this information is sourced from*various resourcesand is subject to change.

If candidates are able to fulfill the eligibility mentioned above criteria, they can apply online for admission to the Bhagwant University course. The admission process at Bhagwant University Rajasthan includes various stages such as application, selection round, document verification, and more. Follow the below admission procedure of the university:
Step 1: Bhagwant University Application
Interested aspirants can apply only online on the official website (bhagwantuniversity.ac.in/admission_rules) along with an application fee of INR 600 for the undergraduate and postgraduate courses.
Step 2: Selection round

Aspirants will be shortlisted based on their performance in the last qualifying examination for DPharma, BSc, B.Ed, etc. At the same time, admission for BTech, BPharma, and MBA requires a valid score in the entrance examination.
Step 3: Final Admission
Candidates need to submit the required documents along with the admission fee to secure a seat at Bhagwant University.

courses_data.description: Bhagwant University provides a full Time BE/BTech programme that takes four years to complete. To be admitted to this programme, students must have good scores in the JEE Main exam. Here is more information about the eligibility requirements, selection criteria, and fees for Bhagwant University BE/BTech admission. Bhagwant University offers several UG programmes in diverse streams such as Engineering, Management, Applied Sciences, Pharmacy, Arts, Commerce, etc. Admission to the majority of UG programmes is either based on UJET score or candidate's score in previous qualifying exam. The University follows a semester pattern for all its courses. However, the duration of all these programmes differ from course-to-course. An overview of all Bhagwant University UG programmes is listed in the tables below: Bhagwant University BTech admission is based on a candidate's score in UJET/ ENAT/JEE Main. The course duration for the programme is four years, comprising eight semesters. The University offers ten specialisations under its BTech programme with a collective seat intake of 630 students annually.

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission into Bhagwant University for MBA?
faqs.answer: Direct admission into the Bhagwant University for an MBA course is not applicable. As per the admission guidelines admission to the management course is subject to valid scores in the last qualifying exam and entrance exam. The university accepts national-level exams such as CAT, and XAT. MAT, UJET, or ENAT. Therefore, candidates must make sure to apply for the mentioned exams and pass the exam.

faqs.question: Does Bhagwant University offer MBA programme?
faqs.answer: Yes, Bhagwant University offers an MBA/PGDM programme for graduates in both full-time and part-time mode. The full-time programme is of two-year duration while the part-time MBA is a three-year programme. MBA at Bhagwant University is also available in an integrated programme namely Integrated B.Tech. + MBA andIntegrated BBA + MBA.

courses_data.name: Bhagwant University PhD Admission 2025
courses_data.description: Bhagwant University offers a five -year PhD and one-and-a-half-year MPhil programme in various streams. Eligible applicants should score more than 40 percent in the entrance test to pass. Shortlisted candidates are further called for a research-based presentation round in which they should score more than 35 percent to qualify for admission. However, the University also exempts the candidates from university-level entrance test for those withCSIR NET/UGC NET/GATE/ SLET score. Such applicants are directly eligible for the presentation round. Find below the MPhil & PhD specialisations & their eligibility criteria: PhD Programmes Agriculture Science Pharmacy Management Computer Application Humanities and Applied Sciences Engineering & Technology

faqs.question: How can I get admission in Bhagwant University?
faqs.answer: Bhagwant University (BUA Ajmer) admission is both merit and entrance-based. Before applying to the BUA, candidates must ensure that they are meeting the eligibility set by the university. For UG admission, candidates must have passed Class 12 from a recognised board in the relevant specialisation. Programmes such as BPharma, BTech, MBA and PhD requires to appear for the entrance exam.Eligible candidatrs can apply online on the official website of the university. At the time of final admission confirmation, Candidates need to submit the required documents along with the admission fee to secure a seat at Bhawant University.

faqs.question: Does Bhagwant University accept CUET score for admissions?
faqs.answer: As per the official website, Bhagwant University acceptsJEE main/GATE/MAT/CAT exam for admission.  The university may accepts the CUET UG for few courses admission. The CUET UG registration process 2025 for admission to UG courses will commence tentatively during the last week of Feb 2025.

faqs.question: Is CUET exam registration open?
faqs.answer: Yes, Common University Entrance Test (CUET) 2026 registration commenced at cuet.nta.nic.in. NTA released the CUET 2026 notification on January 03. Soon after the release of the CUET official notification, theCUET registration 2026process has commenced online at the official website. Candidates willing to appear for the CUET 2026 exam must have completed complete the application form online. Additionally, before filling application form, candidates must make sure that they have fulfilled the prescribedCUET eligibility criteriato qualify for the entrance exam.

highlights.description: Bhagwant University is one of the India’s top ranked institutes. It is considered as a leading institute by national ranking bodies. As per India Today 2025, the institute has been ranked #73 under the University (Private) category. The institute is well known for its excellent academic offerings and top faculty. Candidates can go through the following to know more details around Bhagwant University rankings.

hostel_campus.college_name: Bhagwant University Infrastructure Details & Reviews

hostel.description:
University has fully furnished separate hostel facilities for boys and girls. These are supported by an excellent mess, common room, STD-PCO, internet access, canteen, provision store, medical assistance, and to and fro transport facility to Railway Station/Bus Station during official breaks. Both the hostels are Air Cooled and have double/triple seated rooms. The unique feature of girl’s hostel is the availability of pantry with microwave, refrigerator and dry kitchen facility.
Specially designed AC hostel is also available for the foreign student which fulfills the requirement of continental food and comfortable stay.
facilities: MDSU Ajmer is a public institution whereas Bhagwant University is a goverment institution.
Bhagwant University focuses on more technical and professional courses whereas M

library.description:
Bhagwant University's library has a collection of 95,000 printed books (with more than 3675 titles) which includes textbooks and reference books in the field of Engineering and Technology, Agriculture, Law, Sciences and Humanities, English Literature and Fiction. It subscribes to 69 magazines and has DELNET subscription.
The library provides regular membership to all the students, faculty members and employees of the Institute and also provides various services such as book bank facility, e-learning through NPTEL, virtual labs, e-newspapers, etc.

reviews.review_heading: My college is overall very good.
reviews.review_text: In my college, the faculty is very awesome.My college Wi-Fi is very stable and has good internet. My college has a very clean and calm environment. My college library is good.

reviews.review_heading: Say no to admission to Bhagwant University.
reviews.review_text: BU has two big premises, one for engineering and the other for BCA students named AIT. Both are separated by some distance, and they conduct semester-wise exams and get the results according to the attendance of the students. All teachers are crowded on the college premises.

reviews.review_heading: It is a good college with average faculty members and infrastructure.
reviews.review_text: Classrooms are good. Wi-Fi is available in the library. The quality of food served in the hostel is good. Law faculty members organise every kind of sport. Canteen should be maintained hygienically and the food is average.

reviews.review_heading: My college makes great engineers like me.
reviews.review_text: The facilities and infrastructure available for Electrical and electronics department are the best. The library is also perfect. The faculty of my college are fully educated and humble in nature.

reviews.review_heading: Our university has good faculty members, good infrastructure, and facilities.
reviews.review_text: The hostel is quite good. Overall, our university provides all the facilities.

reviews.review_heading: Its infrastructure is good, in 2019 I got a placement.
reviews.review_text: We have Wi-Fi and a library. The hostel room was spacious, quality of food is average. The ground was there, with bar hanging, and calisthenics sets. Hospital is near our college. ATMs were near our college. Good greenery view of campus. Good maintenance of the garden. Good north Indian food.

reviews.review_heading: This is the worst college.
reviews.review_text: There are only two faculty in our course. There is a gas chamber. Wi-Fi is available. The classrooms are average. The library is good, but the library incharge is bad. We got water, food, beds, and fans, but there is a lot of ragging in the hostel. The food is average in the mess and canteen. Sports and games are good.

reviews.review_heading: There is the best environment and facilities.
reviews.review_text: There were Wi-Fi and labs facilities. Moreover, there was a field for practicals. Facilities in the hostel are extremely good, but the problem is we need to adjust to the food. There were enough medical facilities for us and a canteen and a ground for games and sports. There was a special week for only sports and games in a month.

reviews.review_heading: My experience in 2017-21.
reviews.review_text:
Infrastructure is good in agricultural engineering.
But faculty is not enough in numbers.
Hostel is also good but there is also issue of food in hostel.
Labs are also not that good. 
So if you want to study here you have to learn from any other place like training place.

reviews.review_heading: I am disappointed because there are no qualified teachers.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi is available only for staff but in hostel, students can use Wi-Fi. But very slow speed. Library is available for all students. But 100 INR are charged to get library pass. Canteen is good. Medical facility was average. No sport equipment is provided by the college.

reviews.review_heading: I love our Bhagwant University.
reviews.review_text: Our college has a high infrastructure, many blocks, many classrooms and labs. There are a huge gallery and a huge lush green area. Our hostels are huge, and the warden is very good because he helps. Overall, I love my college life, and I missed it very much.

reviews.review_heading: I am not satisfied with the college.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of our college is good. The campus is huge, including all facilities. The college provides all laboratories like a chemistry lab, physics lab and bio lab with all necessary equipment. Sports facilities are also available, and also many sports competitions are organised by the college. Food served in the canteen is good. The canteen is clean, good and spacious.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Bhagwant University Ajmer (BUA).
reviews.review_text: University provides all sorts of resources for an ideal student who wants to gain knowledge and skills. Library, labs, canteen, gym hall, sports facilities, etc., are available on the campus. The building has a lift for disabled students. Gym hall has all the equipment, which is needed to maintain fitness. Sports teacher is available if you are interested in any games. For academic excellence, teachers are available for 24x7 coaching.

reviews.review_heading: I'm fully satisfied with our university and also with our faculty for a better future.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of our university is quite good enough, and it looks beautiful. I also love my college. Infrastructure is also very much important for the new students who come to take admission. If the infrastructure is not good, then students can reject and may not take the admission.

reviews.review_heading: All of than it is a wonderful college.
reviews.review_text: The college faculty members are good. All of them are well-experienced. All the instruments are available in labs, and many good instruments, CNC machine also are available in this college for students. Many students take a class in the lab as it's useful in upcoming manufacturing.

faqs.answer: A:    Gnanam School of Business MBA fee structure includes various components such as tuition fees and one-time payment. These components provide the total sum of the course fees. faqs.question: Q: What is the eligibility for admission to MBA at Gnanam School of Business?

faqs.answer: Gnanam School of Business offers an MBA based on merit and entrance. Therefore, candidates must secure a minimum aggregate of 50% in graduation and secure a valid score in accepted entrance exams such as CAT/ XAT/MAT/ CMAT/ ATMA and other national-level entrance exams. eligibility_selection.description: GSB offers admission in MBA programmes based on entrance exam scores. Candidates must also fulfil the eligibility requirements for admission. Below are the Gnanam School of Business courses along with their eligibility and selection criteria:

courses_table.eligibility: Graduation with a minimum of 50% aggregate (45% aggregate for OBC/ SC/ ST)

faqs.answer: Yes, Gnanam School of Business provides relaxation of 5% in the aggregate to candidates belonging to SC/ ST/ OBC category. Such aspirants are required to complete graduation with a minimum of 45% aggregate to apply for MBA. For all other categories, a minimum of 50% is required.
faqs.question: Is there any relaxation in the aggregate for SC/ ST candidates at Gnanam School of Business?

faqs.answer: Gnanam School of Business offers MBA at the PG level. The minimum qualification to apply for the course is graduation with at least 50% aggregate. Hence, completing Class 12 is not enough to get admission in the school. There is a 5% relaxation in the aggregate for SC, ST and OBC candidates,
faqs.question: Is 60% in Class 12 enough to get admission in Gnanam School of Business?

admission_process.title: Gnanam School of Business Admission process 2025

paragraphs: Gnanam School of Business admissions are currently open for 2025 session. Candidates first have to apply for the course online. Below are the steps to get a seat in the school:
Step 1: Gnanam School of Business Application Process 2025

The mode of application is online and offline. Aspirants have to first register to generate login credentials. After registration, candidates have to fill out the application form. Aspirants have to pay an application fee of INR 1,000 to apply for MBA.
Step 2: Selection
The school selects candidates for MBA programme based on their scores in CAT, XAT, MAT, CMAT or ATMA. Selected aspirants may further be called for other selection rounds.
Step 3: Admission Confirmation

After the selection process is over, the school informs the candidates about their admission status. Selected aspirants have to pay theGnanam School of Business feeto confirm their seat in the school.

courses_data.name: Gnanam School of Business MBA Admission 2025
courses_data.description: Gnanam School of Businessoffers a two-year full-time residential MBA programme at the PG level. The course is spread across four semesters. The institute offers MBA with Dual Specialisation in Marketing, Finance, HR, Operations and Systems & Business Analytics. Aspirants must complete their graduation with a minimum of 50% aggregate to apply for MBA. There is a 5% relaxation in the aggregate for SC/ ST/ OBC candidates. The selection for MBA programme is based on entrance-exam score obtained by the candidates.

faqs.question: Which MBA specialisations does Gnanam School of Business offer?
faqs.answer: Gnanam School of Business offers two-year full-time MBA programme with Dual Sepcialisation. During the course, students have to choose a specialisation. Below are the MBA specialisations available at GSB:MarketingFinanceHROperationsSystems & Business Analytics

faqs.question: Is CAT score required for admission to MBA at Gnanam School of Business?
faqs.answer: CAT is one of the accepting exams for admission to Gnanam School of Business MBA. However, aspirants with a valid score in MAT, CMAT, ATMA or XAT can also apply for admission. Besides entrance exam, aspirants should also complete graduation with a minimum of 50% aggregate for admission to MBA programme.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility for admission to MBA at Gnanam School of Business?
faqs.answer: Candidates need to complete graduation with a minimum of 50% aggregate (45% aggregate for OBC/ SC/ ST) to apply for MBA at Gnanam School of Business. Aspirants must hold the documents proving their eligibility for verification at the time of admission. Besides, candidates must also have a valid score in CAT, MAT, CMAT, ATMA, etc.

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission to GSB?
faqs.answer: Gnanam School of Business does not offer direct admission. The selection for MBA programme is based on scores in national-level entrance exams. The school accepts CAT, MAT, XAT, CMAT or ATMA scores for admission. Shortlisted candidates may further have to participate in other selection rounds. Further, aspirants have to pay the course fee to confirm their seat in the school.

faqs.question: Are Gnanam School of Business admissions open?
faqs.answer: Yes, Gnanam School of Business admissions are open for 2025 session. The school offers admission based on entrance-exam scores. Admission to the flagship MBA course is done based on the performance of the candidates in the national-level entrance exams such as CAT/ XAT/ MAT/ CMAT/ ATMA scores. Candidates can apply online for admission at GSB.

faqs.question: How can I apply for admission to Gnanam School of Business in Thanjavur?
faqs.answer: Candidates can apply for admission through the official website of Gnanam School of Business. The Institute offers MBA on the basis of merit and entrance. Therefore, candidates must apply for the valid entrance exams and then apply for the admission process at GSB, Thanjavur. After a successful application process, candidates will be shortlisted based on valid scores of CAT/ MAT/ XAT/ CMAT/ ATMA etc. For the final admission, candidates must pay the fees and confirm the respective seat.
