hostel_campus.college_name: Gnanam School of Business Infrastructure Details & Reviews

reviews.review_heading: Really good infrastructure and facilities.
reviews.review_text: Hostel facilities are good. The campus has well-maintained facilities, especially the library, which has a vast collection of books and journals. The hostel rooms are well maintained. The quality of education and placement justify the expenses we have spent.

reviews.review_heading: Our college is very pleasant.
reviews.review_text: In our classrooms, around 60 students can accommodate easily. Wi-Fi, library, and computer laboratory are available. The internet connection is good in this college but sometimes the speed is slow. We can also play table tennis. Sports are also conducted like carrom and chess. We can also play cricket on Sunday.

reviews.review_heading: Our college provides good infrastructure and facilities.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi is available in our college It also provides a decent laboratory. Classrooms are well-maintained. The library is also good. The quality of the hostel is good. Hostel rooms are cleaned every day. Food and tea are provided on time. Sports like GPL cricket are also conducted.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Gnanam School of Business.
reviews.review_text: GSB has a green environment all around. The infrastructure is also good. It also provides a digital library. Computer laboratory is available. Gym is also provided. The campus is Wi-Fi enabled. Hostel facilities are good. Our campus is very clean. The food quality is good. Both vegetarian and non-vegetarian food items are available in food courts. Hostels are also clean.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied with its infrastructure and facilities.
reviews.review_text: GSB has good infrastructure. The facilities are also better. It has the required equipment. Classrooms are also well-maintained. Apart from theoretical learning, we can also gather in-depth knowledge from other academic and non-academic activities to improve our skills. Hostel facilities are very good. Our campus environment is also good.

reviews.review_heading: I am highly satisfied with this college.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is very good in our college. Wi-Fi is average. The food quality is better. Sports and games are conducted yearly.

reviews.review_heading: I am highly satisfied with its infrastructure.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is very good. Wi-Fi is also enabled. The food quality is also better. Hostel facilities are very good. Sports and games are conducted every year.

reviews.review_heading: This college is good at teaching. We can also learn academic and non-academic activities.
reviews.review_text: Computers are available for students with high-speed internet. We also have a good library, and several books are available. Classrooms are well-maintained with projectors. Classrooms are also air-conditioned. In the hostel, we have indoor games like carrom and table tennis.

reviews.review_heading: Our college provides good infrastructure for education.
reviews.review_text: I am very satisfied with this college. Our campus has eco-friendly environment. The infrastructure is also better. Wi-Fi connection is average. The food quality is also good. Sports and games are conducted yearly.

reviews.review_heading: I am very satisfied with its faculty members.
reviews.review_text: The facilities are very good. The infrastructure is better. Our campus environment is green all around because students need a positive mindset before attaining classes. Wi-Fi is enabled. Laboratory, classrooms, library, ground, playing room, gym, canteen, and cafeteria are also available in this college.

reviews.review_heading: This college is very good for professionalism.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is good. Wi-Fi is enabled on our campus. Laboratory and classrooms are better. Our campus is clean. It also provides a digital library because of the poor network connections it cannot be used properly. The food served in the hostel is very good. They also provide Kerala rice for Malayalam students.

reviews.review_heading: Our college provides good infrastructure.
reviews.review_text: All facilities are available in this college. The infrastructure is also excellent. Library, computer laboratory, cafeteria, conference hall, tutorial room, and auditorium are available. Classrooms are well-maintained, and around 65 students can sit comfortably. It also provides smart boards and a stage with a podium. Wi-Fi is available. Mess hall is common for all students, and hot water is also available. There will certain time limit for food availability and students must visit on time. Host...

reviews.review_heading: Review of Gnanam School of Business.
reviews.review_text: Our campus environment is very good. We have a resourceful library with a lot of books and journals. Classrooms are also air-conditioned. It also provides a computer laboratory. Smart boards are available in our classrooms.

reviews.review_heading: Our college has a green environment.
reviews.review_text: I like the green environment. I've learned a lot more than my subject. Our college gives us a happy life with a lot of experience. There is a signal issue that makes us focus on our studies.

reviews.review_heading: GSB is known for quality education.
reviews.review_text: Our college has good infrastructure and a good atmosphere. GSB provides various facilities like Wi-Fi, computer lab accessibility, and a library. The hostel facility is extraordinary with a comfortable and clean environment. The food is delicious and of high quality.

highlights.summary:
The COMEDK UGET 2026 registration process has started for Adichunchanagiri Institute of Technology admission to the BE/BTech programme. The last date to register is Mar 16, 2026. Also, the COMEDK UGET exam 2026 will be held on May 9, 2026.

A few more updates are given below:

student_insights.feedback: Students can work with faculty on research projects
Offered in the final year only
Many students started their own start-ups
Strong alumni network that help with placement opportunities
Very Active and resourceful, college is also involved

fees_and_eligibility.overview: Adichunchanagiri Institute of Technology offers a wide range of programmes to students at the UG and PG levels. The college is mainly concerned with streams such as Engineering and Business & Management Studies. At the UG level, the college offers courses such as B.E. / B.Tech, BCA and BBA. At the PG level, the college offers courses such as M.E./M.Tech and MBA/PGDM. Adichunchanagiri Institute of Technology courses are offered to students in offline mode. Further, the fees structure for Adichunchanagiri Institute of Technology courses stands around INR 1,16,940 to 7,44,444.

faqs.answer: A:    The fees range for courses offerred by the Adichunchanagiri Institute of Technology is around INR 116940 - INR 654992.
faqs.question: What is the fees range for courses offerred by the Adichunchanagiri Institute of Technology?

reviews_list.batch_info: B.E. in Civil Engineering - Batch of 2024
reviews_list.review_title: Best college for engineering in Chikmagalur.

review_content.Placements: The placement in the college is very poor because every year, the maximum number of the students won't get a job in this college. So we are really fed up because of placements, especially for the civil and mechanical departments. No companies will come for placements.
review_content.Infrastructure: There is a good infrastructure, of course, provided in the college with modules. The labs are in very good condition. The library is also very good, where we can spend our time studying in the library, and it is also very peaceful. I have no idea about the college hostel because I haven't chosen the hostel.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech. in Robotics & Artificial Intelligence - Batch of 2028
reviews_list.review_title: A brief review of Adichunchungiri Institute of Technology, Chikmagalur.

review_content.Placements: 65-70% of students get placed every year in this course. The highest package is 15 LPA, the lowest package is 3 LPA, and the average package is 5-6 LPA. ABB, Google, ChatGPT, Amazon, TCS, etc., visit the campus. About 40% of students get internships in this course. The top roles offered are machine building, program development, and robotics building.
review_content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is old and nice. Classrooms are clean and connected with projectors. The campus is covered with average-speed Wi-Fi, there are many labs, and the library has every book that we need in 4 years. The faculty are good and well-educated, and everyone has at least a Ph.D. There is a canteen for students where we can get everything. The mess always has boring food, but it is tasty. For any emergency, they provide a van for the hospital. The college has a very large ground for sports and also has a gym.

answer.text: Adichunchanagiri Institute of Technology COMEDK Round 2 cutoff for Electronics & Communication Engineering is 76595 which is very close to this range. This was for general category under All India quota. Unless the candidate belongs to some other category or domicile, one can not afford to score less than this. With this rank, there is a probability of getting admission however since, the cut offs keep changing from round to round, better ranks definitely increases your chances of getting admission in Adichunchanagiri Institute of Technology.

faqs.question: Can I get admission at Adichunchanagiri Institute of Technology in BTech if my rank is between 76000 and 77000?

answer.text: Opening and Closing rank depends on the category and quota of candidates. For COMEDK Round 2 cutoff 2023, the opening rank was 51225 and closing rank was 67889 for the general category candidates under All India quota. Cut off are different when it comes to other categories or female candidates and even domicile of home state. Admission to Computer Science Engineering in Adichunchanagiri Institute of Technology is based on the scores obtained in the COMEDK entrance exam. Applicants are advised to confirm what category are they applying while checking for cut offs.

review_summary.college_name: AIT Chikkamagaluru Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: Overall, the best college in Chikmagalur.

content.Placements: About 85.2% of students got placed last year. The highest package offered is 18 LPA, and the lowest is 3 LPA. The top recruiting companies for our branch are Capgemini, BMW, Mercedes, Infosys, etc. But I’m not sure about internships because I am still studying in the 1st year.
content.Infrastructure: College has its best library and lab facilities but lacks a Wi-Fi facility. The teachers have good experience. Coming to hostel food, they provide a variety of food menus throughout the week and go according to the timetable, but also lack a Wi-Fi facility.

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering - Batch of 2026
individual_reviews.title: In our college, only one are two students will get placed.

content.Placements: The percentage required to get placed is above 6.5 CGPA. The highest package offered by companies is above 6.5 LPA. The lowest package is 3 LPA. The top companies are Infosys, Wipro, TCS, Reliance, etc. There is an understanding of fundamental concepts like analog and digital circuits, communication systems, and embedded systems.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is okay in our college. Labs are not good in our college. There is no Wi-Fi connection. Libraries are not that good in our college. The facility of hostel food is not good, and the canteen food is also not good. Sports and games are only present when events are there.

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Civil Engineering - Batch of 2024
individual_reviews.title: Best college for engineering in Chikmagalur.

content.Placements: The placement in the college is very poor because every year, the maximum number of the students won't get a job in this college. So we are really fed up because of placements, especially for the civil and mechanical departments. No companies will come for placements.
content.Infrastructure: There is a good infrastructure, of course, provided in the college with modules. The labs are in very good condition. The library is also very good, where we can spend our time studying in the library, and it is also very peaceful. I have no idea about the college hostel because I haven't chosen the hostel.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Robotics & Artificial Intelligence - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: A brief review of Adichunchungiri Institute of Technology, Chikmagalur.

content.Placements: 65-70% of students get placed every year in this course. The highest package is 15 LPA, the lowest package is 3 LPA, and the average package is 5-6 LPA. ABB, Google, ChatGPT, Amazon, TCS, etc., visit the campus. About 40% of students get internships in this course. The top roles offered are machine building, program development, and robotics building.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is old and nice. Classrooms are clean and connected with projectors. The campus is covered with average-speed Wi-Fi, there are many labs, and the library has every book that we need in 4 years. The faculty are good and well-educated, and everyone has at least a Ph.D. There is a canteen for students where we can get everything. The mess always has boring food, but it is tasty. For any emergency, they provide a van for the hospital. The college has a very large ground for sports and also has a gym.

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2025
individual_reviews.title: The college campus amidst nature.

content.Placements: Only 60% of students were placed in our college, as companies coming to our college are very few. The highest package was 11 LPA till now. Average package is 3 LPA. Top companies coming to our college are TCS and Accenture. They do not provide internships from our college. Software developer is the top role offered.
content.Infrastructure: Wifi is provided to our ID monthly on request. Labs and classrooms are sufficiently comfortable. The quality of the food is bad, not tasty at all. Canteen is good but untidy. Medical facilities are excellent, and sports are highly encouraged here.

reviews.review_heading: Peaceful atmosphere with less crowd.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure-wise, I would rate it 7 out of 10. The canteen food quality is an 8 out of 10, and the campus is quite large. The hostel facilities are also good. reviews.review_heading: Our college is accredited with NAAC A grade.
reviews.review_text: Our campus is Wi-Fi enabled. Hostel is great. Mess is also available. They provide ragi balls twice a week. Several books are available in the library under various schemes. Many students visit ISRO, Bangalore.

reviews.review_heading: Placements are good and the college life is enjoyable.
reviews.review_text:
Nature's view is good. The view from the college and the atmosphere are good around here. They have a vast variety of lab equipment. The teaching staff has good knowledge.
The hostel facility is good, with hot water and hygienic rooms. The food in the mess is tasty compared to other foods.

reviews.review_heading: It is a good college for studying. There is no disturbance.

reviews.review_heading: It is the right place to learn this course.

reviews.review_heading: Our college provides good faculty members and placements.

reviews.review_heading: Our college provides good placements.

reviews.review_heading: I suggest every student to join this college.
reviews.review_text: The campus has a good environment with the best facilities. Labs are also good with helpful staff. Hostel is very near to the college and provides a good environment.

reviews.review_heading: Good placements in 2022 in ECE branch.
reviews.review_text: Classrooms of our department are fine and labs are good but some equipments do not work properly. Library books are not available every time. Sometimes the required version or the author is not available. Equipments in the labs are old ones and there is a lot of glitches in the computer systems also. Food quality is okay and medical facilities are average.

reviews.review_heading: Faculties are in knowledge and are very friendly, good placement in last year and this year also.

We have our own labs. Well knowledge faculty members. Have free Wi-Fi classrooms contains projectors. 
Hostel having good room, good food and very secured one. The prices are affordable and a good environment for students to study and have large play ground and have good faculty members.

college_info.college_name: Alamuri Ratnamala Institute of Engineering and Technology: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Reviews, Info

highlights.summary: Here are some additional updates regarding the Alamuri Ratnamala Institute of Engineering and Technology:

fees_and_eligibility.overview: Alamuri Ratnamala Institute of Engineering and Technology offers a wide range of programmes at both UG and PG levels. With option for Full Time learning, students can choose from several streams such as Engineering and Business & Management Studies. At the UG stage, courses available include B.E. / B.Tech and After 10th Diploma. For the PG level, there is a wide range of courses like M.E./M.Tech and MBA/PGDM. Alamuri Ratnamala Institute of Engineering and Technology fee structure ranges between INR 18,000 to 2,66,784.

faqs.answer: A:    Alamuri Ratnamala Institute of Engineering and Technology is a good institution for After 10th Diploma, B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech, MBA/PGDM courses, and these programs are delivered by highly experienced faculty. Major specialization at Alamuri Ratnamala Institute of Engineering and Technology are Civil Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electronics Engineering, Mechatronics Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Information Technology, Sales & Marketing.
faqs.question: Are there any specializations offered by Alamuri Ratnamala Institute of Engineering and Technology?

faqs.answer: A:    Alamuri Ratnamala Institute of Engineering and Technology has courses such as B.Tech, After 1th Diploma, M.E./M.Tech, MBA/PGDM which are primarily in the stream of Engineering, Business & Management Studies. Alamuri Ratnamala Institute of Engineering and Technology has specializations such as B.Tech specializations in Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Information Technology, Electronics Engineering, Electrical Engineering, After 10th Diploma specializations in Civil Engineering, Electronics Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Mechatronics Engineering, M.E./M.Tech specializations in Computer Science Engineering, Electronics Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, MBA/PGDM specializations in Sales & Marketing.
faqs.question: Which courses are offered by Alamuri Ratnamala Institute of Engineering and Technology?

faqs.answer:
A:    Alamuri Ratnamala Institute of Engineering and Technology has below criteria for taking admissions to it's various courses: CoursesEligibilityB.E. / B.TechCandidate must have completed Diploma Course in Engineering and Technology in relevant stream with minimum 45% marks (40% marks in case of candidates of Backward class categories and Persons with Disability belonging to Maharashtra State only) from an All India Council for Technical Education or Central or State Government approved Institution or its equivalent.

OR

Candidate must have completed B.Sc. from UGC/ Association of Indian Universities recognized University with at least 45% marks (40% in case of candidates of Backward class categories and Persons with Disability belonging to Maharashtra State only) and passed 10+2 with Mathematics as a subject.After 10th DiplomaCandidate passed 10th class/SSC examination or its equivalent, with at least 35% aggregate marks from any recognized institute/board are eligible to apply.M.E./M.TechCandidates completed Bachelor of Engineering degree with Computer Engineering/Electrical Engineering/Electronics Engineering/Electronics and TeleCommunication Engineering/Instrumentation Engineering/Information Technology/Power Electronics from Mumbai University or any recognized institute/university are eligible to apply.MBA/PGDMCandidates completed graduation/bachelor's degree recognized by Association of Indian University, New Delhi are eligible to apply.
Candidates from reserved cat

review_content.Placements: Most of the students get placed in the course. Around 50 to 60 percent of students get placed. Companies like Qspider and Hexaware visit the college for placements. review_content.Infrastructure: The college infrastructure is good with impressive facilities and modern buildings. Classrooms are well-equipped with the latest technology including smart boards and high-speed internet. Mess food is surprisingly good here. Hygiene is strictly adhered to. The kitchen staff members are diligent in maintaining cleanliness.

review_summary.college_name: Alamuri Ratnamala Institute of Engineering and Technology Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Engineering - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: Average placement assistance and well-qualified faculty.

content.Placements: The average package is around 3 LPA - 4 LPA. Companies are JSW, TCS, etc. All companies came and students got placed.
content.Infrastructure: In our college, we have Wi-Fi connections, computer labs, a large library, a canteen, an auditorium, classrooms, etc.
content.Faculty: The overall teaching experience is average. Students get knowledgeable experience. The passing percentage of our college students is 80-90%.

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Engineering - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: Good faculty, bad placements, average infrastructure, and no hostel.

content.Placements: To be honest, it is not a good college for placements. But some companies are interested in this college for placements. You cannot get better or higher-level job offers. The minimum or average package offered by any company for placement is 3 LPA.
content.Infrastructure: In our college, Wi-Fi availability is clear. Labs are also available. Classrooms are good. A library is there. We have a canteen. Many more facilities are available in the college. No hostel is available here. Travelling is an issue for students.

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Information Technology - Batch of 2021
individual_reviews.title: Honest review of Alamuri Ratnamala Institute of Engineering and Technology.

content.Placements: Most of the students get placed in the course. Around 50 to 60 percent of students get placed. Companies like Qspider and Hexaware visit the college for placements. The highest package offered is 6 LPA. The average package offered is 3.5 LPA. Roles like web developers and system engineers are offered to students.
content.Infrastructure: The college infrastructure is good with impressive facilities and modern buildings. Classrooms are well-equipped with the latest technology including smart boards and high-speed internet. Mess food is surprisingly good here. Hygiene is strictly adhered to. The kitchen staff members are diligent in maintaining cleanliness.

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Information Technology - Batch of 2022
individual_reviews.title: A good college to learn and improve yourself.

content.Placements: The total percentage of students that were offered placement was 40% as per the criteria and eligibility and the interview. The highest average package was 7 LPA and the lowest was 3 LPA. Reliance, Capgemini, Tata were the top recruiters. Front-end developer was one of the top roles. 30% of students got internships.
content.Infrastructure: The facilities that are available in the college were a good and hygienic canteen, computer labs, mechanical labs, electrical labs, library, good campus, playground, bus facility, and good staff. The quality of the food that was served was also good. The college provided Wi-Fi facility in the library as it gave access to various learning sites that helped many students to clear examinations.

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical Engineering - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: It has lots of good as well as bad experiences.

content.Placements: In ARMIET, it is hard to get a job because it's in too rural area. That's why most of the famous companies, like MNCs, don't visit this college, and that's why the placement is very low here. But you can achieve your skills here to get into big companies. Placement is not that good here, but it's a likable college.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good, but there is no hostel in the college, so you have to take a PG for living. The college has a big campus, and also, the workshop is good for mechanical and civil students. The college also has a good mess for the students. The college is approximately 4 floors high and have tons of experience.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility to get admission in Alamuri Ratnamala Institute of Engineering and Technology for UG/PG courses?
faqs.answer:
Alamuri Ratnamala Institute of Engineering and Technology has below criteria for taking admissions to it's various courses:CoursesEligibilityB.E. / B.TechCandidate must have completed Diploma Course in Engineering and Technology in relevant stream with minimum 45% marks (40% marks in case of candidates of Backward class categories and Persons with Disability belonging to Maharashtra State only) from an All India Council for Technical Education or Central or State Government approved Institution or its equivalent.

OR

Candidate must have completed B.Sc. from UGC/ Association of Indian Universities recognized University with at least 45% marks (40% in case of candidates of Backward class categories and Persons with Disability belonging to Maharashtra State only) and passed 10+2 with Mathematics as a subject.After 10th DiplomaCandidate passed 10th class/SSC examination or its equivalent, with at least 35% aggregate marks from any recognized institute/board are eligible to apply.M.E./M.Te

reviews.review_heading: Average placement assistance and well-qualified faculty.
reviews.review_text: In our college, we have Wi-Fi connections, computer labs, a large library, a canteen, an auditorium, classrooms, etc.

reviews.review_heading: Good faculty, bad placements, average infrastructure, and no hostel.
reviews.review_text: In our college, Wi-Fi availability is clear. Labs are also available. Classrooms are good. A library is there. We have a canteen. Many more facilities are available in the college. No hostel is available here. Travelling is an issue for students.

reviews.review_heading: Honest review of Alamuri Ratnamala Institute of Engineering and Technology.
reviews.review_text: The college infrastructure is good with impressive facilities and modern buildings. Classrooms are well-equipped with the latest technology including smart boards and high-speed internet. Mess food is surprisingly good here. Hygiene is strictly adhered to. The kitchen staff members are diligent in maintaining cleanliness.

reviews.review_heading: A good college to learn and improve yourself.
reviews.review_text: The facilities that are available in the college were a good and hygienic canteen, computer labs, mechanical labs, electrical labs, library, good campus, playground, bus facility, and good staff. The quality of the food that was served was also good. The college provided Wi-Fi facility in the library as it gave access to various learning sites that helped many students to clear examinations.

reviews.review_heading: It has lots of good as well as bad experiences.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is good, but there is no hostel in the college, so you have to take a PG for living. The college has a big campus, and also, the workshop is good for mechanical and civil students. The college also has a good mess for the students. The college is approximately 4 floors high and have tons of experience.

reviews.review_heading: The college area is silent and connected with the river.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is good, and the canteen provides food at a low price. The Wi-Fi has the best speed and is easily available for everyone. All classrooms have projectors and are well-maintained. The computer and other labs are the best and well-maintained. The college provides computers for Valorant, Call of Duty inter-college matches, and high-speed Wi-Fi for them.

reviews.review_heading: Value for money engineering college in Thane.
reviews.review_text: The college facilities are average. There are many classrooms and labs, and most of the labs have internet access and LAN is available. The computer centers are working properly and are a good resource for students to practice and do practical work. However, the on-campus canteen is not good, and medical facilities are lacking.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Alamuri Ratnamala Institute of Engineering and Technology.
reviews.review_text:
The college infrastructure was good and there we students had proper labs and also each classroom has AC and Smart boards.
Hostels were like an apartment; each room was a 1-bedroom flat, with every room having 4 students and mess food that was tasteful and the owner of the mess was quite a friendly person.

reviews.review_heading: Just a below average college .
reviews.review_text: There is a library in our college and we also have a reading room in our college. There is also a canteen in our college. We also get Wi-Fi on our whole college campus but the speed of the internet is very slow and other facilities are also not very well maintained. The college doesn't have hostel so don't be dependent on the college for the hostel facility .

reviews.review_heading: Absolutely recommending this college if you are interested in Diploma of engineering.
reviews.review_text: All-over facilities are good for, eg. canteen has good and hygiene food, campus was big enough, and there is greenery beside the college I chose this college because of the scenario. There are different classes and sections for different branches. All branches has separate lab. In this college, there is huge library.

reviews.review_heading: All good, but have transport issues.
reviews.review_text: Outer appearance of the college is faint. But the condition of the classrooms is good; each classroom has projectors and a digital board. Wi-Fi is available in the whole college. There is a nice library. The quality of the canteen is very nice, and a conditioned gym is also there.

reviews.review_heading: The teaching here is terrible, we are not given practical sessions or lectures of complete syllabus.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi is only available for computers; you can access it. They have computers in the lab in very bad condition; some are not working properly. The classroom is average, and the library is good. They don't have a hostel in college. But the canteen has good food. They have a few sports equipment.

reviews.review_heading: It is an average college with a low fee for engineering.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of our college is good. Classrooms are huge. All benches are in good condition. Each classroom has a projector. The library is good. It has a reading room. The food served in the canteen is delicious and hygienic. Our college has a basketball ground. It has a net arrangement for volleyball and badminton.

reviews.review_heading: Our college has 100% placements.
reviews.review_text: The campus is huge for sports. Wi-Fi is available throughout the campus. A canteen provides hygienic food. The medical facility is available. Labs are available for all subjects. There is a hostel close to the college that is very clean and disciplined.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied with this college.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is good. The mess is good, and the food is very tasty. Food Street is available in front of the college campus.

fees_and_eligibility.overview: Jeppiaar Engineering College offers diverse programmes at UG and PG levels in Full Time mode. The offered programmes can be chosen from streams such as Engineering, Business & Management Studies and IT & Software. At the UG level, candidates have the provision to opt from courses such as B.E. / B.Tech. Whereas, at PG level, Jeppiaar Engineering College offers courses such as M.E./M.Tech, MBA/PGDM and MCA. Jeppiaar Engineering College fee structure for all the courses is around INR 35,000 to 2,00,000.

faqs.answer:
A:    Jeppiaar Engineering College has below criteria for taking admissions to it's various courses: CoursesEligibilityB.E. / B.TechCandidate must have passed VIII, IX, X, XI & XII Std. from schools situated in Tamil Nadu.
Tamil Nadu native candidate who have passed any of the VIII, IX, X, XI & XII Std. or their equivalent exam from schools situated outside Tamil Nadu can also apply. They should produce Original Nativity Certificate.
Children of Central Government Employees, irrespective of their nativity, provided their parents or guardians (only if both parents are not alive) have been serving in Tamil Nadu continuously for the past five years can be eligible to apply.
Sons & daughters of All India service Tamil Nadu cadre officers are eligible to apply. A Self declaration from the parent in this regard is to be produced.
Children of employees in the Public Sector or Government recognised institutions had been working in their organisations for the past five years are also eligible, irrespective of their domicile.
Other State candidates who have studied VIII, IX, X, XI and XII Std. in Tamil Nadu are eligible to apply.MBA/PGDMCandidate who have completed 10+2+AMIE or 10+3 years Diploma + AMIE are also eligible.
AMIE candidate must have 2 years regular full time experience in the relevant field.M.E./M.TechCandidate who have completed 10+2+AMIE or 10+3 years Diploma + AMIE are also eligible.
AMIE candidate must have 2 years regular full time experience in the relevant field.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology - Batch of 2026
individual_reviews.title: The college tries to improve its well-structured campus architecture and student development.

content.Placements: I am willing to give no stars because other colleges provide placements from the third year or the last semester onwards. In my college, only one or two companies come for campus drives. They are small companies that visit in the final year, during the seventh semester.
content.Infrastructure: My department is the worst in terms of maintaining the building, classrooms, and staff, as the staff is not well suited. The college is only now trying to improve the appearance of the campus. The hostel is also very poor, including the food, bathrooms, and rooms. It is not worth the money.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: Satisfied with my college experience of this 2 years.

content.Placements: Above 65% of students got placed from information technology course during the year 2024-2025. The highest package is 12 LPA and the lowest package is 3 LPA. The average package is 3 LPA-4 LPA. The top recruiting companies are ZOHO, TCL, Wipro, and Accenture. Above 75% of students got internships from information technology course in Corizo, Cognizant, and Novitech.
content.Infrastructure: The college has good infrastructure with neat classrooms and labs. In the IT department, the WI-FI is only in the staff room and the password will be shared with the students when the students' tasks from the staff. The quality of the hostel is above average, and the food is average. This college places give importance on sports and there are 2 grounds in the college. One is near the university and the other is near hostel. Medical facilities are very poor in the college.

individual_reviews.title: Dissatisfied because of the worst management ever.

content.Placements: The placement opportunities at this college are average, with a clear bias towards CSE and IT degrees. If you're pursuing any other degree here, you might find it difficult to secure placement opportunities. Therefore, if you're considering a different field of study, this college may not be the ideal choice for you.
content.Infrastructure: The hostel management is very poor, lacking in maintenance and amenities, and the food here is very bad; they don't even care about food problems; many students skip morning meals; water is also a major problem; and amenities like haircuts and dress washing, which were just recently added, aren't even open all the time. Overall, the hostel in this college is the worst; you can rent a room outside, and the hostel feels like it costs 50,000 per year.
